TEXT.English: Unarmed vessels that can create fishing boats. [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Fishing Boats[COLOR_REVERT] cannot enter Ocean spaces and sink in foreign waters.
TEXT.French: Ces navires non armés peuvent fabriquer des bateaux de pêche. Les [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]bateaux de pêche[COLOR_REVERT] ne peuvent pas naviguer en haute mer et peuvent couler hors des eaux nationales.
TEXT.German: Unbewaffnete Fahrzeuge, die Fischerboote bauen. [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Fischerboote[COLOR_REVERT] können nicht auf das offene Meer hinaus fahren und sinken in fremden Gewässern.
TEXT.Italian: Vascelli senza capacità offensiva che possono creare pescherecci. Le [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]pescherecci[COLOR_REVERT] non possono passare dalle caselle oceaniche e sink in foreign waters.
TEXT.Spanish: Son navíos desprovistos de armas con los que se pueden fabricar barcos pesqueros. Los [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Barcos pesqueros[COLOR_REVERT] no pueden entrar en las casillas de océano y se hunden en aguas extranjeras.

TEXT.English: This unit is perfect in fight against archers.
TEXT.French: Cette unité est parfaite contre les archers.
TEXT.German: Diese Einheit eignet sich perfekt im Kampf gegen Bogenschützen.
TEXT.Italian: Questa unità è perfetta nella lotta contro arcieri.
TEXT.Spanish: Esta unidad es perfecta en la lucha contra los arqueros.

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]The School of Pythagoras[COLOR_REVERT] wonder provides culture and a research bonus of 50% to the city.
TEXT.French: L'[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]École de Pythagore[COLOR_REVERT] donne de la culture et un bonus de 50% à la recherche dans la ville.
TEXT.German: Die [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Schule des Pythagoras[COLOR_REVERT] erhöht den kulturellen Wert einer Stadt und verschafft der Stadt einen Forschungsbonus von 50%.
TEXT.Italian: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]The School of Pythagoras[COLOR_REVERT] wonder provides culture and a research bonus of 50% to the city.
TEXT.Spanish: La [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Escuela de Pitágoras[COLOR_REVERT] proporciona a la ciudad un bono del 50% en investigación y cultura.

TEXT.English: The capital gets a bonus of +25% in [ICON_FOOD], [ICON_PRODUCTION] and [ICON_COMMERCE].
TEXT.French: +25% [ICON_FOOD], [ICON_PRODUCTION] et [ICON_COMMERCE] dans la capitale.
TEXT.German: Die Hauptstadt bekommt einen Bonus von +25% in [ICON_FOOD], [ICON_PRODUCTION] und [ICON_COMMERCE].
TEXT.Italian: The capital gets a bonus of +25% in [ICON_FOOD], [ICON_PRODUCTION] and [ICON_COMMERCE].
TEXT.Spanish: La capital recibe un bono de 25% en [ICON_FOOD], [ICON_PRODUCTION] y [ICON_COMMERCE].

TEXT.English: +1[ICON_GOLD] per specialist and -25% production of military units.
TEXT.French: Entretien trés élevé.[NEWLINE]++1[ICON_GOLD] par spécialiste et unités militaires construites 25% moins vite.
TEXT.German: +1[ICON_GOLD] pro Spezialist und -25% Produktion von Militäreinheiten.
TEXT.Italian: +1[ICON_GOLD] per specialist and -25% production of military units.
TEXT.Spanish: +1[ICON_GOLD] por especialista y -25% a la producción de unidades militares.

TEXT.English: +1[ICON_HAPPY] per stationed military unit and -25% war-weariness. +1[ICON_ESPIONAGE] per specialist.
TEXT.French: Entretien élevé.[NEWLINE]+1 [ICON_HAPPY] par unité militaire en garnison. -25% de mécontentement dû à la guerre. +1[ICON_ESPIONAGE] par spécialiste.
TEXT.German: +1[ICON_HAPPY] pro stationierter Militäreinheit und -25% Kriegsverdruss. +1[ICON_ESPIONAGE] pro Spezialist.
TEXT.Italian: +1[ICON_HAPPY] per stationed military unit and -25% war-weariness. +1[ICON_ESPIONAGE] per specialist.
TEXT.Spanish: +1[ICON_HAPPY] por unidad militar estacionada y -25% al hastío bélico. +1[ICON_ESPIONAGE] por especialista.

TEXT.English: +25% [ICON_GREATPEOPLE] increased birth rate and +25%[ICON_CULTURE] bonus. +1 [ICON_RESEARCH] per specialist.
TEXT.French: Entretien très élevé.[NEWLINE]Taux de natalité : +25% [ICON_GREATPEOPLE]. +25% [ICON_CULTURE]. +1 [ICON_RESEARCH] par spécialiste.
TEXT.German: +25% [ICON_GREATPEOPLE] erhöhte Geburtenrate und +25%[ICON_CULTURE]-Bonus. +1 [ICON_RESEARCH] pro Spezialist.
TEXT.Italian: +25% [ICON_GREATPEOPLE] increased birth rate and +25%[ICON_CULTURE] bonus. +1 [ICON_RESEARCH] per specialist.
TEXT.Spanish: +25% [ICON_GREATPEOPLE] a la tasa de natalidad y +25%[ICON_CULTURE] bonus. +1 [ICON_RESEARCH] por especialista.

TEXT.English: +25%[ICON_FOOD], [ICON_PRODUCTION], [ICON_COMMERCE] and +1[ICON_HAPPY] in the capital.
TEXT.French: Entretien moyen.[NEWLINE]+25% [ICON_FOOD], [ICON_PRODUCTION] et [ICON_COMMERCE] dans la capitale. Palais : +1 [ICON_HAPPY].
TEXT.German: +25%[ICON_FOOD], [ICON_PRODUCTION], [ICON_COMMERCE] und +1[ICON_HAPPY] in der Hauptstadt.
TEXT.Italian: +25%[ICON_FOOD], [ICON_PRODUCTION], [ICON_COMMERCE] and +1[ICON_HAPPY] in the capital.
TEXT.Spanish: +25%[ICON_FOOD], [ICON_PRODUCTION], [ICON_COMMERCE] y +1[ICON_HAPPY] en la capital.

TEXT.English: +25% faster training of units and +1[ICON_HAPPY] in cities with state religion.
TEXT.French: Entretien moyen.[NEWLINE]+1 [ICON_HAPPY] dans les villes avec la [ICON_RELIGION] d'état. Unités construites 25% plus vite dans les villes avec la [ICON_RELIGION] d'état.
TEXT.German: +25% schnellere Ausbildung von Einheiten sowie +1[ICON_HAPPY] in Städten mit Staatsreligion.
TEXT.Italian: +25% Più veloce formazione di unità e +1 [ICON_HAPPY] in città con religione di stato.
TEXT.Spanish: +25% a la producción de unidades y +1[ICON_HAPPY] en las ciudades con religión oficial.

TEXT.English: Can hurry production with population. Decreased war-weariness.
TEXT.French: Entretien faible.[NEWLINE]-25% de mécontentement dû à la guerre. Permet de sacrifier la population de la ville pour accélérer la production en cours.
TEXT.German: Opfert Bevölkerung, um die Produktion zu beschleunigen. 25% weniger Kriegsverdruss.
TEXT.Italian: Can hurry production with population. Decreased war-weariness.
TEXT.Spanish: Se puede sacrificar población para acelerar la producción. Menos hastío bélico.

TEXT.English: +25% [ICON_GREATPEOPLE] increased birth rate. +25% increase in war-weariness. 2% chance per turn that settled slaves and exhibition fighters may become free citizens.
TEXT.French: Entretien élevé.[NEWLINE]Taux de natalité : +25% [ICON_GREATPEOPLE]. +25% de mécontentement dû à la guerre. 2% de chances par tour qu'un esclave/gladiateur devienne un citoyen libre.
TEXT.German: +25% [ICON_GREATPEOPLE] erhöhte Geburtenrate und 25% erhöhter Kriegsverdruss. 2% Chance pro Runde, dass angesiedelte Sklaven und Schaukämpfer zu freien Bürgern werden.
TEXT.Spanish: +25% [ICON_GREATPEOPLE] de tasa de natalidad. +25% de incremento del hastío bélico. 2% por turno de que los esclavos asentados y los gladiadores se vuelvan ciudadanos libres.

TEXT.English: +25% war-weariness and +25% [ICON_CULTURE] bonus in all cities. 3% chance per turn that settled slaves and exhibition fighters may become free citizens.
TEXT.French: Entretien élevé.[NEWLINE]+25% de mécontentement dû à la guerre. +25% [ICON_CULTURE]. 3% de chances par tour qu'un esclave/gladiateur devienne un citoyen libre.
TEXT.German: +25% Kriegsverdruss sowie +25% [ICON_CULTURE]-Bonus in allen Städten. 3% Chance pro Runde, dass angesiedelte Sklaven und Schaukämpfer zu freien Bürgern werden.
TEXT.Italian: +25% war-weariness and +25% [ICON_CULTURE] bonus in all cities. 3% chance per turn that settled slaves and exhibition fighters may become free citizens.
TEXT.Spanish: +25% al hastío bélico y +25% [ICON_CULTURE] bonus en todas las ciudades. 3% por turno de que los esclavos y gladiadores asentados se conviertan en ciudadanos libres.

TEXT.English: +25% faster production of city improvements in cities with state religion. Unlimited priest specialists.
TEXT.French: Entretien faible.[NEWLINE]Bâtiments construit 25% plus vite dans les villes avec la [ICON_RELIGION] d'état. Prêtres illimités.
TEXT.German: Unbegrenzt Priester und +25% schnellere Gebäudeproduktion in Städten mit der Staatsreligion.
TEXT.Italian: +25% faster production of city improvements in cities with state religion. Unlimited priest specialists.
TEXT.Spanish: +25% a la construcción de edificios en ciudades con religión estatal. Especialistas sacerdotes ilimitados.

TEXT.English: -25% maintenance cost from distance to the capital, +50%[ICON_FOOD] of trade routes.
TEXT.French: Entretien moyen.[NEWLINE]-25% d'entretien dû à l'éloignement du palais. +50% [ICON_FOOD] des routes commerciales.
TEXT.German: -25% Unterhaltskosten wegen Entfernung zur Hauptstadt, +50%[ICON_FOOD] von Handelswegen.
TEXT.Italian: -25% maintenance cost from distance to the capital, +50%[ICON_FOOD] of trade routes.
TEXT.Spanish: -25% al mantenimientos de ciudades por alejamiento de la ciudad, +50%[ICON_FOOD] en las rutas comerciales.

TEXT.English: +25%[ICON_GOLD], +25%[ICON_RESEARCH], +25%[ICON_CULTURE] and +25% [ICON_ESPIONAGE] in the capital.
TEXT.French: Entretien moyen.[NEWLINE]+25%[ICON_GOLD], +25%[ICON_RESEARCH], +25%[ICON_CULTURE] et +25% [ICON_ESPIONAGE] dans la capitale.
TEXT.German: +25%[ICON_GOLD], +25%[ICON_RESEARCH], +25%[ICON_CULTURE] und +25% [ICON_ESPIONAGE] in der Hauptstadt.
TEXT.Italian: +25%[ICON_GOLD], +25%[ICON_RESEARCH], +25%[ICON_CULTURE] and +25% [ICON_ESPIONAGE] in the capital.
TEXT.Spanish: +25%[ICON_GOLD], +25%[ICON_RESEARCH], +25%[ICON_CULTURE] y +25% [ICON_ESPIONAGE] en la capital.

TEXT.English: Unlimited merchants adjustable, double the growth for cottages and villages, +25% [ICON_PRODUCTION] from trade routes.
TEXT.French: Entretien moyen.[NEWLINE]Les cottages se développent 100% plus vite. +25% [ICON_PRODUCTION] des routes commerciales. Marchands illimités..
TEXT.German: Unbegrenzt Händler einstellbar, doppeltes Wachstum für Hütten und Weiler, +25% [ICON_PRODUCTION] von Handelswegen.
TEXT.Italian: Unlimited merchants adjustable, double the growth for cottages and villages, +25% [ICON_PRODUCTION] from trade routes.
TEXT.Spanish: Mercaderes ilimitados, doble crecimiento de villas y caserios, +25% [ICON_PRODUCTION] por rutas comerciales.

TEXT.English: +25% [ICON_COMMERCE] from trade routes and the city production can be accelerated with gold.
TEXT.French: Entretien moyen.[NEWLINE]+25% [ICON_COMMERCE] des routes commerciales. Permet de payer pour accélérer la production en cours.
TEXT.German: +25% [ICON_COMMERCE] von Handelswegen und die Produktion einer Stadt kann mit Gold beschleunigt werden.
TEXT.Italian: +25% [ICON_COMMERCE] from trade routes and the city production can be accelerated with gold.
TEXT.Spanish: +25% [ICON_COMMERCE] por rutas comerciales y la producción de las ciudades puede ser acelerada con oro.

TEXT.English: [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Cults[COLOR_REVERT] develop their effect for the first time and megalithic tombs receive +1 [ICON_HAPPY].
TEXT.French: Entretien faible.[NEWLINE]Tombeau troglodyte, Tombeau mégalithique, Champ d'urnes, Kourgane, Tombeau royal, Dolmen, Tumulus : +1 [ICON_HAPPY].
TEXT.German: [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Kulte[COLOR_REVERT] entfalten erstmals ihre Wirkung und Steingräber erhalten +1 [ICON_HAPPY].
TEXT.Italian: [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Cults[COLOR_REVERT] develop their effect for the first time and megalithic tombs receive +1 [ICON_HAPPY].
TEXT.Spanish: [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Los Cultos[COLOR_REVERT] tienen efecto y aumenta la felicidad de las tumbas megalíticas +1 [ICON_HAPPY].

TEXT.English: Increased birth rate. There is no state religion and +1[ICON_HAPPY] for each religion in the city.
TEXT.French: Entretien moyen.[NEWLINE]Taux de natalité : +25% [ICON_GREATPEOPLE]. +1 [ICON_HAPPY] par [ICON_RELIGION] non officielle.
TEXT.German: Erhöhte Geburtenrate. Es gibt nun keine Staatsreligion und +1[ICON_HAPPY] für jede Religion in der Stadt.
TEXT.Italian: Increased birth rate. There is no state religion and +1[ICON_HAPPY] for each religion in the city.
TEXT.Spanish: Se incrementa la tasa de natalidad. No hay religión oficial y +1[ICON_HAPPY] por cada religión en la ciudad.

TEXT.English: New units receive +2 experience points in cities with state relgion.
TEXT.French: Entretien moyen.[NEWLINE]+2 EXP dans les villes avec la [ICON_RELIGION] d'état.
TEXT.German: Neue Einheiten erhalten in Städten mit Staatsreligion +2 Erfahrungspunkte.
TEXT.Italian: New units receive +2 experience points in cities with state relgion.
TEXT.Spanish: Las nuevas unidades reciben +2 puntos adicionales de experiencia en las ciudades con Relgion oficial.

TEXT.English: Unit production decreased by 25% but cheaper hiring of mercenaries and +1 [ICON_HAPPY] from [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Mercenary Post[COLOR_REVERT]. Military maintenance rises by 1[ICON_GOLD] per unit and war weariness is reduced by 25%.
TEXT.French: Pas d'entretien.[NEWLINE]Unités militaires construites 25% moins vite. Entretien : +1 [ICON_GOLD] par unité. -25% de mécontentement dû à la guerre. Poste de recrutement mercenaire : +1 [ICON_HAPPY].
TEXT.German: Um 25% geringere Einheitenproduktion, aber dafür günstigere Söldnerbeauftragung und +1 [ICON_HAPPY] durch einen [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Söldnerposten[COLOR_REVERT]. +1 [ICON_GOLD] Unterhaltskosten für Militäreinheiten, -25% Kriegsverdruss.
TEXT.Italian: Unit production decreased by 25% but cheaper hiring of mercenaries and +1 [ICON_HAPPY] from [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Mercenary Post[COLOR_REVERT]. Military maintenance rises by 1[ICON_GOLD] per unit and war weariness is reduced by 25%.
TEXT.Spanish: La producción de unidades decrece un 25% pero es más barato la contratación de mercenarios y +1 [ICON_HAPPY] por [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Puesto de mercenarios[COLOR_REVERT]. Se incrementa el coste de las unidades en 1[ICON_GOLD] y el hastío bélico es reducido en un -25%.

TEXT.English: +25% production of military units. Some units can be recruited per turn, but the war weariness is increased by a quarter.
TEXT.French: Entretien faible.[NEWLINE]Unités militaires construites 25% plus vite. Permet de mobiliser quelques unités par tour. +25% de mécontentement dû à la guerre.
TEXT.German: Militäreinheiten werden 25% schneller produziert und es können einige Einheiten pro Runde rekrutiert werden, aber die Kriegsunzufriedenheit nimmt um ein Viertel zu.
TEXT.Italian: +25% production of military units. Some units can be recruited per turn, but the war weariness is increased by a quarter.
TEXT.Spanish: +25% a la producción de unidades militares. Algunas unidades pueden ser reclutadas por turno, pero el hastío bélico se incrementa en un cuarto.

TEXT.English: +(25% of the population) free units and war weariness is lessened by 25%.
TEXT.French: Entretien faible.[NEWLINE]+(25% de la population) unités gratuites. -25% de mécontentement dû à la guerre.
TEXT.German: Es können zusätzliche +(25% der Bevölkerung) Einheiten kostenlos versorgt werden und der Kriegsverdruss verringert sich um 25%.
TEXT.Italian: +(25% of the population) free units and war weariness is lessened by 25%.
TEXT.Spanish: Menos costes para el mantenimiento de unidades y el hastío bélico es reducido un 25%.

TEXT.English: The perfect civic with which to conduct a war. The chance of a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great General[COLOR_REVERT] rises enormously, units gain experience faster in the own culture and war weariness sinks by half.
TEXT.French: Entretien élevé.[NEWLINE]+100% de chances d'apparition d'un Général illustre. Plus d'expérience dans la patrie. -50% de mécontentement dû à la guerre.
TEXT.German: Die perfekte Staatsform, um einen Krieg zuführen. Die Chance auf einen [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Großen General[COLOR_REVERT] steigt enorm, Einheiten sammeln im eigenen Land schneller Erfahrung und die Kriegsunzufriedenheit sinkt um 25%.
TEXT.Italian: The perfect civic with which to conduct a war. The chance of a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great General[COLOR_REVERT] rises enormously, units gain experience faster in the own culture and war weariness sinks by half.
TEXT.Spanish: El principio perfecto para la guerra. La posibilidad de un nuevo[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT] Gran General[COLOR_REVERT] aumenta enormemente, las unidades se promueven mejor en el país de origen y el hastío bélico se reduce a la mitad.

TEXT.English: The Ivory Palace produces a bonus of +2[ICON_HAPPY] as well as +8 [ICON_CULTURE] and considerably reduces the maintenance of the city in which it is built.
TEXT.French: Le palais d'ivoire génére une bonification de +2 [ICON_HAPPY] ainsi je +8 [ICON_CULTURE] et en plus resulte dans une reduction des frais d'entretien dans sa ville de construction.
TEXT.German: Der Elfenbeinpalast erzeugt den Bonus von +2 [ICON_HAPPY] sowie +8 [ICON_CULTURE] und reduziert darüber hinaus den Unterhalt der Stadt, in der er gebaut wurde, deutlich.
TEXT.Italian: The Ivory Palace produces a bonus of +2[ICON_HAPPY] as well as +8 [ICON_CULTURE] and considerably reduces the maintenance of the city in which it is built.
TEXT.Spanish: El Palacio de Marfil da un bono de +1[ICON_HAPPY] así como de +8 [ICON_CULTURE] Y reduce considerablemente el mantenimiento de las ciudades cercanas.

TEXT.English: The Dam of Marib with its architecture makes for a clear bonus of +6 [ICON_CULTURE] and for the water reservoir effect +2 [ICON_HEALTHY].
TEXT.French: Le barrage de Marib fournit un bonus de +6 [ICON_CULTURE] avec son architecture et un effet de +2 [ICON_HEALTHY] avec son réservoir d'eau.
TEXT.German: Der Damm von Marib sorgt mit seiner Baukunst für einen deutlichen Bonus von +6 [ICON_CULTURE] und für den Wasserspeichereffekt +2 [ICON_HEALTHY]
TEXT.Italian: The Dam of Marib with its architecture makes for a clear bonus of +6 [ICON_CULTURE] and for the water reservoir effect +2 [ICON_HEALTHY].
TEXT.Spanish: La Presa de Marib, debido a su obra arquitectonica da un bono de +6 [ICON_CULTURE] y por su función con el agua un +2 [ICON_HEALTHY].

TEXT.English: This [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]exploration unit[COLOR_REVERT], which represents a national unit, increases food stuffs from slain animals.
TEXT.French: Cette [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]unité d'exploration[COLOR_REVERT] peut récolter de la nourriture pour les villes proches en tuant des animaux.
TEXT.German: Diese [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Aufklärungseinheit[COLOR_REVERT], welche eine [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]nationale Einheit[COLOR_REVERT] darstellt, erhöht den Nahrungausstoß von erlegten Tieren.
TEXT.Italian: This [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]exploration unit[COLOR_REVERT], which represents a national unit, increases food stuffs from slain animals.
TEXT.Spanish: Esta [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]unidad exploradora[COLOR_REVERT], es una unidad nacional, incrementa los alimentos recibidos al derrotar animales.

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT] Keftion [COLOR_REVERT] is a merchant and transport ship hybrid. It can transport two units but can carry out a trade mission as well. While not suited for battle, this early ship is great for trading with other seafarers.
TEXT.French: Le [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT] Keftion [COLOR_REVERT] est un navire hybride marchand/transport. Il peut transporter deux unités et peut aussi effectuer des missions commerciales. Bien que n'étant pas adapté aux batailles, ce navire primitif est excellent pour commercer avec les autres nations maritimes.
TEXT.German: Der Keftion stellt eine Mischung aus Transportschiff und Handelsschiff dar, kann also 2 Einheiten transportieren aber auch eine Handelsmission durchführen. Zum Kämpfen eher nicht geeignet, lohnt sich dieses Schiff um frühzeitig mit anderen Seevölkern zu handeln.
TEXT.Italian: The [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT] Keftion [COLOR_REVERT] is a merchant and transport ship hybrid. It can transport two units but can carry out a trade mission as well. While not suited for battle, this early ship is great for trading with other seafarers.
TEXT.Spanish: El [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT] Keftion [COLOR_REVERT] es un barco híbrido mercante y de transporte. Puede transportar dos unidades pero puede llevar una misión comercial también. Aunque no es adecuado para la batalla, este barco primitivo es genial para comercial con otros navegantes.

TEXT.English: This [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT] national unit [COLOR_REVERT] can only be built with the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT] Cilician Pirate [COLOR_REVERT] resource and conceals its nationality.[NEWLINE]This ship is well suited for battle and is the terror of the seas!
TEXT.French: Cette [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT] unité nationale [COLOR_REVERT] ne peut être construite qu'avec la ressource [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT] Pirate Sicilien[COLOR_REVERT] et dissimule sa nationalité.[NEWLINE]Ce navire est parfait pour le combat. C'est la terreur des mers !
TEXT.German: Diese [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]nationale Einheit[COLOR_REVERT] lässt sich nur mit der Ressource [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Kilikischer Seeräuber[COLOR_REVERT] bauen und versteckt seine Nationalität.[NEWLINE]Da dieses Schiff sehr gut zum Kämpfen geeignet ist, bedeutet dieses einen Schrecken der Meere.
TEXT.Italian: This [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT] national unit [COLOR_REVERT] can only be built with the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT] Cilician Pirate [COLOR_REVERT] resource and conceals its nationality.[NEWLINE]This ship is well suited for battle and is the terror of the seas!
TEXT.Spanish: Esta [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT] unidad nacional [COLOR_REVERT] sólo puede ser construido con el recurso [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT] Piratas Cilicios [COLOR_REVERT] y oculta su nacionalidad.[NEWLINE]¡Este barco está bien preparado para la batalla y es el terror de los mares!

TEXT.English: This [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]national unit[COLOR_REVERT] is adept at city defense.
TEXT.French: Cette [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]unité nationale[COLOR_REVERT] est adaptée à la défense de ville.
TEXT.German: Diese [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]nationale Einheit[COLOR_REVERT] ist wie geschaffen dafür, die Städte vor Feinden zu beschützen.
TEXT.Italian: This [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]national unit[COLOR_REVERT] is adept at city defense.
TEXT.Spanish: Esta [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]unidad nacional[COLOR_REVERT] es versado en la defensa de la ciudad.

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Tabularium[COLOR_REVERT] decreases the maintenance cost of the city by another 25% and in addition, produces +2 [ICON_ESPIONAGE].
TEXT.French: Le [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Tabularium[COLOR_REVERT] réduit le coût de maintenance de la ville de 25% et produit +2 [ICON_ESPIONAGE].
TEXT.German: Das [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Tabularium[COLOR_REVERT] reduziert den Unterhalt der erbauenden Stadt um weitere 25% und weist den weiteren Effekt von +2 [ICON_ESPIONAGE] aus.
TEXT.Italian: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Tabularium[COLOR_REVERT] decreases the maintenance cost of the city by another 25% and in addition, produces +2 [ICON_ESPIONAGE].
TEXT.Spanish: El [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Tabulario[COLOR_REVERT] reduce el coste de mantenimiento de la ciudad en otro 25% y además, produce +2 [ICON_ESPIONAGE].

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Therme[COLOR_REVERT] produces a bonus of +1 [ICON_HEALTHY] and unlike the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]bath house[COLOR_REVERT] provides an additional bonus of +1 [ICON_HAPPY].
TEXT.French: Le [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Therme[COLOR_REVERT] produit +1 [ICON_HEALTHY] et contrairement aux[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]bains publics[COLOR_REVERT] fournit un bonus additionnel de +1 [ICON_HAPPY].
TEXT.German: Die [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Therme[COLOR_REVERT] erzeugt einen Bonus von +1 [ICON_HEALTHY] und gegenüber dem [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Badehaus[COLOR_REVERT] einen weiteren Bonus von +1 [ICON_HAPPY].
TEXT.Italian: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Therme[COLOR_REVERT] produces a bonus of +1 [ICON_HEALTHY] and unlike the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]bath house[COLOR_REVERT] provides an additional bonus of +1 [ICON_HAPPY].
TEXT.Spanish: Las [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Termas[COLOR_REVERT] produce un bonus de +1 [ICON_HEALTHY] y a diferencia de la [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Casa de Baños[COLOR_REVERT] provee un bonus adicional de +1 [ICON_HAPPY].

TEXT.English: This strong national unit will receive a bonus of +100% against [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]mounted units[COLOR_REVERT] and can only be built in cities with a [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Castellum[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.French: Cette puissante unité nationale reçoit un bonus de +100% contre les [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]unités montées[COLOR_REVERT] et peut uniquement être créée dans les villes avec [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Castellum[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.German: Diese starke nationale Einheit erhält einen Bonus von +100% gegen [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]berittene Einheiten[COLOR_REVERT] und kann nur in Städten mit [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Kastell[COLOR_REVERT] gebaut werden.
TEXT.Italian: This strong national unit will receive a bonus of +100% against [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]mounted units[COLOR_REVERT] and can only be built in cities with a [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Castellum[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Spanish: Esta fuerte unidad nacional recibirá un bonus de +100% contra [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]unidades montadas[COLOR_REVERT] y pueden ser solo construídas en ciudades con un [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Castrum[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Heavy Battering Ram[COLOR_REVERT] is an improved siege weapon and reduces the defense value of a city by 10%.
TEXT.French: Le [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]bélier lourd[COLOR_REVERT] est une unité de siège améliorée qui réduit la défense des villes de 10%.
TEXT.German: Der [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Sturmbock[COLOR_REVERT] stellt eine verbesserte Belagerungswaffe dar und reduziert den Verteidigungswert einer Stadt um -10%.
TEXT.Italian: The [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Heavy Battering Ram[COLOR_REVERT] is an improved siege weapon and reduces the defense value of a city by 10%.
TEXT.Spanish: La [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Batería de ariete pesada[COLOR_REVERT] es un arma de asedio mejorada y reduce el valor de la defensa de una ciudad en un 10%.

TEXT.English: An [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Oppidum[COLOR_REVERT] has stronger fortifications than [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT] Walls[COLOR_REVERT]; increasing the defense value of the city by 90%.
TEXT.French: Un [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Oppidum[COLOR_REVERT] a de meilleurs fortifications que les [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT] Murs[COLOR_REVERT]. Il augmente la valeur de défense d'une ville de 90%.
TEXT.German: Eine [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Oppidum[COLOR_REVERT] ist eine verbesserte Befestigung als eine [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Stadtmauer[COLOR_REVERT] und erhöht den Verteidigungswert der Stadt um 90%.
TEXT.Italian: An [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Oppidum[COLOR_REVERT] has stronger fortifications than [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT] Walls[COLOR_REVERT]; increasing the defense value of the city by 90%.
TEXT.Spanish: Un [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Oppidum[COLOR_REVERT] tiene fortifiaciones mas fuertes que las [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT] Murallas[COLOR_REVERT]; incrementando el valor de la defensa de la ciudad en un 90%.

TEXT.English: For the construction of the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Fire Temple[COLOR_REVERT], the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Zoroastrianism [COLOR_REVERT] religion must be present in the city.
TEXT.French: La religion [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Zoroastrisme[COLOR_REVERT] doit être présente dans la ville pour construire le [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Temple de Feu[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.German: Für den Bau des [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Feuertempels[COLOR_REVERT] muss der [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Zoroastrismus[COLOR_REVERT] in der Stadt vorhanden sein.
TEXT.Italian: For the construction of the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Fire Temple[COLOR_REVERT], the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Zoroastrianism [COLOR_REVERT] religion must be present in the city.
TEXT.Spanish: Para la construcción del [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Templo del Fuego[COLOR_REVERT], el [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Zoroastrismo [COLOR_REVERT] debe estar presente en la ciudad.

TEXT.English: This Spartan Military Academy increases the production rate and experience of new units, and adds more defense against attacks and espionage.
TEXT.French: L'Académie Militaire de Sparte augmente la production et l'expérience des nouvelles unités. Elle augmente également la protection aux attaques et à l'espionnage.
TEXT.German: Diese spartanische Militärakademie erhöht die Produktionsgeschwindigkeit und Erfahrungspunkte von neuen Einheiten sowie die Verteidigung der Stadt gegen Angriffe und Spionage.
TEXT.Italian: This Spartan Military Academy increases the production rate and experience of new units, and adds more defense against attacks and espionage.
TEXT.Spanish: Esta Academia Militar Espartana incrementa el ritmo de producción y expereincia de las nuevas unidades, y añade mas defensa contra ataques y espionaje.

TEXT.English: No spread of non-state religion. Cities with state religion construct buildings faster. Increases great people birth rate in cities with state religion.
TEXT.French: Entretien moyen.[NEWLINE]Pas de propagation des [ICON_RELIGION] non officielles. Bâtiments construit 25% plus vite dans les villes avec la [ICON_RELIGION] d'état.
TEXT.German: Keine Ausbreitung fremder Religionen. Städte mit Staatsreligion stellen Gebäude schneller fertig. Häufigere Geburten Großer Persönlichkeiten in Städten mit Staatsreligion.
TEXT.Italian: No spread of non-state religion. Cities with state religion construct buildings faster. Increases great people birth rate in cities with state religion.
TEXT.Spanish: Sin difusión de religiones no oficiales. Ciudades con religión oficial construyen edificios más rápido. Incrementa el ritmo de crecimiento de grandes personajes en ciudades con religión oficial.

TEXT.English: Enables the civic tyranny: military units are recruited faster and cost less upkeep, more slaves appear, unhappiness in the biggest cities.
TEXT.French: Entretien élevé.[NEWLINE]Unités militaires construites 50% plus vite. +25 unités gratuites. +1 [ICON_UNHAPPY] dans les plus grandes villes. Naissances d'esclaves plus nombreuses.
TEXT.German: Ermöglicht die Staatsform Tyrannis: Militäreinheiten werden schneller ausgebildet und kosten weniger Unterhalt, mehr Sklaven entstehen, Unzufriedenheit in den größten Städten.
TEXT.Italian: Enables the civic tyranny: military units are recruited faster and cost less upkeep, more slaves appear, unhappiness in the biggest cities.
TEXT.Spanish: Activa el principio de tiranía: las unidades son reclutadas más rápidamente y cuestan menos mantenimiento, aparecen más esclavos, infelicidad en las ciudades más grandes.

TEXT.English: Increases growth, production, espionage and commerce in all your cities.
TEXT.French: Entretien élevé.[NEWLINE]+10% [ICON_FOOD], [ICON_PRODUCTION] et [ICON_COMMERCE].
TEXT.German: Stärkt Wachstum, Produktion, Spionage und Wirtschaft in allen Städten.
TEXT.Italian: Increases growth, production, espionage and commerce in all your cities.
TEXT.Spanish: Aumenta crecimiento, producción, espionaje y comercio en todas tus ciudades.

TEXT.English: +1 [ICON_HAPPY] in the largest cities. Lower maintenance for number of cities. Unlimited spies.
TEXT.French: Entretien faible.[NEWLINE]-25% d'entretien dû au nombre de villes. +1 [ICON_HAPPY] dans les plus grandes villes. Espions illimités.
TEXT.German: +1 [ICON_HAPPY] in den größten Städten. -25% Unterhaltskosten von Anzahl der Städte. Unbegrenzt Agenten.
TEXT.Italian: +1 [ICON_HAPPY] in the largest cities. Lower maintenance for number of cities. Unlimited spies.
TEXT.Spanish: +1 [ICON_HAPPY] en las ciudades más grandes. Mantenimiento mas bajo por número de ciudades. Espías ilimitados.

TEXT.English: The most primitive Legal civic of the game.
TEXT.French: Pas d'entretien.
TEXT.German: Die einfachste Rechts-Staatsform des Spiels.
TEXT.Italian: The most primitive Legal civic of the game.
TEXT.Spanish: El más primitivo principio de Legislación del juego.

TEXT.English: Can sacrifice city population to finish production. Workers build improvements faster.
TEXT.French: Entretien moyen.[NEWLINE]Les ouvriers construisent les aménagements 50% plus vite. Permet de sacrifier la population de la ville pour accélérer la production en cours. Fermes : +1 [ICON_PRODUCTION].
TEXT.German: Opfert Bevölkerung, um die Produktion zu beschleunigen. Bautrupps stellen Modernisierungen schneller fertig.
TEXT.Italian: Can sacrifice city population to finish production. Workers build improvements faster.
TEXT.Spanish: Puede sacrificar población de la ciudad para finalizar producción. Los trabajadores construyen mejoras mas rápido.

TEXT.English: The most primitive Economy civic of the game.
TEXT.French: Pas d'entretien.[NEWLINE]Aucune route commerciale avec l'étranger.
TEXT.German: Die einfachste Wirtschafts-Staatsform des Spiels.
TEXT.Italian: The most primitive Economy civic of the game.
TEXT.Spanish: El más primitivo principio de Economía del juego.

TEXT.English: Faster military unit production. [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Monument[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Obelisk[COLOR_REVERT] or [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Stele of the Vultures[COLOR_REVERT] produce extra happiness. Slightly increased costs for cults.
TEXT.French: Entretien élevé.[NEWLINE]Unités militaires construites 25% plus vite. -25% de mécontentement dû à la guerre.
TEXT.German: Beschleunigte Produktion von Militäreinheiten. [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Monument[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Obelisk[COLOR_REVERT] oder [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Geierstele[COLOR_REVERT] steigern die Zufriedenheit. Leicht verteuerter Unterhalt für Kulte.
TEXT.Italian: Faster military unit production. [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Monument[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Obelisk[COLOR_REVERT] or [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Stele of the Vultures[COLOR_REVERT] produce extra happiness. Slightly increased costs for cults.
TEXT.Spanish: Producción de unidades militares más rápido. [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Monumento[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Obelisco[COLOR_REVERT] o [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Estela de los Buitres[COLOR_REVERT] produce felicidad extra. Aumenta ligeramente los costes por los cultos.

TEXT.English: The most primitive Military civic of the game.
TEXT.French: Pas d'entretien.[NEWLINE]+50% d'EXP à l'intérieur des frontières.
TEXT.German: Die einfachste Militär-Staatsform des Spiels.
TEXT.Italian: The most primitive Military civic of the game.
TEXT.Spanish: El más primitivo principio Militar del juego.

TEXT.English: Very good form of government for a quick war. Faster production of units through [ICON_FOOD].
TEXT.French: Entretien faible.[NEWLINE]Unités militaires produites avec [ICON_FOOD].
TEXT.German: Sehr gute Staatsform für einen schnellen Krieg. Schnellere Einheitenproduktion durch [ICON_FOOD].
TEXT.Italian: Very good form of government for a quick war. Faster production of units through [ICON_FOOD].
TEXT.Spanish: Muy buena forma de gobierno para una guerra rápida. Producción de unidades más rápida por medio de [ICON_FOOD].

TEXT.English: This holy shrine of the Nordic gods can be build by a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Prophet[COLOR_REVERT] and produces 4 [ICON_CULTURE], +1 [ICON_HAPPY] und +1 [ICON_BULLET].
TEXT.French: Cet autel sacré nordique peut être construit par un [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Grand Prophète[COLOR_REVERT] et produit 4 [ICON_CULTURE], +1 [ICON_HAPPY] und +1 [ICON_BULLET].
TEXT.German: Diese heilige Stätte des nordischen Glaubens kann von einem [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Großen Propheten[COLOR_REVERT] gebaut werden und erzeugt 4 [ICON_CULTURE], +1 [ICON_HAPPY] und verbreitet die nordische Religion.
TEXT.Italian: This holy shrine of the Nordic gods can be build by a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Prophet[COLOR_REVERT] and produces 4 [ICON_CULTURE], +1 [ICON_HAPPY] und +1 [ICON_BULLET].
TEXT.Spanish: Este santuario sagrado de los dioses Nórdicos puede ser construido por un [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Gran Profeta[COLOR_REVERT] y produce 4 [ICON_CULTURE], +1 [ICON_HAPPY] y +1 [ICON_BULLET].

TEXT.English: This holy shrine of the Roman gods can be build by a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Prophet[COLOR_REVERT] and produces 4 [ICON_CULTURE], +1 [ICON_HAPPY] and +1 experience to all cities!
TEXT.French: Cette autel sacré romain peut être construit par un [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Grand Prophète[COLOR_REVERT]. Il produit 4 [ICON_CULTURE], +1 [ICON_HAPPY] et +1 expérience dans toutes les villes !
TEXT.German: Diese heilige Stätte des römischen Glaubens kann von einem [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Großen Propheten[COLOR_REVERT] gebaut werden und erzeugt 4 [ICON_CULTURE], +1 [ICON_HAPPY] und +1 Erfahrung in allen Städten!
TEXT.Italian: This holy shrine of the Roman gods can be build by a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Prophet[COLOR_REVERT] and produces 4 [ICON_CULTURE], +1 [ICON_HAPPY] and +1 experience to all cities!
TEXT.Spanish: Este santuario sagrado del culto romano puede ser construido por un [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Gran Profeta[COLOR_REVERT] y produce 4 [ICON_CULTURE], +1 [ICON_HAPPY] y +1 de experiencia a todas las ciudades!

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Illyrian Special Unit[COLOR_REVERT] starts with [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Guerilla I[COLOR_REVERT], which offers an advantage on hilly ground.
TEXT.French: Cette [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]unité unique Illyrienne[COLOR_REVERT] commence avec [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]guerilla I[COLOR_REVERT] qui lui donne un avantage sur les collines.
TEXT.German: Die [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Spezialeinheit der Illyrer[COLOR_REVERT] beginnt mit [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Guerilla I[COLOR_REVERT] und erhält damit einen Vorteil im hügligen Gelände.
TEXT.Italian: The [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Illyrian Special Unit[COLOR_REVERT] starts with [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Guerilla I[COLOR_REVERT], which offers an advantage on hilly ground.
TEXT.Spanish: La [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]unidad especial Iliria[COLOR_REVERT] empieza con [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]guerrilla I[COLOR_REVERT], que ofrece una ventaja en terreno con colinas.

TEXT.English: This [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Roman special unit[COLOR_REVERT] can be built in a limited number and is particularly qualified to defend cities.
TEXT.French: Cette [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]unité unique romaine[COLOR_REVERT] ne peut être construite qu'en nombre limité. Elle est extrêmement puissante pour défendre les villes.
TEXT.German: Diese [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]römische Spezialeinheit[COLOR_REVERT] kann in beschränkter Anzahl gebaut werden und eignet sich hervorragend dazu, Städte zu verteidigen.
TEXT.Italian: This [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Roman special unit[COLOR_REVERT] can be built in a limited number and is particularly qualified to defend cities.
TEXT.Spanish: Esta [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]unidad especial Romana[COLOR_REVERT] puede ser construida en un número limitado y está particularmente cualificada para defender ciudades.

TEXT.English: This [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Assyrian special unit[COLOR_REVERT] is particularly qualified to attack Melee units.
TEXT.French: Cette [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]unité unique assyrienne[COLOR_REVERT] est particulièrement bonne pour attaquer les unités de combats rapprochés.
TEXT.German: Diese [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]assyrische Spezialeinheit[COLOR_REVERT] ist besonders darin geübt, Nahkampfeinheiten anzugreifen.
TEXT.Italian: This [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Assyrian special unit[COLOR_REVERT] is particularly qualified to attack Melee units.
TEXT.Spanish: Esta [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]unidad especial Asiria[COLOR_REVERT] está particularmente cualificada para atacar unidades cuerpo a cuerpo.

TEXT.English: This first sea unit can be used to explore the surrounding area and to colonize offshore islands.
TEXT.French: Cette première unité navale peut être utilisée pour explorer les zones alentours et coloniser les îles proches.
TEXT.German: Diese erste Seeeinheit ist geeignet, um die nähere Umgebung zu erkunden und um küstennahe Inseln zu besiedeln.
TEXT.Italian: This first sea unit can be used to explore the surrounding area and to colonize offshore islands.
TEXT.Spanish: Esta primera unidad marina puede ser usada para explorar el área circundante y colonizar islas cerca de la costa.

TEXT.English: This elite unit is only available for the Hebrews and can be commended from a shield bearer, which has acquired the status of a veteran.
TEXT.French: Cette unité d'élite est disponible uniquement pour les hébreux et peut être promu par un porteur de bouclier qui a acquis le statut de vétéran.
TEXT.German: Diese Eliteeinheit steht nur den Hebräern zur Verfügung und kann aus einem Schildträger erstellt werden, der den Status eines Veterans erreicht hat.
TEXT.Italian: This elite unit is only available for the Hebrews and can be commended from a shield bearer, which has acquired the status of a veteran.
TEXT.Spanish: Esta unidad élite solo está disponible para los hebreos y puede ser promovida desde un soldado con escudo, que haya adquirido el estatus de veterano.

TEXT.English: With this missionary the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Roman religion[COLOR_REVERT] can be actively spread in other cities.
TEXT.French: Le missionaire de la [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]religion romaine[COLOR_REVERT] permet de répandre sa religion dans d'autres villes.
TEXT.German: Mit diesen Missionar kann die [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]römische Religion[COLOR_REVERT] in anderen Städten verbreitet werden.
TEXT.Italian: With this missionary the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Roman religion[COLOR_REVERT] can be actively spread in other cities.
TEXT.Spanish: Con este misionero la [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]religión Romana[COLOR_REVERT] puede ser difundida rápidamente en otras ciudades.

TEXT.English: With this missionary the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Sumeric religion[COLOR_REVERT] can be actively spread in other cities.
TEXT.French: Le missionaire de la [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]religion sumérienne[COLOR_REVERT] permet de répandre sa religion dans d'autres villes.
TEXT.German: Mit diesen Missionar kann die [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]sumerische Religion[COLOR_REVERT] in anderen Städten verbreitet werden.
TEXT.Italian: C
TEXT.Spanish: Con este misionero la [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]religión Sumeria[COLOR_REVERT] puede ser difundida rápidamente en otras ciudades.

TEXT.English: With this missionary the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Zoroastrian religion[COLOR_REVERT] can be actively spread in other cities.
TEXT.French: Le missionaire de la [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]religion zoroastriste[COLOR_REVERT] permet de répandre sa religion dans d'autres villes.
TEXT.German: Mit diesen Missionar kann die [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]zoroastrische Religion[COLOR_REVERT] in anderen Städten verbreitet werden.
TEXT.Italian: With this missionary the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Zoroastrian religion[COLOR_REVERT] can be actively spread in other cities.
TEXT.Spanish: Con este misionero la [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]religión Zoroástrica[COLOR_REVERT] puede ser difundida rápidamente en otras ciudades.

TEXT.English: The[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]archive[COLOR_REVERT] produces +1 [ICON_CULTURE] and increases [ICON_GOLD] and [ICON_RESEARCH] by 10%.
TEXT.French: Les [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]archives[COLOR_REVERT] générent +1 [ICON_CULTURE] et augmentent [ICON_GOLD] et [ICON_RESEARCH] pour 10%.
TEXT.German: Das [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Archiv[COLOR_REVERT] erzeugt +1 [ICON_CULTURE] und erhöht [ICON_GOLD] und [ICON_RESEARCH] um je 10%.
TEXT.Italian: The[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]archive[COLOR_REVERT] produces +1 [ICON_CULTURE] and increases [ICON_GOLD] and [ICON_RESEARCH] by 10%.
TEXT.Spanish: El [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]archivo[COLOR_REVERT] produce +1 [ICON_CULTURE] e incrementa [ICON_GOLD] y [ICON_RESEARCH] en 10%.

TEXT.English: This building is used to train [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]War Elephants[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.French: Ce bâtiment s'utilize pour trainer des [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]éléphant de guerre[COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.German: Nur mit diesem Gebäude können [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Kriegselefanten[COLOR_REVERT] aufgestellt werden.
TEXT.Italian: This building is used to train [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]War Elephants[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Spanish: Solo con este edificio los [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]elefantes de guerra[COLOR_REVERT] pueden ser desplegados.

TEXT.English: Academic buildings and writings gets burned and destroyed. Their effect gets lost.
TEXT.French: Academic buildings and writings gets burned and destroyed. Their effect gets lost.
TEXT.German: Wissenschaftliche Gebäude und Schriften werden niedergebrannt und zerstört. Ihre Wirkung geht verloren.
TEXT.Italian: Academic buildings and writings gets burned and destroyed. Their effect gets lost.
TEXT.Spanish: Los edificios y escritos academicos son quemados. Sus efectos se pierden.

TEXT.English: This building produces +1 [ICON_HAPPY].
TEXT.French: Ce bâtiment génére +1 [ICON_HAPPY].
TEXT.German: Dieses Gebäude erzeugt +1 [ICON_HAPPY].
TEXT.Italian: This building produces +1 [ICON_HAPPY].
TEXT.Spanish: Este edificio produce +1 [ICON_HAPPY].

TEXT.English: This building can only be built by the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Illyrians[COLOR_REVERT] and provides a faster and better production of ships.
TEXT.French: This building can only be built by the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Illyrians[COLOR_REVERT] and provides a faster and better production of ships.
TEXT.German: Dieses Gebäude kann nur von den [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Illyrern[COLOR_REVERT] gebaut werden und sorgt für eine schnellere und bessere Produktion von Schiffen.
TEXT.Italian: This building can only be built by the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Illyrians[COLOR_REVERT] and provides a faster and better production of ships.
TEXT.Spanish: Este edificio solo puede ser construído por los [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Ilirios[COLOR_REVERT] y provee una mejor y más rápida producción de barcos.

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT] hall of 100 columns [COLOR_REVERT] increases [ICON_CULTURE] with +8 and [ICON_HAPPY] with +1. It also reduces the maintenance of the surrounding cities and increases the [ICON_COMMERCE]
TEXT.French: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT] hall of 100 columns [COLOR_REVERT] increases [ICON_CULTURE] with +8 and [ICON_HAPPY] with +1. It also reduces the maintenance of the surrounding cities and increases the [ICON_COMMERCE]
TEXT.German: Die [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Halle der 100 Säulen[COLOR_REVERT] erhöht die [ICON_CULTURE] mit +8 und [ICON_HAPPY] mit +1. Zudem reduziert es den Unterhalt der umliegenden Städte und erhöht den [ICON_COMMERCE]
TEXT.Italian: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT] hall of 100 columns [COLOR_REVERT] increases [ICON_CULTURE] with +8 and [ICON_HAPPY] with +1. It also reduces the maintenance of the surrounding cities and increases the [ICON_COMMERCE]
TEXT.Spanish: La [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT] sala de las 100 columnas [COLOR_REVERT] aumenta [ICON_CULTURE] con +8 y [ICON_HAPPY] con +1. También reduce el mantenimiento de las ciudades circundantes e incrementa el [ICON_COMMERCE]

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Glassworks[COLOR_REVERT] produces the bonus [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]glassware[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.French: La [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Verrerie[COLOR_REVERT] fabrique de la verrerie.
TEXT.German: Die [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Glashütte[COLOR_REVERT] erzeugt das Bonusgut [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Glaswaren[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Italian: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Glassworks[COLOR_REVERT] produces the bonus [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]glassware[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Spanish: La [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]cristalería[COLOR_REVERT] produce el recurso [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]vidrio[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Ancient Observatory[COLOR_REVERT] increases [ICON_RESEARCH] by 20%. One philosopher specialist can be employed.
TEXT.French: L'[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Ancient Observatoire[COLOR_REVERT] augmente [ICON_RESEARCH] pour 20%. On peut embaucher un philosophe.
TEXT.German: Die [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Antike Sternwarte[COLOR_REVERT] erhöht den Ausstoß von [ICON_RESEARCH] um 20% und kann 1 Bürger als Philosoph einstellen.
TEXT.Italian: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Ancient Observatory[COLOR_REVERT] increases [ICON_RESEARCH] by 20%. One philosopher specialist can be employed.
TEXT.Spanish: El [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]observatorio antiguo[COLOR_REVERT] aumenta la [ICON_RESEARCH] en un 20% y permite que un ciudadano trabaje como filósofo.

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Libraries[COLOR_REVERT] provide culture and can employ one [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]philosopher[COLOR_REVERT]. They are required to build the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Ancient Academies[COLOR_REVERT], the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Great Library[COLOR_REVERT] and the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]National Epic[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.French: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Libraries[COLOR_REVERT] provide culture and can employ one [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]philosopher[COLOR_REVERT]. They are required to build the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Ancient Academies[COLOR_REVERT], the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Great Library[COLOR_REVERT] and the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]National Epic[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.German: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Bibliotheken[COLOR_REVERT] erhöhen den kulturellen Wert einer Stadt und können einen [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Philosophen[COLOR_REVERT] beschäftigen. Darüber hinaus sind sie die Voraussetzung für den Bau der Antiken Akademien, der [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Großen Bibliothek[COLOR_REVERT] und des [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Nationalepos[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Italian: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Libraries[COLOR_REVERT] provide culture and can employ one [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]philosopher[COLOR_REVERT]. They are required to build the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Ancient Academies[COLOR_REVERT], the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Great Library[COLOR_REVERT] and the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]National Epic[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Spanish: Las [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]bibliotecas[COLOR_REVERT] proveen cultura y pueden poner a trabajar un [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]científico[COLOR_REVERT]. Son requeridos para construir las [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]antiguas academias[COLOR_REVERT], la [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Gran Biblioteca[COLOR_REVERT] y la [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Epopeya Nacional[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]harbor[COLOR_REVERT] increases that citys income from trade routes and can employ one [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]merchant[COLOR_REVERT]. Some ships can be built only with a [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]harbor[COLOR_REVERT] and ships produced here are stronger.
TEXT.French: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]harbor[COLOR_REVERT] increases that citys income from trade routes and can employ one [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]merchant[COLOR_REVERT]. Some ships can be built only with a [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]harbor[COLOR_REVERT] and ships produced here are stronger.
TEXT.German: Ein [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Hafen[COLOR_REVERT] erhöht das Handelseinkommen einer Stadt und kann einen [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Händler[COLOR_REVERT] beschäftigen. Hier produzierte Schiffe sind stärker und einige Schiffe können nur hier gebaut werden.
TEXT.Italian: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]harbor[COLOR_REVERT] increases that citys income from trade routes and can employ one [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]merchant[COLOR_REVERT]. Some ships can be built only with a [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]harbor[COLOR_REVERT] and ships produced here are stronger.
TEXT.Spanish: El [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]puerto[COLOR_REVERT] aumenta los ingresos de la ciudad por rutas de comercio y puede poner a trabajar un [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]mercader[COLOR_REVERT]. Algunos barcos solo pueden ser construídos con un [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]puerto[COLOR_REVERT] y los barcos producidos aquí son mas fuertes.

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Cothon[COLOR_REVERT] replaces the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Harbour[COLOR_REVERT] and can only be build by the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Carthaginians[COLOR_REVERT] and [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Phoenicians[COLOR_REVERT]. Additionally to the characteristics of the normal harbour it permits a further [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]trade route[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.French: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Cothon[COLOR_REVERT] replaces the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Harbour[COLOR_REVERT] and can only be build by the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Carthaginians[COLOR_REVERT] and [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Phoenicians[COLOR_REVERT]. Additionally to the characteristics of the normal harbour it permits a further [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]trade route[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.German: Der [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Kothon[COLOR_REVERT] ersetzt den [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Hafen[COLOR_REVERT] und kann nur von den [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Karthagern [COLOR_REVERT]und [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Phöniziern[COLOR_REVERT] gebaut werden. Zusätzlich zu den Eigenschaften des normalen Hafens erlaubt er einen weiteren [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Handelsweg[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Italian: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Cothon[COLOR_REVERT] replaces the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Harbour[COLOR_REVERT] and can only be build by the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Carthaginians[COLOR_REVERT] and [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Phoenicians[COLOR_REVERT]. Additionally to the characteristics of the normal harbour it permits a further [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]trade route[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Spanish: El [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]cothon[COLOR_REVERT] reemplaza al [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]puerto[COLOR_REVERT] y sólo puede ser construído por los [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Cartagineses[COLOR_REVERT] y los [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Fenicios[COLOR_REVERT]. Además de las características del puerto normal permite una [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]ruta comercial[COLOR_REVERT] adicional.

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Markets[COLOR_REVERT] increase a citys wealth, can employ one [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]merchant[COLOR_REVERT] and give +1 [ICON_HAPPY] with [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]dyes[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.French: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Markets[COLOR_REVERT] increase a citys wealth, can employ one [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]merchant[COLOR_REVERT] and give +1 [ICON_HAPPY] with [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]dyes[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.German: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Märkte[COLOR_REVERT] steigern den Wohlstand einer Stadt, können einen [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Händler[COLOR_REVERT] beschäftigen und bringen +1 [ICON_HAPPY] mit [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Färbemitteln[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Italian: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Markets[COLOR_REVERT] increase a citys wealth, can employ one [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]merchant[COLOR_REVERT] and give +1 [ICON_HAPPY] with [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]dyes[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Spanish: Los [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]mercados[COLOR_REVERT] aumentan la riqueza de la ciudad, pueden poner a trabajar a un [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]mercader[COLOR_REVERT] y dan +1 [ICON_HAPPY] con [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]tintes[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Military Academies[COLOR_REVERT] increase a city's military unit production and it's defense against attacks and espionage.
TEXT.French: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Military Academies[COLOR_REVERT] increase a city's military unit production and it's defense against attacks and espionage.
TEXT.German: Die [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Militärakademie[COLOR_REVERT] erhöht die städtische Produktion militärischer Einheiten und steigert die Verteidigung einer Stadt gegen Angriffe und Spionage.
TEXT.Italian: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Military Academies[COLOR_REVERT] increase a city's military unit production and it's defense against attacks and espionage.
TEXT.Spanish: Las [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Academias Militares[COLOR_REVERT] aumentan la producción de unidades miliates de una ciudad y la defensa de una ciudad contra ataques y espionaje.

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Heroic Epic[COLOR_REVERT] can only build with a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great General[COLOR_REVERT]. It doubles its citys production when creating military units. This is useful if you expect to do a lot of fighting. It also increases its citys chances of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Artist[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.French: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Heroic Epic[COLOR_REVERT] can only build with a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great General[COLOR_REVERT]. It doubles its citys production when creating military units. This is useful if you expect to do a lot of fighting. It also increases its citys chances of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Artist[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.German: Das [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Heldenepos[COLOR_REVERT] kann nur mit einem [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Großen General[COLOR_REVERT] errichtet werden. Es verdoppelt in einer Stadt die Produktion von Militäreinheiten. Dies ist nützlich, wenn Sie heftige Kämpfe erwarten. Darüber hinaus erhöht es die Chancen einer Stadt, einen [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Großen Künstler[COLOR_REVERT] hervorzubringen.
TEXT.Italian: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Heroic Epic[COLOR_REVERT] can only build with a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great General[COLOR_REVERT]. It doubles its citys production when creating military units. This is useful if you expect to do a lot of fighting. It also increases its citys chances of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Artist[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Spanish: La [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Epopeya Heroica[COLOR_REVERT] sólo puede ser construido con un [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Gran General[COLOR_REVERT]. Dobla la producción de su ciudad cuando se crean unidades militares. Estp es útil si esperas tener un montón de combates. También aumenta las oportunidades de generar un [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Gran Artista[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.English: This building brings +1[ICON_HEALTHY] and +1[ICON_HAPPY], which allows further growth.
TEXT.French: This building brings +1[ICON_HEALTHY] and +1[ICON_HAPPY], which allows further growth.
TEXT.German: Dieses Gebäude bringt +1[ICON_HEALTHY] und +1[ICON_HAPPY], was ein weiteres Wachstum ermöglicht.
TEXT.Italian: This building brings +1[ICON_HEALTHY] and +1[ICON_HAPPY], which allows further growth.
TEXT.Spanish: Este edificio lleva +1[ICON_HEALTHY] y +1[ICON_HAPPY], lo que permite un mejor crecimiento.

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Egyptian Obelisk[COLOR_REVERT], the Egyptian replacement for the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Monument[COLOR_REVERT], provides its city with a small amount of culture and also allows the city to have 2 priest specialist.
TEXT.French: L'[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]obélisque égyptien[COLOR_REVERT], c'est-à-dire le [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Monument[COLOR_REVERT] égyptien, fournit à la ville une petite quantité de culture et lui permet d'avoir 2 prêtres.
TEXT.German: Der [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Ägyptische Obelisk[COLOR_REVERT], die ägyptische Variante des [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Monuments[COLOR_REVERT], bewirkt einen leichten Anstieg des kulturellen Werts einer Stadt und ermöglicht die Existenz von 1 Priester-Spezialisten in der jeweiligen Stadt.
TEXT.Italian: L'[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Obelisco egizio[COLOR_REVERT], l'equivalente egizio del[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]monumento[COLOR_REVERT], fornisce alla città un piccolo contributo in cultura e permette alla città stessa di avere fino a due sacerdoti.
TEXT.Spanish: El [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Obelisco egipcio[COLOR_REVERT], que reemplaza al [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Monumento[COLOR_REVERT], proporciona a su ciudad una pequeña cantidad de cultura y también le permite tener 2 sacerdotes especialistas.

TEXT.English: The fire service brings +1 [ICON_HEALTHY] and can hold slaves who bring the city each +1 [ICON_HAPPY].
TEXT.French: The fire service brings +1 [ICON_HEALTHY] and can hold slaves who bring the city each +1 [ICON_HAPPY].
TEXT.German: Die Feuerwehr bringt +1[ICON_HEALTHY] und kann Sklaven aufnehmen, welche der Stadt jeweils +1[ICON_HAPPY] bringen.
TEXT.Italian: The fire service brings +1 [ICON_HEALTHY] and can hold slaves who bring the city each +1 [ICON_HAPPY].
TEXT.Spanish: El servicio de bomberos lleva +1 [ICON_HEALTHY] y puede mantener esclavos que lleva a la ciudad +1 [ICON_HAPPY] cada uno.

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Hammurabi's Code[COLOR_REVERT] is the Babylonian replacement for the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]National Epic[COLOR_REVERT]. Building [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Hammurabi's Code[COLOR_REVERT] increases the cities [ICON_RESEARCH], [ICON_CULTURE] and [ICON_ESPIONAGE] at the expense of more Maintenance. It also makes its city more likley to generate a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Spy[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.French: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Hammurabi's Code[COLOR_REVERT] is the Babylonian replacement for the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]National Epic[COLOR_REVERT]. Building [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Hammurabi's Code[COLOR_REVERT] increases the cities [ICON_RESEARCH], [ICON_CULTURE] and [ICON_ESPIONAGE] at the expense of more Maintenance. It also makes its city more likley to generate a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Spy[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.German: Der [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Codex Hammurabi[COLOR_REVERT] ersetzt das nationale Wunder des [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Nationalen Epos[COLOR_REVERT] für Babylonien. Der Bau des [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Codex Hammurabi[COLOR_REVERT] erhöht in allen Städten [ICON_RESEARCH], [ICON_CULTURE] und [ICON_ESPIONAGE], benötigt aber dafür mehr Unterhalt. Weiters wird die Wahrscheinlichkeit erhöht einen [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Großen Spion[COLOR_REVERT] zu erhalten.
TEXT.Italian: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Hammurabi's Code[COLOR_REVERT] is the Babylonian replacement for the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]National Epic[COLOR_REVERT]. Building [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Hammurabi's Code[COLOR_REVERT] increases the cities [ICON_RESEARCH], [ICON_CULTURE] and [ICON_ESPIONAGE] at the expense of more Maintenance. It also makes its city more likley to generate a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Spy[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Spanish: El [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Código de Hammurabi[COLOR_REVERT] es el reemplazo babilonio para la [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Epopeya Nacional[COLOR_REVERT]. El edificio [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Código de Hammurabi[COLOR_REVERT] aumenta la [ICON_RESEARCH], [ICON_CULTURE] y [ICON_ESPIONAGE] de las ciudades a expensas de mas mantenimiento. También hace que la ciudad sea mas propensa de generar un [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Gran Espía[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.English: This wonder increases the cultural value and adds an additional trade route to the city.
TEXT.French: This wonder increases the cultural value and adds an additional trade route to the city.
TEXT.German: Dieses Wunder erhöht den kulturellen Wert der Stadt und fügt einen zusätzlichen Handelsweg hinzu.
TEXT.Italian: This wonder increases the cultural value and adds an additional trade route to the city.
TEXT.Spanish: Esta maravilla aumenta el valor cultural y añade una ruta comercial adicional a la ciudad.

TEXT.English: A dwelling hill increases the defense and health in a city and creates a hill.
TEXT.French: A dwelling hill increases the defense and health in a city and creates a hill.
TEXT.German: Eine Warft verbessert die Verteidigung und Gesundheit einer Stadt und erzeugt einen Hügel.
TEXT.Italian: A dwelling hill increases the defense and health in a city and creates a hill.
TEXT.Spanish: Una vivienda colina aumenta la defensa y salud en una ciudad y crea una colina.

TEXT.English: This wonder adds two trade routes to your city.
TEXT.French: This wonder adds two trade routes to your city.
TEXT.German: Mit diesem Wunder werden 2 neue Handelswege erschlossen.
TEXT.Italian: This wonder adds two trade routes to your city.
TEXT.Spanish: Esta maravilla añade dos rutas comerciales a tu ciudad.

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]pantheon[COLOR_REVERT] increases the cultural value of a city.
TEXT.French: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]pantheon[COLOR_REVERT] increases the cultural value of a city.
TEXT.German: Das [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Pantheon[COLOR_REVERT] steigert den kulturellen Wert einer Stadt.
TEXT.Italian: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]pantheon[COLOR_REVERT] increases the cultural value of a city.
TEXT.Spanish: El [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Panteón[COLOR_REVERT] aumenta el valor cultural de una ciudad.

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Colosseum[COLOR_REVERT] wipes out any discontent in the city.
TEXT.French: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Colosseum[COLOR_REVERT] wipes out any discontent in the city.
TEXT.German: Das [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Kolosseum[COLOR_REVERT] tilgt jegliche Unzufriedenheit in der Stadt.
TEXT.Italian: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Colosseum[COLOR_REVERT] wipes out any discontent in the city.
TEXT.Spanish: El [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Coliseo[COLOR_REVERT] hace desapercer todo descontento en la ciudad.

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Walls of Babylon[COLOR_REVERT] increase the defense value of the city and are extremely boosting the trade revenues.
TEXT.French: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Walls of Babylon[COLOR_REVERT] increase the defense value of the city and are extremely boosting the trade revenues.
TEXT.German: Die [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Mauern Babylons[COLOR_REVERT] erhöhen den Verteidigungswert der Stadt und kurbeln die Handelseinnahmen an.
TEXT.Italian: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Walls of Babylon[COLOR_REVERT] increase the defense value of the city and are extremely boosting the trade revenues.
TEXT.Spanish: Las [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Murallas de Babilonia[COLOR_REVERT] aumenta el valor defensivo de la ciudad e incrementan sumamente los ingresos comerciales.

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Labyrinth of Knossos[COLOR_REVERT] increases the defense value of the city and provides land units an additional experience bonus of +2.
TEXT.French: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Labyrinth of Knossos[COLOR_REVERT] increases the defense value of the city and provides land units an additional experience bonus of +2.
TEXT.German: Das [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Labyrinth von Knossos[COLOR_REVERT] erhöht den Verteidigungswert der Stadt und liefert Landeinheiten einen zusätzlichen Erfahrungsbonus von +2.
TEXT.Italian: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Labyrinth of Knossos[COLOR_REVERT] increases the defense value of the city and provides land units an additional experience bonus of +2.
TEXT.Spanish: El [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Laberinto de Knossos[COLOR_REVERT] aumenta el valor defensivo de la ciudad y provee a las unidades terrestres un bonus adicional de experiencia de +2.

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]naval port[COLOR_REVERT] speeds up the construction of ships and provides an additional experience bonus of +2.
TEXT.French: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]naval port[COLOR_REVERT] speeds up the construction of ships and provides an additional experience bonus of +2.
TEXT.German: Der [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Kriegshafen[COLOR_REVERT] beschleunigt den Bau der Schiffe und liefert einen zusätzlichen Erfahrungsbonus von +2.
TEXT.Italian: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]naval port[COLOR_REVERT] speeds up the construction of ships and provides an additional experience bonus of +2.
TEXT.Spanish: El [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]puerto naval[COLOR_REVERT] acelera la construcción de barcos y provee un bonus de experiencia adicional de +2.

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Altar of Pergamon[COLOR_REVERT] increases the war-weariness of the enemies and the cultural prestige of the city.
TEXT.French: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Altar of Pergamon[COLOR_REVERT] increases the war-weariness of the enemies and the cultural prestige of the city.
TEXT.German: Der [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Pergamonaltar[COLOR_REVERT] erhöht den Kriegsverdruss der Gegner und steigert das kulturelle Ansehen der Stadt.
TEXT.Italian: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Altar of Pergamon[COLOR_REVERT] increases the war-weariness of the enemies and the cultural prestige of the city.
TEXT.Spanish: El [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Altar de Pérgamo[COLOR_REVERT] aumenta el hastío bélico de los enemigos y el prestigio cultural de la ciudad.

TEXT.English: A [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Mint[COLOR_REVERT] increases the ecomomy of your empire!
TEXT.French: A [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Mint[COLOR_REVERT] increases the ecomomy of your empire!
TEXT.German: Eine [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Münzpräge[COLOR_REVERT] steigert die Wirtschaft Eures Reiches!
TEXT.Italian: A [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Mint[COLOR_REVERT] increases the ecomomy of your empire!
TEXT.Spanish: ¡Una [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]ceca[COLOR_REVERT] aumenta la economía de tu imperio!

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]papyrus export post[COLOR_REVERT] works up [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Cyperus Papyrus[COLOR_REVERT] into tradeable [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]papyrus[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.French: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]papyrus export post[COLOR_REVERT] works up [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Cyperus Papyrus[COLOR_REVERT] into tradeable [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]papyrus[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.German: Der [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Papyrus-Exportposten[COLOR_REVERT] verarbeitet [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Cyperus Papyrus[COLOR_REVERT] in das handelbare [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Papyrus[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Italian: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]papyrus export post[COLOR_REVERT] works up [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Cyperus Papyrus[COLOR_REVERT] into tradeable [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]papyrus[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Spanish: El [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]puesto de exportación de papiros[COLOR_REVERT] transforma [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Cyperus Papyrus[COLOR_REVERT] en [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]papiros[COLOR_REVERT] comerciables.

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]school[COLOR_REVERT] increases a city's research and provides culture. They are required to build the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Academy[COLOR_REVERT]. In schools slaves can be employed as teachers.
TEXT.French: L'[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]ecole[COLOR_REVERT] améliore la recherche et produit de la culture. Ils sont nécessaires pour construire l'[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]academie[COLOR_REVERT]. In schools slaves can be employed as teachers.
TEXT.German: Die [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Schule[COLOR_REVERT] erhöht den kulturellen Wert einer Stadt und beschleunigt die Forschung. Darüber hinaus sind sie die Voraussetzung für den Bau der [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Akademie[COLOR_REVERT]. In Schulen können Sklaven als Lehrer angestellt werden.
TEXT.Italian: La [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]scuola[COLOR_REVERT] aumenta la ricerca e la cultura della città. They are required to build the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Academy[COLOR_REVERT]. In schools slaves can be employed as teachers.
TEXT.Spanish: La [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]escuela[COLOR_REVERT] aumenta la investigación de la ciudad y proporcionan cultura. Son requeridos para construir la [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Academia[COLOR_REVERT]. En las escuelas los esclavos pueden trabajar como profesores.

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]gymnasium[COLOR_REVERT] increases a city's research and provides culture. They are required to build the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Academy[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.French: Le [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]gymnasium[COLOR_REVERT] améliore la recherche et produit de la culture. Ils sont nécessaires pour construire l'[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]academie[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.German: Das [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Gymnasion[COLOR_REVERT] erhöht den kulturellen Wert einer Stadt und beschleunigt die Forschung. Darüber hinaus sind sie die Voraussetzung für den Bau der [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Akademie[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Italian: Il [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]gymnasium[COLOR_REVERT] aumenta la ricerca e la cultura della città. They are required to build the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Academy[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Spanish: Los [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]gymnasium[COLOR_REVERT] aumentan la investigación de la ciudad y proporcionan cultura. Son requeridos para construir la [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Academia[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.English: This building increases the defense value of a city.
TEXT.French: This building increases the defense value of a city.
TEXT.German: Dieses Gebäude erhöht den Verteidigungswert einer Stadt.
TEXT.Italian: This building increases the defense value of a city.
TEXT.Spanish: Este edificio aumenta el valor defensivo de una ciudad.

TEXT.English: With [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Stables[COLOR_REVERT] you are able to train mounted units.
TEXT.French: With [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Stables[COLOR_REVERT] you are able to train mounted units.
TEXT.German: Durch [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Stallungen[COLOR_REVERT] können berittene Einheiten ausgebildet werden.
TEXT.Italian: With [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Stables[COLOR_REVERT] you are able to train mounted units.
TEXT.Spanish: Con [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Establos[COLOR_REVERT] puedes entrenar unidades montadas.

TEXT.English: This building provides a small amount of culture in a city.
TEXT.French: This building provides a small amount of culture in a city.
TEXT.German: Dieses Gebäude erhöht den kulturellen Wert einer Stadt.
TEXT.Italian: This building provides a small amount of culture in a city.
TEXT.Spanish: Este edificio provee una pequeña cantidad de cultura en una ciudad.

TEXT.English: The building [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]saline[COLOR_REVERT] delivers the bonus resource of salt.
TEXT.French: The building [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]saline[COLOR_REVERT] delivers the bonus resource of salt.
TEXT.German: Das Gebäude [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Saline[COLOR_REVERT] liefert das Bonusgut Salz.
TEXT.Italian: The building [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]saline[COLOR_REVERT] delivers the bonus resource of salt.
TEXT.Spanish: El edificio [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]salina[COLOR_REVERT] reparte el recurso de sal.

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Cisterns[COLOR_REVERT] increase the growth of a city.
TEXT.French: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Cisterns[COLOR_REVERT] increase the growth of a city.
TEXT.German: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Zisternen[COLOR_REVERT] erhöhen das Wachstum einer Stadt.
TEXT.Italian: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Cisterns[COLOR_REVERT] increase the growth of a city.
TEXT.Spanish: Las [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Cisternas[COLOR_REVERT] aumentan el crecimiento de una ciudad.

TEXT.English: A [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Siege Workshop[COLOR_REVERT] is required to build [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]catapults[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.French: A [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Siege Workshop[COLOR_REVERT] is required to build [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]catapults[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.German: Eine [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Belagerungswerkstatt[COLOR_REVERT] ist Voraussetzung für den Bau von [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Katapulten[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Italian: A [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Siege Workshop[COLOR_REVERT] is required to build [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]catapults[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Spanish: Un [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Taller de armas de asedio[COLOR_REVERT] es requerido para construir [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]catapultas[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Troglodytes[COLOR_REVERT] provide the residents a good protection against attackers.
TEXT.French: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Troglodytes[COLOR_REVERT] provide the residents a good protection against attackers.
TEXT.German: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Troglodyten[COLOR_REVERT] bieten den Bewohnern einen guten Schutz gegen Angreifer.
TEXT.Italian: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Troglodytes[COLOR_REVERT] provide the residents a good protection against attackers.
TEXT.Spanish: Los [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Trogloditas[COLOR_REVERT] provee a los habitantes una buena protección contra atacantes.

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Provincial Palace[COLOR_REVERT] lowers the surrounding cities and allows the construction of [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Auxiliaries[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.French: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Provincial Palace[COLOR_REVERT] lowers the surrounding cities and allows the construction of [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Auxiliaries[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.German: Der [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Provinzpalast[COLOR_REVERT] senkt die Verwaltungskosten umliegender Städte und kann [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Hilfstruppen[COLOR_REVERT] ausbilden.
TEXT.Italian: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Provincial Palace[COLOR_REVERT] lowers the surrounding cities and allows the construction of [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Auxiliaries[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Spanish: El [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Palacio Provincial[COLOR_REVERT] reduce los costes de mantenimiento de las ciudades circundantes y permite la construcción de [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Auxiliares[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Bronze Foundry[COLOR_REVERT] is required to build better units.
TEXT.French: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Bronze Foundry[COLOR_REVERT] is required to build better units.
TEXT.German: Die [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Bronzeschmiede[COLOR_REVERT] ist Voraussetzung für den Bau besserer Einheiten.
TEXT.Italian: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Bronze Foundry[COLOR_REVERT] is required to build better units.
TEXT.Spanish: La [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Fundición de Bronce[COLOR_REVERT] es reuerida para construir mejores unidades.

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Acropolis[COLOR_REVERT] is a powerful defense of the ancient Greeks.
TEXT.French: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Acropolis[COLOR_REVERT] is a powerful defense of the ancient Greeks.
TEXT.German: Die [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Akropolis[COLOR_REVERT] ist eine mächtige Verteidigungsanlagen der antiken Griechen.
TEXT.Italian: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Acropolis[COLOR_REVERT] is a powerful defense of the ancient Greeks.
TEXT.Spanish: La [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Acrópolis[COLOR_REVERT] es una poderosa defensa de los antiguos griegos.

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Palisades[COLOR_REVERT] are the first possible defense building and necessary for the construction of [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]City Walls[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.French: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Palisades[COLOR_REVERT] are the first possible defense building and necessary for the construction of [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]City Walls[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.German: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Palisaden[COLOR_REVERT] sind die ersten Verteidigungsanlagen und notwendig für den Bau von [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Stadtmauern[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Italian: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Palisades[COLOR_REVERT] are the first possible defense building and necessary for the construction of [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]City Walls[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Spanish: Las [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Empalizadas[COLOR_REVERT] son los primeros edificios defensivos y necesarios para la construcción de las [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Murallas de la Ciudad[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Administrative buildings[COLOR_REVERT] lower city maintenance costs and provide you with a bonus to espionage. [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Administrative buildings[COLOR_REVERT] help manage the cost of controlling large empires.
TEXT.French: Les [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Administrative buildings[COLOR_REVERT] réduisent le coût d'entretien des villes, procurent un bonus en espionnage et facilitent la gestion des grands empires.
TEXT.German: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Verwaltungsgebäude[COLOR_REVERT] senken die Verwaltungskosten einer Stadt und gewähren einen Spionagebonus. [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Verwaltungsgebäude[COLOR_REVERT] erleichtern die Verwaltung der Kosten großer Reiche.
TEXT.Italian: I [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Administrative buildings[COLOR_REVERT] riducono i costi di mantenimento e danno un bonus di Spionaggio. I [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Administrative buildings[COLOR_REVERT] aiutano a ridurre il costo del controllo sugli imperi più vasti.
TEXT.Spanish: Los [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]edificios administrativos[COLOR_REVERT] reducen los costes de mantenimiento de la ciudad y proporcionan una bonificación al espionaje. Los Edificios administrativos ayudan a gestionar el coste que supone controlar grandes imperios.

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Forts[COLOR_REVERT] increase your city's defenses. Build them in cities near enemy civilizations.
TEXT.French: Les [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Forts[COLOR_REVERT] améliorent les défenses de la ville. Construisez-les dans les villes à proximité des civilisations ennemies.
TEXT.German: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Forts[COLOR_REVERT] verbessern den Verteidigungswert einer Stadt. Errichten Sie Forts in der Nähe feindlicher Zivilisationen.
TEXT.Italian: Il [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Forts[COLOR_REVERT] potenzia le difese di una città. Costruiscilo nelle città vicine alle civiltà nemiche.
TEXT.Spanish: Los [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Fuertes[COLOR_REVERT] aumentan las defensas de la ciudad. Constrúyelos cerca de las civilizaciones enemigas.

TEXT.English: For the construction of the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Temple of Isis[COLOR_REVERT], the Cult of Isis must be distributed in the city.
TEXT.French: For the construction of the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Temple of Isis[COLOR_REVERT], the Cult of Isis must be distributed in the city.
TEXT.German: Für den Bau des [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Isistempels[COLOR_REVERT], muss der Isis-Kult in der Stadt verbreitet sein.
TEXT.Italian: For the construction of the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Temple of Isis[COLOR_REVERT], the Cult of Isis must be distributed in the city.
TEXT.Spanish: Para la construcción del [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Templo de Isis[COLOR_REVERT], el culto de Isis debe estar presente en la ciudad.

TEXT.English: For the construction of a [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]manufactory[COLOR_REVERT], the Cybele cult must be distributed in the city.
TEXT.French: For the construction of a [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]manufactory[COLOR_REVERT], the Cybele cult must be distributed in the city.
TEXT.German: Für den Bau einer [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Manufaktur[COLOR_REVERT], muss der Cybele-Kult in der Stadt verbreitet sein.
TEXT.Italian: For the construction of a [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]manufactory[COLOR_REVERT], the Cybele cult must be distributed in the city.
TEXT.Spanish: Para la construcción de una [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]manufactoría[COLOR_REVERT], el culto de Cibeles debe estar presente en la ciudad.

TEXT.English: For the construction of a [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]mausoleum[COLOR_REVERT], the cult of heroes must be distributed in the city.
TEXT.French: For the construction of a [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]mausoleum[COLOR_REVERT], the cult of heroes must be distributed in the city.
