TEXT.German: Für den Bau eines [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Mausoleums[COLOR_REVERT], muss der Heroenkult in der Stadt verbreitet sein.
TEXT.Italian: For the construction of a [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]mausoleum[COLOR_REVERT], the cult of heroes must be distributed in the city.
TEXT.Spanish: Para la construcción de un [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]mausoleo[COLOR_REVERT], el culto de héroes debe estar presente en la ciudad.

TEXT.English: For the construction of the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Mouseion[COLOR_REVERT], cosmogony must be distributed in the city.
TEXT.French: For the construction of the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Mouseion[COLOR_REVERT], cosmogony must be distributed in the city.
TEXT.German: Für den Bau des [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Museion[COLOR_REVERT], muss die Kosmogonie in der Stadt verbreitet sein.
TEXT.Italian: For the construction of the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Mouseion[COLOR_REVERT], cosmogony must be distributed in the city.
TEXT.Spanish: Para la construcción del [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Mouseion[COLOR_REVERT], cosmogonía debe estar presente en la ciudad.

TEXT.English: For the construction of a [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]serapeum[COLOR_REVERT], Hellenism must be distributed in the city.
TEXT.French: For the construction of a [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]serapeum[COLOR_REVERT], Hellenism must be distributed in the city.
TEXT.German: Für den Bau eines [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Serapeums[COLOR_REVERT], muss der Hellenismus in der Stadt verbreitet sein.
TEXT.Italian: For the construction of a [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]serapeum[COLOR_REVERT], Hellenism must be distributed in the city.
TEXT.Spanish: Para la construcción de un [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]serapeum[COLOR_REVERT], el Helenismo debe estar presente en la ciudad.

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Ishtar Gate[COLOR_REVERT] is extremely boosting the trade revenues.
TEXT.French: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Ishtar Gate[COLOR_REVERT] is extremely boosting the trade revenues.
TEXT.German: Das [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Ishtar-Tor[COLOR_REVERT] kurbelt die Handelseinnahmen extrem an.
TEXT.Italian: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Ishtar Gate[COLOR_REVERT] is extremely boosting the trade revenues.
TEXT.Spanish: La [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Puerta de Ishtar[COLOR_REVERT] incrementa sumamente los ingresos comerciales.

TEXT.English: These [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]broad walls[COLOR_REVERT] provide a better defence than normal tall walls.
TEXT.French: These [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]broad walls[COLOR_REVERT] provide a better defence than normal tall walls.
TEXT.German: Diese [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]breiten Mauern[COLOR_REVERT] bringen mehr Verteidigungspunkte als normale hohe Mauern.
TEXT.Italian: These [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]broad walls[COLOR_REVERT] provide a better defence than normal tall walls.
TEXT.Spanish: Estas [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]murallas anchas[COLOR_REVERT] proporcionan una mejor defensa que las normales murallas altas.

TEXT.English: The beautiful and great [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Ishtar Walls[COLOR_REVERT] provide a better defence than normal tall walls and give an additional culture bonus.
TEXT.French: The beautiful and great [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Ishtar Walls[COLOR_REVERT] provide a better defence than normal tall walls and give an additional culture bonus.
TEXT.German: Die fabelhaft verzierte und imposante [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Ishtar-Mauer[COLOR_REVERT] bringt mehr Verteidigungs- und Kulturpunkte als normale Hohe Mauern.
TEXT.Italian: The beautiful and great [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Ishtar Walls[COLOR_REVERT] provide a better defence than normal tall walls and give an additional culture bonus.
TEXT.Spanish: Las grandes y hermosas [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Murallas de Ishtar[COLOR_REVERT] proporcionan una mejor defensa que las normales murallas altas y dan una bonificacion de culltura adicional.

TEXT.English: With a [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]vintager[COLOR_REVERT], a winery with an additional bonus resource of grapes can occur next to the city (chance of 50%).
TEXT.French: With a [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]vintager[COLOR_REVERT], a winery with an additional bonus resource of grapes can occur next to the city (chance of 50%).
TEXT.German: Mit dem [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Winzer[COLOR_REVERT] kann in der Nähe der Stadt ein Weingut mit einer zusätzlichen Bonusressource Trauben entstehen (Chance 50%).
TEXT.Italian: With a [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]vintager[COLOR_REVERT], a winery with an additional bonus resource of grapes can occur next to the city (chance of 50%).
TEXT.Spanish: Con un [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]viticultor[COLOR_REVERT], una bodega con un recurso adicional de uvas puede aparecer cerca de la ciudad (posibilidad del 50%).

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]curing hut[COLOR_REVERT] is able to cure fish and meat. This cured food has a positive effect on the health of your city population.
TEXT.French: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]curing hut[COLOR_REVERT] is able to cure fish and meat. This cured food has a positive effect on the health of your city population.
TEXT.German: Mit der [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Räucherhütte[COLOR_REVERT] kann Fisch und Fleisch länger haltbar gemacht werden, was sich positiv auf die Gesundheit der Bevölkerung auswirkt.
TEXT.Italian: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]curing hut[COLOR_REVERT] is able to cure fish and meat. This cured food has a positive effect on the health of your city population.
TEXT.Spanish: El [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]ahumadero[COLOR_REVERT] puede ahumar pescado y carne. Esta carne ahumada tiene un efecto positivo en la salud de la población de tu ciudad.

TEXT.English: With a [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]mercenary post[COLOR_REVERT] you are able to create certain units.
TEXT.French: With a [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]mercenary post[COLOR_REVERT] you are able to create certain units.
TEXT.German: Mit einem [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Söldnerposten[COLOR_REVERT] können bestimmte Einheiten ausgebildet werden.
TEXT.Italian: With a [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]mercenary post[COLOR_REVERT] you are able to create certain units.
TEXT.Spanish: Con un [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]puesto mercenario[COLOR_REVERT] podrás crear ciertas unidades.

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]trading post[COLOR_REVERT] is only available after the project "The Silk Road" was completed. It adds +1 trade route to the city.
TEXT.French: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]trading post[COLOR_REVERT] is only available after the project "The Silk Road" was completed. It adds +1 trade route to the city.
TEXT.German: Der [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Handelsposten[COLOR_REVERT] ist erst dann verfügbar, wenn das Projekt "Die Seidenstraße" fertiggestellt wurde. Es bringt +1 Handelsweg in die Stadt.
TEXT.Italian: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]trading post[COLOR_REVERT] is only available after the project "The Silk Road" was completed. It adds +1 trade route to the city.
TEXT.Spanish: El [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]puesto comercial[COLOR_REVERT] solo esta disponible después de que el projecto "La Ruta de la Seda" sea completado. Añade +1 ruta comercial a la ciudad.

TEXT.English: The creator receives a Great Prophet and 10 jewish missionaries.
TEXT.French: The creator receives a Great Prophet and 10 jewish missionaries.
TEXT.German: Der Erschaffer erhält einen großen Propheten und 10 jüdische Missionare.
TEXT.Italian: The creator receives a Great Prophet and 10 jewish missionaries.
TEXT.Spanish: El creador recibe un Gran Profeta y 10 misioneros judíos.

TEXT.English: The creator receives +4 diplomatic advantages (plus points) to all his well-known civilizations.
TEXT.French: The creator receives +4 diplomatic advantages (plus points) to all his well-known civilizations.
TEXT.German: Der Erschaffer erhält +4 Diplomatie-Pluspunkte bei allen ihn bekannten Zivilisationen.
TEXT.Italian: The creator receives +4 diplomatic advantages (plus points) to all his well-known civilizations.
TEXT.Spanish: El creador recibe +4 ventajas diplomáticas (puntos positivos) para todas sus civilizaciones conocidas.

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Bible translation[COLOR_REVERT] brings +1 happiness to all cities.
TEXT.French: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Bible translation[COLOR_REVERT] brings +1 happiness to all cities.
TEXT.German: Die [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Bibelübersetzung[COLOR_REVERT] bringt allen Städten einen Zufriedenheitsbonus.
TEXT.Italian: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Bible translation[COLOR_REVERT] brings +1 happiness to all cities.
TEXT.Spanish: La [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]traducción de la Biblia[COLOR_REVERT] lleva +1 de felicidad a todas las ciudades.

TEXT.English: The creator of the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Bible[COLOR_REVERT] receives 12 christian missionaries (apostles).
TEXT.French: Les créateurs de la [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT] Bible [COLOR_REVERT] reçoit 12 missionnaires chrétiens (apôtres).
TEXT.German: Der Erschaffer der [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Bibel[COLOR_REVERT] erhält 12 christliche Missionare (Apostel).
TEXT.Italian: I creatori del [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT] Bible [COLOR_REVERT] riceve 12 missionari cristiani (apostoli).
TEXT.Spanish: El creador de la [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Biblia[COLOR_REVERT] recibe 12 misioneros cristianos (apóstolos).

TEXT.English: This wonder boosts your cities' research and provides culture.
TEXT.French: Cette merveille améliore la recherche et génère de la culture.
TEXT.German: Dieses Wunder erhöht den kulturellen Wert einer Stadt und beschleunigt die Forschung spürbar.
TEXT.Italian: Le miracolo aumentano la ricerca e la cultura delle città.
TEXT.Spanish: Esta maravilla impulsa la investigación de tus ciudades y proporciona cultura.

TEXT.English: This building reduces war weariness and provides cultural points!
TEXT.French: This building reduces war weariness and provides cultural points!
TEXT.German: Dieses Gebäude verringert die Kriegsmüdigkeit und liefert Kulturpunkte!
TEXT.Italian: This building reduces war weariness and provides cultural points!
TEXT.Spanish: ¡Este edificio reduce el hastío bélico y proporciona puntos culturales!

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Abu Simbel[COLOR_REVERT] increases its builder's Golden Ages by 25%.
TEXT.French: Le [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Abu Simbel[COLOR_REVERT] augmente de 25% la durée de l'âge d'or de son constructeur.
TEXT.German: Das [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Abu Simbel[COLOR_REVERT] verlängert das Goldene Zeitalter seines Erbauers um 25%.
TEXT.Italian: Il [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Abu Simbel[COLOR_REVERT] aumenta del 25% le Età dell'oro del suo costruttore.
TEXT.Spanish: El [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Abu Simbel[COLOR_REVERT] aumenta en un 25% las edades de oro de quien lo construya.

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Great Sphinx[COLOR_REVERT] increases war weariness in the cities of those who go to war against its builder.
TEXT.French: La [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Sphinx[COLOR_REVERT] augmente la lassitude de guerre dans les villes des joueurs en guerre contre son constructeur.
TEXT.German: Der [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]große Sphinx[COLOR_REVERT] erhöht die Kriegsmüdigkeit in Städten, die gegen den Erbauer in den Krieg ziehen.
TEXT.Italian: La [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Sphinx[COLOR_REVERT] aumenta la stanchezza della guerra in coloro che combattono contro il suo costruttore.
TEXT.Spanish: La [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Esfinge[COLOR_REVERT] aumenta el hastío bélico en las ciudades de quienes vayan contra quien la construya.

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Oracle[COLOR_REVERT] provides a research boost and predicts natural disasters.
TEXT.French: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Oracle[COLOR_REVERT] provides a research boost and predicts natural disasters.
TEXT.German: Das [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Orakel[COLOR_REVERT] bringt einen Forschungsboost und prophezeit Naturkatastropen.
TEXT.Italian: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Oracle[COLOR_REVERT] provides a research boost and predicts natural disasters.
TEXT.Spanish: El [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Oráculo[COLOR_REVERT] proporciona un empuje a la investigación y predice desastres naturales.

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Shrine of Enlil[COLOR_REVERT] gives the builder one free technology advance, and it provides a regional recovery.
TEXT.French: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Shrine of Enlil[COLOR_REVERT] gives the builder one free technology advance, and it provides a regional recovery.
TEXT.German: Bauen Sie den [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Haupttempel des Enlil[COLOR_REVERT], erhalten Sie eine kostenlose Technologie und ermöglichen einen regionalen Aufschwung.
TEXT.Italian: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Shrine of Enlil[COLOR_REVERT] gives the builder one free technology advance, and it provides a regional recovery.
TEXT.Spanish: El [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Santuario de Enlil[COLOR_REVERT] da al constructor un avance tecnológico gratis, y proporcion un auge regional.

TEXT.English: A [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]leper colony[COLOR_REVERT] prevends a high population loss in a city, during a leprosy outbreak.
TEXT.French: Une [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]léproserie[COLOR_REVERT] permet d'éviter une perte de population trop importante pendant une épidémie de lèpre.
TEXT.German: Eine [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Leprakolonie[COLOR_REVERT] verhindert ein extremes Bevölkerungssterben in einer Stadt, sobald eine Lepraepidemie ausbricht.
TEXT.Italian: A [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]leper colony[COLOR_REVERT] prevends a high population loss in a city, during a leprosy outbreak.
TEXT.Spanish: Una [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]leprosería[COLOR_REVERT] previene grandes pérdidas de población en una ciudad, durante una epidemia de lepra.

TEXT.English: A [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]castra[COLOR_REVERT] extremely pulls your city defences. Castras should be built in boundary cities.
TEXT.French: A [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]castra[COLOR_REVERT] extremely pulls your city defences. Castras should be built in boundary cities.
TEXT.German: Ein [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Kastell[COLOR_REVERT] verstärkt die Stadtverteidigung emmens. Kastelle sollten an Grenzstädten errichtet werden.
TEXT.Italian: A [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]castra[COLOR_REVERT] extremely pulls your city defences. Castras should be built in boundary cities.
TEXT.Spanish: Un [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]castrum[COLOR_REVERT] formatalece las defensas de tu ciudad. Los castrum deben ser construídos en ciudades fronterizas.

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Circus Maximus[COLOR_REVERT] gives +2 [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]experience points[COLOR_REVERT] for your mounted units and adds 1 happy citizen to your cities.
TEXT.French: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Circus Maximus[COLOR_REVERT] gives +2 [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]experience points[COLOR_REVERT] for your mounted units and adds 1 happy citizen to your cities.
TEXT.German: Mit dem [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Circus Maximus[COLOR_REVERT] erhalten Eure berittenen Einheiten +2 Erfahrungspunkte und macht jede Stadt um 1 Bürger glücklich.
TEXT.Italian: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Circus Maximus[COLOR_REVERT] gives +2 [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]experience points[COLOR_REVERT] for your mounted units and adds 1 happy citizen to your cities.
TEXT.Spanish: El [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Circo Máximo[COLOR_REVERT] da +2 [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]puntos de experiencia[COLOR_REVERT] para tus unidades montadas y añade 1 ciudadano feliz a tus ciudades.

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]slave market[COLOR_REVERT] provides the most important resource of ancient times: [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Slaves[COLOR_REVERT]. A slave market can only be built by slaves. In a city with a slave market, slaves can be sold, but beware: a slave market also brings +1 [ICON_UNHAPPY].
TEXT.French: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]slave market[COLOR_REVERT] provides the most important resource of ancient times: [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Slaves[COLOR_REVERT]. A slave market can only be built by slaves. In a city with a slave market, slaves can be sold, but beware: a slave market also brings +1 [ICON_UNHAPPY].
TEXT.German: Der [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Sklavenmarkt[COLOR_REVERT] erzeugt das in der Antike wohl wichtigste Bonusgut: [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Sklaven[COLOR_REVERT]. Ein Sklavenmarkt kann nur von Sklaven errichtet werden. In einer Stadt mit einem Sklavenmarkt, können Sklaven verkauft werden, aber Vorsicht: ein Sklavenmarkt bringt auch +1 [ICON_UNHAPPY].
TEXT.Italian: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]slave market[COLOR_REVERT] provides the most important resource of ancient times: [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Slaves[COLOR_REVERT]. A slave market can only be built by slaves. In a city with a slave market, slaves can be sold, but beware: a slave market also brings +1 [ICON_UNHAPPY].
TEXT.Spanish: El [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]mercado de esclavos[COLOR_REVERT] proporciona el recurso más importante de la antigüedad: [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Esclavos[COLOR_REVERT]. Un mercado de esclavos sólo puede ser construido por esclavos. En una ciudad con un mercado de esclavos, los esclavos pueden ser vendidos, pero cuidado: un mercado de esclavos también conlleva +1 [ICON_UNHAPPY].

TEXT.English: A [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]gladiator school[COLOR_REVERT] can produce a gladiator unit with a chance of 10% every 5 turns.
TEXT.French: A [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]gladiator school[COLOR_REVERT] can produce a gladiator unit with a chance of 10% every 5 turns.
TEXT.German: Eine [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Gladiatorenschule[COLOR_REVERT] kann alle 5 Runden mit einer Wahrscheinlichkeit von 10% angesiedelte Gladiatoren zu Einheiten machen.
TEXT.Italian: A [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]gladiator school[COLOR_REVERT] can produce a gladiator unit with a chance of 10% every 5 turns.
TEXT.Spanish: Una [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]escuela de gladiadores[COLOR_REVERT] puede producir una unidad de gladiador con una oprtunidad del 10% cada 5 turnos.

TEXT.English: With this building all the surrounding swamps are drained and health increases. However, the maintenance of such systems has its price.
TEXT.French: With this building all the surrounding swamps are drained and health increases. However, the maintenance of such systems has its price.
TEXT.German: Durch dieses Gebäude werden alle umliegenden Sümpfe trocken gelegt und das erhöht die Gesundheit. Die Instandhaltung solcher Anlagen hat aber auch ihren Preis.
TEXT.Italian: With this building all the surrounding swamps are drained and health increases. However, the maintenance of such systems has its price.
TEXT.Spanish: Con este edificio todos los pantanos circundantes son drenados y la salud aumenta. Aunque el mantenimiento de dichos sistemas tiene su precio.

TEXT.English: A [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Brothel[COLOR_REVERT] increases happiness by one and with [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Slaves[COLOR_REVERT] you are able to increase its culture value by 1 per slave (maximum of 5).
TEXT.French: A [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Brothel[COLOR_REVERT] increases happiness by one and with [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Slaves[COLOR_REVERT] you are able to increase its culture value by 1 per slave (maximum of 5).
TEXT.German: Ein [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Freudenhaus[COLOR_REVERT] erhöht die Zufriedenheit um eins und mittels [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Sklaven[COLOR_REVERT] kann dessen Kulturwert um jeweils eins erhöht werden (maximal 5).
TEXT.Italian: A [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Brothel[COLOR_REVERT] increases happiness by one and with [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Slaves[COLOR_REVERT] you are able to increase its culture value by 1 per slave (maximum of 5).
TEXT.Spanish: Un [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]burdel[COLOR_REVERT] aumenta la felicidad en uno y con [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]esclavos[COLOR_REVERT] podrás incrementar su valor cultural en 1 por cada uno (máximo de 5).

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Taverns[COLOR_REVERT] decrease war weariness and provide happiness with [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]wine[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.French: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Taverns[COLOR_REVERT] decrease war weariness and provide happiness with [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]wine[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.German: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Tavernen[COLOR_REVERT] verringern den Kriegsverdruss und erhöhen die Zufriedenheit mit [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Wein[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Italian: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Taverns[COLOR_REVERT] decrease war weariness and provide happiness with [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]wine[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Spanish: Las [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]tabernas[COLOR_REVERT] reducen el hastío bélico y proporcionan felicidad con [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]vino[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Guest and gambling houses[COLOR_REVERT] decrease war weariness, obtain money and provide happiness (especially with [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]wine[COLOR_REVERT]).
TEXT.French: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Guest and gambling houses[COLOR_REVERT] decrease war weariness, obtain money and provide happiness (especially with [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]wine[COLOR_REVERT]).
TEXT.German: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Gast- und Glücksspielhäuser[COLOR_REVERT] verringern den Kriegsverdruss, erwirtschaften Geld und erhöhen die Zufriedenheit (unter anderem mit [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Wein[COLOR_REVERT]).
TEXT.Italian: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Guest and gambling houses[COLOR_REVERT] decrease war weariness, obtain money and provide happiness (especially with [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]wine[COLOR_REVERT]).
TEXT.Spanish: Las [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Casas de apuetas e invitados[COLOR_REVERT] reducen el hastío bélico, obtiene dinero y proporciona felicidad (especialmente con [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]vino[COLOR_REVERT]).

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Triumphal arches[COLOR_REVERT] provide a small amount of culture and decrease war weariness.
TEXT.French: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Triumphal arches[COLOR_REVERT] provide a small amount of culture and decrease war weariness.
TEXT.German: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Triumphbögen[COLOR_REVERT] erhöhen den kulturellen Wert einer Stadt und verringern den Kriegsverdruss.
TEXT.Italian: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Triumphal arches[COLOR_REVERT] provide a small amount of culture and decrease war weariness.
TEXT.Spanish: El [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]arco del triunfo[COLOR_REVERT] proporciona una pequeña cantidad de cultura y disminuye el hastío bélico.

TEXT.English: An [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Apothecary[COLOR_REVERT] increases a city's wealth. It further increases the city's health with access to some ressources.
TEXT.French: L'[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]apothicaire[COLOR_REVERT] augmente la santé des villes. Elle améliore également leur santé en leur donnant accès aux ressources.
TEXT.German: Die [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Apotheke[COLOR_REVERT] steigert die Gesundheit einer Stadt. Außerdem bewirkt die Verfügbarkeit einiger Ressourcen einen weiteren Anstieg der Gesundheit.
TEXT.Italian: Lo [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]speziale[COLOR_REVERT] incrementa la salute della città. Esso inoltre aumenta ulteriormente la salute della città se ha accesso a ressources.
TEXT.Spanish: El [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Boticario[COLOR_REVERT] aumenta la salud de la ciudad. Además, incrementa la salubridad de las ciudades con acceso a algunos recursos.

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Forums[COLOR_REVERT] increase a city's wealth and [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Great Person[COLOR_REVERT] birth rate.
TEXT.French: Le [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]forum[COLOR_REVERT] augmente la richesse des villes et la génération de [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Général illustre[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.German: Die römischen [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Foren[COLOR_REVERT] steigern den Wohlstand einer Stadt und beschleunigen die Entstehung von [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Großen Persönlichkeiten[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Italian: Il [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]foro[COLOR_REVERT] aumenta la ricchezza della città e le probabilità che nasca in città un [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Grande Personaggio[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Spanish: Los [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Foros[COLOR_REVERT] aumentan la riqueza de la ciudad y la tasa de natalidad de [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Grandes personajes[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Agoras[COLOR_REVERT] are ancient Greek [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Markets[COLOR_REVERT]. They increase a city's wealth.
TEXT.French: Les [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]agoras[COLOR_REVERT] sont des [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]marchés[COLOR_REVERT] de la Grèce antique. Ils augmentent la richesse des villes.
TEXT.German: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Agoras[COLOR_REVERT] sind antike griechische [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Märkte[COLOR_REVERT]. Sie erhöhen den Wohlstand einer Stadt.
TEXT.Italian: Le [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]agorà[COLOR_REVERT] sono antichi [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]mercati[COLOR_REVERT] greci. Aumentano la ricchezza di una città.
TEXT.Spanish: Las [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Ágoras[COLOR_REVERT] son los [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Mercados[COLOR_REVERT] de la antigua Grecia. Sirven para incrementar la riqueza de la ciudad.

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Theater[COLOR_REVERT] increases a city's cultural output and its happiness. It allows you to turn 1 citizens into Artists.
TEXT.French: Le [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Théâtre[COLOR_REVERT] améliore nettement la production de culture d'une ville et rend ses citoyens heureux. Il permet de transformer 1 citoyens en artistes.
TEXT.German: Das [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Theater[COLOR_REVERT] erhöht den Kulturwert und die Zufriedenheit der Stadt und ermöglicht die Verwandlung von 1 Bürgern in Künstler.
TEXT.Italian: Il [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Teatro[COLOR_REVERT] aumenta la produzione culturale e la felicità di una città. Consente di trasformare 1 cittadini in Artisti.
TEXT.Spanish: El [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Teatro[COLOR_REVERT] aumenta la producción cultural de la ciudad y su felicidad. Además, te permite convertir a 1 ciudadanos en Artistas.

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Odeon[COLOR_REVERT] increases a city's cultural output and its happiness. It allows you to turn 1 citizens into Artists.
TEXT.French: L'[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]odéon[COLOR_REVERT] améliore nettement la production de culture d'une ville et rend ses citoyens heureux. Il permet de transformer 1 citoyens en artistes.
TEXT.German: Das [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Odeon[COLOR_REVERT] erhöht den Kulturwert und die Zufriedenheit der Stadt und ermöglicht die Verwandlung von 1 Bürgern in Künstler.
TEXT.Italian: L'[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]odeon[COLOR_REVERT] aumenta la produzione culturale e la felicità di una città. Consente di trasformare 1 cittadini in Artisti.
TEXT.Spanish: El [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Odeón[COLOR_REVERT] aumenta la producción cultural de la ciudad y su felicidad. Además, te permite convertir a 1 ciudadanos en Artistas.

TEXT.English: With [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]public executions[COLOR_REVERT] you can prevend war weariness and learn your enemy to fear your power.
TEXT.French: With [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]public executions[COLOR_REVERT] you can prevend war weariness and learn your enemy to fear your power.
TEXT.German: Mit [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]öffentlichen Hinrichtungen[COLOR_REVERT] lindert man Kriegsverdruss and lernt dem Gegner eure Macht zu fürchten.
TEXT.Italian: With [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]public executions[COLOR_REVERT] you can prevend war weariness and learn your enemy to fear your power.
TEXT.Spanish: Con [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]ejecuciones públicas[COLOR_REVERT] puedes prevenir hastío bélico y enseñar a tu enemigo a temer tu poder.

TEXT.English: With a [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]mercenary guild[COLOR_REVERT] you are able to trade the specific mercenary-luxury, which allows other nations to train these mercenaries.
TEXT.French: With a [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]mercenary guild[COLOR_REVERT] you are able to trade the specific mercenary-luxury, which allows other nations to train these mercenaries.
TEXT.German: Mit einer [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Söldnergilde[COLOR_REVERT] kann das entsprechende Söldner-Luxusgut gehandelt werden, welches anderen Nationen ermöglicht diese Söldner auszubilden.
TEXT.Italian: With a [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]mercenary guild[COLOR_REVERT] you are able to trade the specific mercenary-luxury, which allows other nations to train these mercenaries.
TEXT.Spanish: Con un [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]gremio de mercenarios[COLOR_REVERT] podrás comerciar con un el recurso mercenario específico, lo que permitirá a otras naciones estos mercenarios.

TEXT.English: With the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Silk Road[COLOR_REVERT] you will have your first trade routes with its unlocked trading post. The creator of the Silk Road will additional gain 400 gold.
TEXT.French: Avec le [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT] Route de la Soie [COLOR_REVERT] les premières routes commerciales peuvent être développées par le poste de traite soi-tension. Le créateur de la Route de la Soie recevra également 400 pièces d'or.
TEXT.German: Mit der [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Seidenstraße[COLOR_REVERT] können durch die damit freigeschalteten Handelsposten, die ersten Handelsrouten erschlossen werden. Der Erschaffer der Seidenstraße erhält zusätzlich 400 Goldstücke.
TEXT.Italian: Con il [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT] Silk Road [COLOR_REVERT] le prime rotte commerciali possono essere sviluppati dal post trading così eccitato. Il creatore della Via della Seta riceverà anche 400 pezzi d'oro.
TEXT.Spanish: Con la [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Ruta de la Seda[COLOR_REVERT] tendrás tus primeras rutas comerciales con sus puestos comerciales desbloqueados. El creador de la Ruta de la Seda ganará además 400 de oro.

TEXT.English: The first discoverer is given a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Artist[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.French: The first discoverer is given a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Artist[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.German: Der erste Entdecker erhält einen [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]großen Künstler[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Italian: The first discoverer is given a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Artist[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Spanish: El primero en descubrirla recibe un [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Gran Artista[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.English: This technology can be explored only with [COLOR_TECH_TEXT] Roman knowledge [COLOR_REVERT] and allows the construction of the [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT] Quinquereme [COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.French: This technology can be explored only with [COLOR_TECH_TEXT] Roman knowledge [COLOR_REVERT] and allows the construction of the [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT] Quinquereme [COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.German: Diese Technologie kann nur mit [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]römischen Wissen[COLOR_REVERT] erforscht werden und erlaubt den Bau der [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Quinquereme[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Italian: This technology can be explored only with [COLOR_TECH_TEXT] Roman knowledge [COLOR_REVERT] and allows the construction of the [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT] Quinquereme [COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Spanish: Esta tecnología solo puede ser explorada con el [COLOR_TECH_TEXT] conocimiento romano [COLOR_REVERT] y permite la construcción de los [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT] Quinquerreme [COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.English: With the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT] Palisade [COLOR_REVERT] and [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT] watchtower [COLOR_REVERT] for the first time the surrounding cities can be protected.
TEXT.French: With the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT] Palisade [COLOR_REVERT] and [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT] watchtower [COLOR_REVERT] for the first time the surrounding cities can be protected.
TEXT.German: Mit der [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Palisade[COLOR_REVERT] und dem [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Spähturm[COLOR_REVERT] können erstmals Städte und Umland gesichert werden.
TEXT.Italian: With the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT] Palisade [COLOR_REVERT] and [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT] watchtower [COLOR_REVERT] for the first time the surrounding cities can be protected.
TEXT.Spanish: Con la [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT] Empalizada [COLOR_REVERT] y la [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT] atalaya [COLOR_REVERT] desde los primeros tiempos las ciudades circundantes pueden ser protegidas.

TEXT.English: If the Silk Road has been completed, the first [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]trade routes [COLOR_REVERT] can be established with [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT] a trading post [COLOR_REVERT]. Enables the wonders Dam of Marib (also needs water storage and stone) and luxor temple (also needs geometry and egyptian gods).
TEXT.French: If the Silk Road has been completed, the first [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]trade routes [COLOR_REVERT] can be established with [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT] a trading post [COLOR_REVERT]. Enables the wonders Dam of Marib (also needs water storage and stone) and luxor temple (also needs geometry and egyptian gods).
TEXT.German: Falls die Seidenstraße schon fertiggestellt wurde, können mit [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Handelsposten[COLOR_REVERT] erste [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Handelswege[COLOR_REVERT] etabliert werden. Ermöglicht die Wunder Damm von Marib (zusammen mit Wasserspeicherung und Steinen) und Luxor-Tempel (zusammen mit Geometrie und Ägyptischen Göttern).
TEXT.Italian: If the Silk Road has been completed, the first [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]trade routes [COLOR_REVERT] can be established with [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT] a trading post [COLOR_REVERT]. Enables the wonders Dam of Marib (also needs water storage and stone) and luxor temple (also needs geometry and egyptian gods).
TEXT.Spanish: Si la Ruta de la seda ha sido completada, la primera [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT] ruta comercial [COLOR_REVERT] puede ser establecida con un [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]puesto comercial [COLOR_REVERT]. Activa las maravillas Presa de Marib) que también necesita almacenaje de agua y piedra) y el templo de Luxor (que también necesita geometría y el culto egipcio).

TEXT.English: Settler can be built [NEWLINE]Workers can build cottages [NEWLINE]Can open borders [NEWLINE]The mesopotamian CIVs can create their League of Towns
TEXT.French: Settler can be built [NEWLINE]Workers can build cottages [NEWLINE]Can open borders [NEWLINE]The mesopotamian CIVs can create their League of Towns
TEXT.German: Siedler können erstellt werden [NEWLINE]Bautruppen können Hütten errichten [NEWLINE]Ermöglicht die Öffnung der Grenzen [NEWLINE]Die mesopotamischen Völker können ihren Städtebund errichten
TEXT.Italian: Settler can be built [NEWLINE]Workers can build cottages [NEWLINE]Can open borders [NEWLINE]The mesopotamian CIVs can create their League of Towns
TEXT.Spanish: Los colonos pueden ser construidos. [NEWLINE]Los trabajadores pueden construir villas. [NEWLINE]Se pueden abrir fronteras. [NEWLINE]La civilización mesopotámica puede crear su Liga de Ciudades.

TEXT.English: The time has come to extend our own kingdom with the help of the state form [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT] colonization [COLOR_REVERT] and the unit [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT] accounts [COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.French: The time has come to extend our own kingdom with the help of the state form [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT] colonization [COLOR_REVERT] and the unit [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT] accounts [COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.German: Der Zeitpunkt ist gekommen, das eigene Reich mit Hilfe der Staatsform [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Kolonisierung[COLOR_REVERT] und der Einheit [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Kontere[COLOR_REVERT] auszudehnen.
TEXT.Italian: The time has come to extend our own kingdom with the help of the state form [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT] colonization [COLOR_REVERT] and the unit [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT] accounts [COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Spanish: El momento ha llegado para expandir nuestro reino con la ayuda de la forma de estado [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT] colonización [COLOR_REVERT] y la unidad [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT] pentecóntero [COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.English: Several special units (hoplit, armored warrior, hypaspist, etc.) can be constructed.
TEXT.French: Several special units (hoplit, armored warrior, hypaspist, etc.) can be constructed.
TEXT.German: Diverse Spezialeinheiten (Hoplit, Gepanzerter Krieger, Hypaspist, ...) werden freigeschaltet.
TEXT.Italian: Several special units (hoplit, armored warrior, hypaspist, etc.) can be constructed.
TEXT.Spanish: Muchas unidades especiales (hoplita, guerrero acorazado, hypaspist, ...) pueden ser construidas.

TEXT.English: [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Camels [COLOR_REVERT]can now be used as building construction bonus in cities (like horses) and even to fill your treasury as [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]trade caravans[COLOR_REVERT] when emitted in foreign cities.
TEXT.French: [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Camels [COLOR_REVERT]can now be used as building construction bonus in cities (like horses) and even to fill your treasury as [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]trade caravans[COLOR_REVERT] when emitted in foreign cities.
TEXT.German: [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Kamele[COLOR_REVERT] können als Produktionsbonus in Städten genutzt werden (wie Pferde) oder auch zum Befüllen der Schatzkammer als [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Handelskarawanen[COLOR_REVERT] in fremde Städte ausgesandt werden.
TEXT.Italian: [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Camels [COLOR_REVERT]can now be used as building construction bonus in cities (like horses) and even to fill your treasury as [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]trade caravans[COLOR_REVERT] when emitted in foreign cities.
TEXT.Spanish: Los [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT] camellos [COLOR_REVERT] ahora pueden ser usados como bonus de construcción en ciudades (como los caballos) y hasta llenan tu tesoro como [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]caravanas comerciales[COLOR_REVERT] cuando se envían a ciudades extranjeras.

TEXT.English: Enables [COLOR_TECH_TEXT] compass [COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.French: Enables [COLOR_TECH_TEXT] compass [COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.German: Ermöglicht [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Magnetkompass[COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.Italian: Enables [COLOR_TECH_TEXT] compass [COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.Spanish: Activa [COLOR_TECH_TEXT] brújula [COLOR_REVERT]

TEXT.English: Cities in which Cybele is honored may build the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT] factory [COLOR_REVERT], which produces the Bonusgut [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT] terracotta [COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.French: Cities in which Cybele is honored may build the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT] factory [COLOR_REVERT], which produces the Bonusgut [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT] terracotta [COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.German: Städte, in denen Cybele verehrt wird, können die [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Manufaktur[COLOR_REVERT] errichten, welche das Bonusgut [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Terrakotta[COLOR_REVERT] erzeugt.
TEXT.Italian: Cities in which Cybele is honored may build the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT] factory [COLOR_REVERT], which produces the Bonusgut [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT] terracotta [COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Spanish: Las ciudades donde Cibeles es honrada pueden construir la [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT] factoría [COLOR_REVERT], el cual produce el bonus [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT] terracota [COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.English: The slightly improved ship [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT] bireme [COLOR_REVERT] can be built.
TEXT.French: The slightly improved ship [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT] bireme [COLOR_REVERT] can be built.
TEXT.German: Das leicht verbesserte Schiff [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Bireme[COLOR_REVERT] kann gebaut werden.
TEXT.Italian: The slightly improved ship [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT] bireme [COLOR_REVERT] can be built.
TEXT.Spanish: El poco mejorado barco [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT] birreme [COLOR_REVERT] puede ser construído.

TEXT.English: Leads to [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Alchemy[COLOR_REVERT] and [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Humoral Pathology[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.French: Leads to [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Alchemy[COLOR_REVERT] and [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Humoral Pathology[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.German: Führt zu [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Alchemie[COLOR_REVERT] und [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Humoralpathologie[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Italian: Leads to [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Alchemy[COLOR_REVERT] and [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Humoral Pathology[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Spanish: Conduce a [COLOR_TECH_TEXT] alquimia [COLOR_REVERT] y [COLOR_TECH_TEXT] patología humoral [COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.English: The people participate in the rule. The forms of government [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT] National Assembly [COLOR_REVERT] and [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT] democracy [COLOR_REVERT] can be adopted.
TEXT.French: The people participate in the rule. The forms of government [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT] National Assembly [COLOR_REVERT] and [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT] democracy [COLOR_REVERT] can be adopted.
TEXT.German: Das Volk beteiligt sich an der Herrschaft. Die Staatsformen [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Volksversammlung[COLOR_REVERT] und [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Demokratie[COLOR_REVERT] können übernommen werden.
TEXT.Italian: The people participate in the rule. The forms of government [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT] National Assembly [COLOR_REVERT] and [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT] democracy [COLOR_REVERT] can be adopted.
TEXT.Spanish: Las personas participan en las leyes. Las formas de gobierno [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT] Asamblea Nacional [COLOR_REVERT] y [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT] democracia [COLOR_REVERT] pueden ser adoptdas.

TEXT.English: The flourishing trade brings [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT] ocean trade routes [COLOR_REVERT] and allows the construction of [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT] merchant ships [COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.French: The flourishing trade brings [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT] ocean trade routes [COLOR_REVERT] and allows the construction of [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT] merchant ships [COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.German: Das Aufblühen des Handels bringt [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Ozeanhandelswege[COLOR_REVERT] und ermöglicht den Bau von [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Handelsschiffen[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Italian: The flourishing trade brings [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT] ocean trade routes [COLOR_REVERT] and allows the construction of [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT] merchant ships [COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Spanish: El floreciente comercio trae [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT] rutas comerciales oceánicas [COLOR_REVERT] y permite la construcción de [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT] barcos mercantes[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.English: This knowhow provides +1[ICON_HEALTHY] in all cities.
TEXT.French: This knowhow provides +1[ICON_HEALTHY] in all cities.
TEXT.German: Das neugewonnene Wissen sorgt für +1[ICON_HEALTHY] in all euren Städten.
TEXT.Italian: This knowhow provides +1[ICON_HEALTHY] in all cities.
TEXT.Spanish: Estos nuevos conocimientos proporcionan +1[ICON_HEALTHY] en todas las ciudades.

TEXT.English: Leads to [COLOR_TECH_TEXT] aesthetics [COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_TECH_TEXT] astrology [COLOR_REVERT] and [COLOR_TECH_TEXT] elementary geometry [COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.French: Leads to [COLOR_TECH_TEXT] aesthetics [COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_TECH_TEXT] astrology [COLOR_REVERT] and [COLOR_TECH_TEXT] elementary geometry [COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.German: Führt zu [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Ästhetik[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Astrologie[COLOR_REVERT] und [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Elementargeometrie[COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.Italian: Leads to [COLOR_TECH_TEXT] aesthetics [COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_TECH_TEXT] astrology [COLOR_REVERT] and [COLOR_TECH_TEXT] elementary geometry [COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.Spanish: Conduce a [COLOR_TECH_TEXT] estética [COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_TECH_TEXT] astrología [COLOR_REVERT] y [COLOR_TECH_TEXT] geometría elemental [COLOR_REVERT]

TEXT.English: The newly gained knowledge provides +1 [ICON_HAPPY] in all your cities.
TEXT.French: The newly gained knowledge provides +1 [ICON_HAPPY] in all your cities.
TEXT.German: Das neugewonnene Wissen sorgt für +1 [ICON_HAPPY] in all euren Städten.
TEXT.Italian: The newly gained knowledge provides +1 [ICON_HAPPY] in all your cities.
TEXT.Spanish: Los nuevos conocimientos ganados proporcionan +1 [ICON_HAPPY] en todas tus ciudades.

TEXT.English: Leads to [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]manticism[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Greek gods[COLOR_REVERT] and [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]dualism[COLOR_REVERT]. [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Missionaries[COLOR_REVERT] can be built now.
TEXT.French: Leads to [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]manticism[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Greek gods[COLOR_REVERT] and [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]dualism[COLOR_REVERT]. [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Missionaries[COLOR_REVERT] can be built now.
TEXT.German: Führt zu [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Mantik[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Griechische Götter[COLOR_REVERT] und [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Dualismus[COLOR_REVERT]. [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Missionare[COLOR_REVERT] können erstmals ausgebildet werden.
TEXT.Italian: Leads to [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]manticism[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Greek gods[COLOR_REVERT] and [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]dualism[COLOR_REVERT]. [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Missionaries[COLOR_REVERT] can be built now.

TEXT.English: With the stirrup the strongest [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]mounted units[COLOR_REVERT] of late ancient times can be built and the resource Bactrian horsemen becomes obsolete.
TEXT.French: With the stirrup the strongest [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]mounted units[COLOR_REVERT] of late ancient times can be built and the resource Bactrian horsemen becomes obsolete.
TEXT.German: Mit dem Steigbügel können die stärksten [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]beritten Einheiten[COLOR_REVERT] der Spätantike gebaut werden und die Ressource Baktrische Reiter veraltet.
TEXT.Italian: With the stirrup the strongest [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]mounted units[COLOR_REVERT] of late ancient times can be built and the resource Bactrian horsemen becomes obsolete.
TEXT.Spanish: Con el estribo las [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]unidades montadas[COLOR_REVERT] mas fuertes de la antigüedad tardía pueden ser construidos y el recurso jinetes bactrianos quedan obsoletos.

TEXT.English: With the building [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]dyke[COLOR_REVERT] the health in the cities rises around one.
TEXT.French: With the building [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]dyke[COLOR_REVERT] the health in the cities rises around one.
TEXT.German: Mit dem Gebäude [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Deich[COLOR_REVERT] steigt die Gesundheit in den Städten um eins.
TEXT.Italian: With the building [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]dyke[COLOR_REVERT] the health in the cities rises around one.
TEXT.Spanish: Con el edificio [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]dique[COLOR_REVERT] la salud en las ciudad crece alrededor de uno.

TEXT.English: [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Fortresses[COLOR_REVERT] can be constructed. Enables the civic of royalty.
TEXT.French: [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Fortresses[COLOR_REVERT] can be constructed. Enables the civic of royalty.
TEXT.German: Der Bau von [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Festungen[COLOR_REVERT] wird ermöglicht. Ermöglicht weiterhin die Staatsform Königtum.
TEXT.Italian: [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Fortresses[COLOR_REVERT] can be constructed. Enables the civic of royalty.
TEXT.Spanish: [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Fortalezas[COLOR_REVERT] pueden ser construidas. Permite el principio de monarquía.

TEXT.English: The health in all cities rises by one. Enables the building apothecary.
TEXT.French: The health in all cities rises by one. Enables the building apothecary.
TEXT.German: Die Gesundheit aller Städten steigt um eins. Ermöglicht das Gebäude Apotheke.
TEXT.Italian: The health in all cities rises by one. Enables the building apothecary.
TEXT.Spanish: La salud en las ciudades crece en uno. Activa el edificio boticario.

TEXT.English: With this technology the world wonders of [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Circus Maximus[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Pantheon[COLOR_REVERT], the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Great Colosseum[COLOR_REVERT] and impressive [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]amphitheatre[COLOR_REVERT] can be constructed.
TEXT.French: With this technology the world wonders of [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Circus Maximus[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Pantheon[COLOR_REVERT], the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Great Colosseum[COLOR_REVERT] and impressive [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]amphitheatre[COLOR_REVERT] can be constructed.
TEXT.German: Mit der Technologie Beton können die Weltwunder [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Circus Maximus[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Pantheon[COLOR_REVERT], das [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Große Kolosseum[COLOR_REVERT] und eindrucksvolle [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Amphitheater[COLOR_REVERT] gebaut werden.
TEXT.Italian: With this technology the world wonders of [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Circus Maximus[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Pantheon[COLOR_REVERT], the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Great Colosseum[COLOR_REVERT] and impressive [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]amphitheatre[COLOR_REVERT] can be constructed.
TEXT.Spanish: Con esta tecnología las maravillas mundiales del [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Circo Máximo[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Panteón[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Gran Coliseo[COLOR_REVERT] y el edificio [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]anfiteatro[COLOR_REVERT] pueden ser construídos.

TEXT.English: The first discoverer establishes the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Christianity[COLOR_REVERT] and receives a great prophet. With the state religion Christianity the miracle [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]the Bible[COLOR_REVERT] is available.
TEXT.French: The first discoverer establishes the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Christianity[COLOR_REVERT] and receives a great prophet. With the state religion Christianity the miracle [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]the Bible[COLOR_REVERT] is available.
TEXT.German: Der erste Entdecker gründet das [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Christentum[COLOR_REVERT] und erhält einen [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Großen Propheten[COLOR_REVERT]. Mit der Staatsreligion Christentum ist zudem das Weltwunder [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Die Bibel[COLOR_REVERT] verfügbar.
TEXT.Italian: The first discoverer establishes the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Christianity[COLOR_REVERT] and receives a great prophet. With the state religion Christianity the miracle [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]the Bible[COLOR_REVERT] is available.
TEXT.Spanish: El primer descubridor establece el [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Cristianismo[COLOR_REVERT] y recibe un gran profeta. Con la religión oficial Cristianismo la maravilla [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]la Biblia[COLOR_REVERT] está disponible.

TEXT.English: With the establishment of the Julian calendar the satisfaction rises around one.
TEXT.French: With the establishment of the Julian calendar the satisfaction rises around one.
TEXT.German: Mit der Einführung des Julianischen Kalenders steigt die Zufriedenheit um eins.
TEXT.Italian: With the establishment of the Julian calendar the satisfaction rises around one.
TEXT.Spanish: Con el establecimiento del calendario Juliano la satisfaccion crece alrededor de uno.

TEXT.English: With the promotion [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]marching[COLOR_REVERT] your military gets strengthened. The Roman Empire can promote [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]praetorians[COLOR_REVERT]. [NEWLINE]The civic of professional army is helpful for battles within own cultural borders.
TEXT.French: With the promotion [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]marching[COLOR_REVERT] your military gets strengthened. The Roman Empire can promote [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]praetorians[COLOR_REVERT]. [NEWLINE]The civic of professional army is helpful for battles within own cultural borders.
TEXT.German: Mit der Beförderung [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Marschieren[COLOR_REVERT] wird das Militär gestärkt. Das Römische Reich kann ab diesem Zeitpunkt Prätorianer erstellen. [NEWLINE]Die Staatsform Berufsarmee ist besonders für Kriege innerhalb der eigenen Grenzen geeignet.
TEXT.Italian: With the promotion [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]marching[COLOR_REVERT] your military gets strengthened. The Roman Empire can promote [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]praetorians[COLOR_REVERT]. [NEWLINE]The civic of professional army is helpful for battles within own cultural borders.
TEXT.Spanish: Con la promoción [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]marcha[COLOR_REVERT], tus militares serán reforzados. El Imperio Romano puede promocionar [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]pretorianos[COLOR_REVERT]. El principio ejercito profesional es una ayuda para la batallas dentro de las propias fronteras culturales.

TEXT.English: This technology allows the building of [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]horse archers and camel archers[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.French: This technology allows the building of [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]horse archers and camel archers[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.German: Die Technologie [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Berittenes Bogenschießen[COLOR_REVERT] ermöglicht den Bau von [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Berittenen Bogenschützen[COLOR_REVERT] und [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Kamelbogenschützen[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Italian: This technology allows the building of [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]horse archers and camel archers[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Spanish: Esta tecnología permite la construcción de [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]arqueros a caballo y arqueros a camello[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.English: The magnetism leads to an [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]additional movement point for sea-units[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.French: The magnetism leads to an [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]additional movement point for sea-units[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.German: Der Magnetismus führt zu einem [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]zusätzlichen Bewegungspunkt für Seeeinheiten[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Italian: The magnetism leads to an [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]additional movement point for sea-units[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Spanish: El magnetismo conduce a un [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]punto de movimiento adicional para unidades marinas[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.English: Starting from this time some civilizations are able to build the strong unit [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]longsword fighter[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.French: Starting from this time some civilizations are able to build the strong unit [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]longsword fighter[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.German: Einigen Zivilisation ist es ab diesem Zeitpunkt möglich, die starke Einheit [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Langschwertkämpfer[COLOR_REVERT] zu bauen.
TEXT.Italian: Starting from this time some civilizations are able to build the strong unit [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]longsword fighter[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Spanish: A partir de este momento algunas civilizaciones son capaces de construir la fuerte unidad [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]luchador con espada larga[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.English: With the imperialism the system of government [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]representation[COLOR_REVERT] can be introduced and the miracle [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]altar of Pergamon[COLOR_REVERT] can be built.
TEXT.French: With the imperialism the system of government [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]representation[COLOR_REVERT] can be introduced and the miracle [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]altar of Pergamon[COLOR_REVERT] can be built.
TEXT.German: Mit dem Imperialismus kann die Staatsform [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Repräsentation[COLOR_REVERT] eingeführt werden und das Weltwunder [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Pergamonaltar[COLOR_REVERT] kann gebaut werden.
TEXT.Italian: With the imperialism the system of government [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]representation[COLOR_REVERT] can be introduced and the miracle [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]altar of Pergamon[COLOR_REVERT] can be built.
TEXT.Spanish: Con el imperialismo, el sistema de gobierno [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]representación[COLOR_REVERT] puede ser introducido y la maravilla [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]altar de Pérgamo[COLOR_REVERT] puede ser construido.

TEXT.English: The largest [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]ships[COLOR_REVERT] of ancient times become now buildable and the wonder the world wonder [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]war harbor[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.French: The largest [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]ships[COLOR_REVERT] of ancient times become now buildable and the wonder the world wonder [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]war harbor[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.German: Die größten [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Schiffe[COLOR_REVERT] der Antike werden nun baubar, sowie der Bau des Weltwunders [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Kriegshafen[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Italian: The largest [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]ships[COLOR_REVERT] of ancient times become now buildable and the wonder the world wonder [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]war harbor[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Spanish: Los [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]barcos[COLOR_REVERT] mas grandes de la antigüedad ahora se pueden construir y la maravilla mundial [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]puerto de guerra[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.English: This technology allows the building of a [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]gladiator school[COLOR_REVERT] and a [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]hippodrome[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.French: This technology allows the building of a [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]gladiator school[COLOR_REVERT] and a [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]hippodrome[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.German: Diese Technologie ermöglicht den Bau einer [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Gladiatorenschule[COLOR_REVERT] und eines [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Hippodroms[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Italian: This technology allows the building of a [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]gladiator school[COLOR_REVERT] and a [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]hippodrome[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Spanish: Esta tecnología permite la construcción de una [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]escuela de gladiadores[COLOR_REVERT] y un [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]hipódromo[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Academies[COLOR_REVERT] can be established with a great scientist and the perched culture of Hellenism in the city and the systems of government [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]state property[COLOR_REVERT] can be introduced.
TEXT.French: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Academies[COLOR_REVERT] can be established with a great scientist and the perched culture of Hellenism in the city and the systems of government [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]state property[COLOR_REVERT] can be introduced.
TEXT.German: Mit einem Großen Wissenschaftler und dem Hellenismus in der Stadt können die restlichen [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Akademien[COLOR_REVERT] errichtet werden und die Staatsform [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Staatseigentum[COLOR_REVERT] kann eingeführt werden.
TEXT.Italian: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Academies[COLOR_REVERT] can be established with a great scientist and the perched culture of Hellenism in the city and the systems of government [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]state property[COLOR_REVERT] can be introduced.
TEXT.Spanish: Las [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]academias[COLOR_REVERT] pueden ser establecidas con un gran científico y la cultura del Helenismo asentada en la ciudad y los sistemas de gobierno [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]propiedad estatal[COLOR_REVERT] pueden ser introducidos.

TEXT.English: The cult [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Hellenism[COLOR_REVERT] can be created with a great engineer.
TEXT.French: The cult [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Hellenism[COLOR_REVERT] can be created with a great engineer.
TEXT.German: Der Kult [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Hellenismus[COLOR_REVERT] kann nun mit einem Großen Ingenieur gegründet werden.
TEXT.Italian: The cult [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Hellenism[COLOR_REVERT] can be created with a great engineer.
TEXT.Spanish: El culto [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Helenismo[COLOR_REVERT] puede ser creado con un gran ingeniero.

TEXT.English: This technology enables the construction of [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]catapults[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.French: This technology enables the construction of [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]catapults[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.German: Diese Technologie ermöglicht den Bau von [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Katapulten[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Italian: This technology enables the construction of [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]catapults[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Spanish: Esta tecnología permite la construcción de [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]catapultas[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.English: At this time the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Military Academy[COLOR_REVERT] can be established in a city using a Great General. The military can also be reinforced with [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]War Elephant[COLOR_REVERT] units and the promotions [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Ambush[COLOR_REVERT] and [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Encounting Tactics[COLOR_REVERT] allowing new strategies.
TEXT.French: At this time the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Military Academy[COLOR_REVERT] can be established in a city using a Great General. The military can also be reinforced with [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]War Elephant[COLOR_REVERT] units and the promotions [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Ambush[COLOR_REVERT] and [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Encounting Tactics[COLOR_REVERT] allowing new strategies.
TEXT.German: Mit einem General kann zu diesem Zeitpunkt in einer Stadt die [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Militärakademie[COLOR_REVERT] errichtet werden. Das Militär kann zudem mit [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Kriegselefanten[COLOR_REVERT] verstärkt werden und die Beförderungen [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Hinterhalt[COLOR_REVERT] und [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Treffen Taktik[COLOR_REVERT] ermöglichen neue Strategien.
TEXT.Italian: At this time the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Military Academy[COLOR_REVERT] can be established in a city using a Great General. The military can also be reinforced with [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]War Elephant[COLOR_REVERT] units and the promotions [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Ambush[COLOR_REVERT] and [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Encounting Tactics[COLOR_REVERT] allowing new strategies.
TEXT.Spanish: En este momento la [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]academia militar[COLOR_REVERT] puede ser establecida en una ciudad con un gran general. El ejército ahora es ahora reforzado con [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]elefantes de guerra[COLOR_REVERT] y los ascensos [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]emboscada[COLOR_REVERT] y [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]tácticas de combate[COLOR_REVERT] permiten nuevas estrategias.

TEXT.English: The development of the coast makes allows the building of the wonders [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]colossus[COLOR_REVERT] and [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]great lighthouse[COLOR_REVERT] possible and in the cities a [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]port[COLOR_REVERT] and a [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]lighthouse[COLOR_REVERT] can be established. Besides the system of government [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]marts[COLOR_REVERT] can be introduced.
TEXT.French: The development of the coast makes allows the building of the wonders [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]colossus[COLOR_REVERT] and [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]great lighthouse[COLOR_REVERT] possible and in the cities a [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]port[COLOR_REVERT] and a [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]lighthouse[COLOR_REVERT] can be established. Besides the system of government [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]marts[COLOR_REVERT] can be introduced.
TEXT.German: Der Küstenausbau ermöglicht den Bau der Weltwunder [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Koloss[COLOR_REVERT] und [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Großer Leuchtturm[COLOR_REVERT] und in den Städten kann ein [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Hafen[COLOR_REVERT] und ein [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Leuchtturm[COLOR_REVERT] errichtet werden. Daneben kann die Staatsform [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Handelszentren[COLOR_REVERT] eingeführt werden.
TEXT.Italian: The development of the coast makes allows the building of the wonders [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]colossus[COLOR_REVERT] and [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]great lighthouse[COLOR_REVERT] possible and in the cities a [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]port[COLOR_REVERT] and a [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]lighthouse[COLOR_REVERT] can be established. Besides the system of government [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]marts[COLOR_REVERT] can be introduced.
TEXT.Spanish: El desarrollo costero hace posible la construcción de las maravillas [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]coloso[COLOR_REVERT] y [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]gran faro[COLOR_REVERT] y en las ciudades un [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]puerto[COLOR_REVERT] y un [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]faro[COLOR_REVERT] pueden ser establecidos. Además del sistema de gobierno [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]mercados[COLOR_REVERT] puede ser introducido.

TEXT.English: This technology enables new special units (Syrian Guard, Argyraspides, Berserker, ...).
TEXT.French: This technology enables new special units (Syrian Guard, Argyraspides, Berserker, ...).
TEXT.German: Diese Technologie ermöglicht neue Spezialeinheiten (Syrische Garde, Argyraspidai, Berserker, ...).
TEXT.Italian: This technology enables new special units (Syrian Guard, Argyraspides, Berserker, ...).
TEXT.Spanish: Esta tecnología permite nuevas unidades especiales (Guardia Siria, Argyraspidai, Berserker, ...).

TEXT.English: With the technology literature the wonders [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]great library[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]mausoleum at Halicarnassus[COLOR_REVERT] and with the state religion Judaism the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Ten Commandments[COLOR_REVERT] can be built. Additionally now the national miracles [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]heroic epic[COLOR_REVERT] and [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]national epic[COLOR_REVERT] are available.
TEXT.French: With the technology literature the wonders [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]great library[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]mausoleum at Halicarnassus[COLOR_REVERT] and with the state religion Judaism the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Ten Commandments[COLOR_REVERT] can be built. Additionally now the national miracles [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]heroic epic[COLOR_REVERT] and [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]national epic[COLOR_REVERT] are available.
TEXT.German: Mit der Technologie Literatur können die Weltwunder [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Große Bibliothek[COLOR_REVERT], das [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Mausoleum von Halikarnassos[COLOR_REVERT] und mit der Staatsreligion Judentum die [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Zehn Gebote[COLOR_REVERT] gebaut werden. Zusätzlich sind nun die Nationalenwunder [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Heldenepos[COLOR_REVERT] und [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Nationalepos[COLOR_REVERT] verfügbar.
TEXT.Italian: With the technology literature the wonders [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]great library[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]mausoleum at Halicarnassus[COLOR_REVERT] and with the state religion Judaism the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Ten Commandments[COLOR_REVERT] can be built. Additionally now the national miracles [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]heroic epic[COLOR_REVERT] and [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]national epic[COLOR_REVERT] are available.
TEXT.Spanish: Con la tecnología literatura las maravillas [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]gran biblioteca[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]mausoleo de Halicarnaso[COLOR_REVERT] y con la religión oficial Judaísmo los [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Diez Mandamientos[COLOR_REVERT] pueden ser construídos. Adicionalmente ahora las maravillas nacionales [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]epopeya heroica[COLOR_REVERT] y [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]epopeya nacional[COLOR_REVERT] están disponibles.

TEXT.English: This technology allows the building of a new [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]siege unit[COLOR_REVERT] and the establishment of [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]longs murs[COLOR_REVERT] in cities and of [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]stone fortresses[COLOR_REVERT] in landscape.
TEXT.French: This technology allows the building of a new [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]siege unit[COLOR_REVERT] and the establishment of [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]longs murs[COLOR_REVERT] in cities and of [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]stone fortresses[COLOR_REVERT] in landscape.
TEXT.German: Die Wehrtechnik ermöglicht den Bau einer neuen [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Belagerungswaffe[COLOR_REVERT] und die Errichtung von [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Breiten Mauern[COLOR_REVERT] in einer Stadt und von [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Steinfestungen[COLOR_REVERT] im Gelände.
TEXT.Italian: This technology allows the building of a new [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]siege unit[COLOR_REVERT] and the establishment of [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]longs murs[COLOR_REVERT] in cities and of [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]stone fortresses[COLOR_REVERT] in landscape.
TEXT.Spanish: Esta tecnología permite la construccion de una nueva [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]unidad de asedio[COLOR_REVERT] y el establecimiento de [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]murallas anchas[COLOR_REVERT] en ciudades y de [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]fortalezas de piedras[COLOR_REVERT] en terreno.

TEXT.English: This technology makes the building of [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]light cavalry[COLOR_REVERT] possible.
TEXT.French: This technology makes the building of [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]light cavalry[COLOR_REVERT] possible.
TEXT.German: Diese Technologie ermöglicht den Bau von [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]leichter Kavallerie[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Italian: This technology makes the building of [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]light cavalry[COLOR_REVERT] possible.
TEXT.Spanish: Esta tecnología hace la construcción de [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]caballería pesada[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.English: School and platonic academy as well as gymnasion and odeon for the greek civilizations can be constructed. By adjusting the culture rate, commerce can be transferred into culture.
TEXT.French: School and platonic academy as well as gymnasion and odeon for the greek civilizations can be constructed. By adjusting the culture rate, commerce can be transferred into culture.
TEXT.German: Schule und Platonische Akademie sowie Gymnasion und Odeon für griechische Zivilsationen werden freigeschaltet. Mittels Kulturregler kann Kommerz in Kultur umgewandelt werden.
TEXT.Italian: School and platonic academy as well as gymnasion and odeon for the greek civilizations can be constructed. By adjusting the culture rate, commerce can be transferred into culture.
TEXT.Spanish: Pueden ser construidos la escuela y la academia platónica así como el gymnasion y el odeón para las civilizaciones griegas. Ajustando la tasa de cultura, el comercio puede ser transferido a cultura.

TEXT.English: Piracy makes the building of [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]pirates[COLOR_REVERT] possible, which can go unidentified in strange waters on raids.
TEXT.French: Piracy makes the building of [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]pirates[COLOR_REVERT] possible, which can go unidentified in strange waters on raids.
TEXT.German: Die Piraterie ermöglicht den Bau von [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Piraten[COLOR_REVERT], die unerkannt in fremden Gewässern auf Raubzüge gehen können.
TEXT.Italian: Piracy makes the building of [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]pirates[COLOR_REVERT] possible, which can go unidentified in strange waters on raids.
TEXT.Spanish: La Piratería hace la construcción de [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]piratas[COLOR_REVERT] posible, que pueden ir sin identificar en aguas extranjeras en asaltos.

TEXT.English: With the Alchemy the resource [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]electrum[COLOR_REVERT] becomes obsolesce, but it enables the promotion Fire Arrows for Archers and Medic I for every kind of units.
TEXT.French: With the Alchemy the resource [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]electrum[COLOR_REVERT] becomes obsolesce, but it enables the promotion Fire Arrows for Archers and Medic I for every kind of units.
TEXT.German: Mit der Alchemie veraltet die Ressource [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Elektrum[COLOR_REVERT], dafür schaltet sie für Bogenschützen die Beförderung Feuerpfeile frei und ermöglicht auch gewöhnlichen Einheiten die Beförderung Sanitäter I.
TEXT.Italian: With the Alchemy the resource [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]electrum[COLOR_REVERT] becomes obsolesce, but it enables the promotion Fire Arrows for Archers and Medic I for every kind of units.
TEXT.Spanish: Con la alquimia el recurso [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]electro[COLOR_REVERT] se vuelve obsoleto, pero la salud aumenta alrededor de uno en todas las ciudades.

TEXT.English: The world wonders [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Parthenon[COLOR_REVERT] and [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Statue of Zeus[COLOR_REVERT] are available.
TEXT.French: The world wonders [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Parthenon[COLOR_REVERT] and [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Statue of Zeus[COLOR_REVERT] are available.
TEXT.German: Die Weltwunder [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Parthenon[COLOR_REVERT] und [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Statue des Zeus[COLOR_REVERT] sind verfügbar.
TEXT.Italian: The world wonders [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Parthenon[COLOR_REVERT] and [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Statue of Zeus[COLOR_REVERT] are available.
TEXT.Spanish: Las maravillas mundiales [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Partenón[COLOR_REVERT] y la [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Estatua de Zeus[COLOR_REVERT] están disponibles.

TEXT.English: Starting from this time the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]culture[COLOR_REVERT] is adjustable. The Greeks now can establish the building [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]odeon[COLOR_REVERT], which produces resource [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]dramas[COLOR_REVERT], with which for other civilizations then the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Greek theatre[COLOR_REVERT] becomes available.
TEXT.French: Starting from this time the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]culture[COLOR_REVERT] is adjustable. The Greeks now can establish the building [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]odeon[COLOR_REVERT], which produces resource [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]dramas[COLOR_REVERT], with which for other civilizations then the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Greek theatre[COLOR_REVERT] becomes available.
TEXT.German: Ab diesem Zeitpunkt ist die [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Kultur[COLOR_REVERT] einstellbar. Die Griechen können nun das Gebäude [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Odeon[COLOR_REVERT] errichten, das die Ressource [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Schauspielerei[COLOR_REVERT] produziert, mit der für andere Zivilisationen dann das [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]griechische Theater[COLOR_REVERT] verfügbar wird.
TEXT.Italian: Starting from this time the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]culture[COLOR_REVERT] is adjustable. The Greeks now can establish the building [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]odeon[COLOR_REVERT], which produces resource [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]dramas[COLOR_REVERT], with which for other civilizations then the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Greek theatre[COLOR_REVERT] becomes available.
TEXT.Spanish: A partir de este momento la [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]cultura[COLOR_REVERT] es ajustable. La civilización griega ya puede construir el [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]odeón[COLOR_REVERT], que produce el recurso [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]interpretación[COLOR_REVERT], el cual permite que las demás civilizaciones puedan construir el [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Teatro Griego[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]map trade[COLOR_REVERT] with other civilizations is now possible and [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]maps of rivers and coasts[COLOR_REVERT] will be made and preserved.
TEXT.French: The [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]map trade[COLOR_REVERT] with other civilizations is now possible and [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]maps of rivers and coasts[COLOR_REVERT] will be made and preserved.
TEXT.German: Der [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Kartenhandel[COLOR_REVERT] mit andern Zivilisationen wird möglich und es werden [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Karten von Flüssen und Küsten[COLOR_REVERT] angefertigt und aufbewahrt.
TEXT.Italian: The [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]map trade[COLOR_REVERT] with other civilizations is now possible and [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]maps of rivers and coasts[COLOR_REVERT] will be made and preserved.
TEXT.Spanish: Ahora el [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]intercambio de mapas[COLOR_REVERT] con otras civilizaciones es posible y [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]mapas de ríos y costas[COLOR_REVERT] serán hechos y preservados.

TEXT.English: The system of government [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]senat[COLOR_REVERT] is available.
TEXT.French: The system of government COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]senat[COLOR_REVERT] is available.
TEXT.German: Die Staatsform [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Senat[COLOR_REVERT] kann eingeführt werden.
TEXT.Italian: The system of government COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]senat[COLOR_REVERT] is available.
TEXT.Spanish: El sistema de gobierno [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]senado[COLOR_REVERT] está disponible.

TEXT.English: The system of government [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]free market economy[COLOR_REVERT] can be introduced and the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]trade of gold on diplomatic way[COLOR_REVERT] is now possible. The establishment of a [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]market[COLOR_REVERT] and a [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]slave market[COLOR_REVERT] increases the output of gold in a city.
TEXT.French: The system of government [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]free market economy[COLOR_REVERT] can be introduced and the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]trade of gold on diplomatic way[COLOR_REVERT] is now possible. The establishment of a [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]market[COLOR_REVERT] and a [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]slave market[COLOR_REVERT] increases the output of gold in a city.
TEXT.German: Die Staatsform [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Freie Marktwirtschaft[COLOR_REVERT] kann eingeführt werden und der [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Goldhandel auf diplomatischen Weg[COLOR_REVERT] ist jetzt möglich. Die Errichtung eines [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Markts[COLOR_REVERT] und eines [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Sklavenmarkts[COLOR_REVERT] erhöht zudem den Goldertrag in einer Stadt.
TEXT.Italian: The system of government [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]free market economy[COLOR_REVERT] can be introduced and the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]trade of gold on diplomatic way[COLOR_REVERT] is now possible. The establishment of a [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]market[COLOR_REVERT] and a [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]slave market[COLOR_REVERT] increases the output of gold in a city.
TEXT.Spanish: El sistema de gobierno [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]economía de mercado libre[COLOR_REVERT] puede ser introducida y el [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]intercambio de oro por via diplomática[COLOR_REVERT] es possible ahora. El establecimiento de un [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]mercado[COLOR_REVERT] y un [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]mercado de esclavos[COLOR_REVERT] aumentan la producción de oro en una ciudad.

TEXT.English: With this technology the wonders [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]The Hanging Gardens[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Temple of the Artemis[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Temple of Mars[COLOR_REVERT] and some cultural buildings can be constructed.
TEXT.French: With this technology the wonders [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]The Hanging Gardens[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Temple of the Artemis[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Temple of Mars[COLOR_REVERT] and some cultural buildings can be constructed.
TEXT.German: Mit dieser Technologie können die Weltwunder [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Hängende Gärten[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Ishtar-Tor[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Marstempel[COLOR_REVERT] und [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Tempel der Artemis[COLOR_REVERT] sowie einige kulturelle Gebäude errichtet werden.
TEXT.Italian: With this technology the wonders [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]The Hanging Gardens[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Temple of the Artemis[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Temple of Mars[COLOR_REVERT] and some cultural buildings can be constructed.
TEXT.Spanish: Con esta tecnología las maravillas [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]jardines colgantes[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]templo de Marte[COLOR_REVERT] y [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]templo de Artemisa[COLOR_REVERT] y algunos edificios culturales pueden ser establecidos.

TEXT.English: The national wonder, the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Mint[COLOR_REVERT], will lead to an increase in intercity trade.
TEXT.French: The national wonder, the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Mint[COLOR_REVERT], will lead to an increase in intercity trade.
TEXT.German: Das nationale Wunder der [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Münzpräge[COLOR_REVERT] führt zu einer Zunahme des Handels in den Städten.
TEXT.Italian: The national wonder, the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Mint[COLOR_REVERT], will lead to an increase in intercity trade.
TEXT.Spanish: La maravilla nacional de la [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]ceca[COLOR_REVERT] lleva a un incremento del comercio en las ciudades.

TEXT.English: This technology is a prerequisite for canalisation, aqueducts, gardens, bridges, watch towers and later on even for many great world wonders.
TEXT.French: This technology is a prerequisite for canalisation, aqueducts, gardens, bridges, watch towers and later on even for many great world wonders.
TEXT.German: Diese Technologie ist Voraussetzung für Kanalisation, Aquädukte, Gärten, Brückenbau, Wachtürmen und in späterer Folge auch vielen großartigen Wundern.
TEXT.Italian: This technology is a prerequisite for canalisation, aqueducts, gardens, bridges, watch towers and later on even for many great world wonders.
TEXT.Spanish: Esta tecnología es un prerrequisito para canalizaciones, acueductos, jardines, puentes, atalayas y más tarde algunas grandes maravillas mundiales.

TEXT.English: The fist discoverer founds the cult of [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]cosmogony[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.French: The fist discoverer founds the cult of [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]cosmogony[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.German: Der erste Entdecker gründet den Kult [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Kosmogonie[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Italian: The fist discoverer founds the cult of [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]cosmogony[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Spanish: El primer descubridor funda la [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]cosmogonía[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.English: This technology enables the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Tower of Babel[COLOR_REVERT] and the establishment of the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Cult of Mithras[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.French: This technology enables the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Tower of Babel[COLOR_REVERT] and the establishment of the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Cult of Mithras[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.German: Diese Technologie ermöglicht den [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Turm von Babel[COLOR_REVERT] und die Gründung des [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Mithras-Kults[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Italian: This technology enables the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Tower of Babel[COLOR_REVERT] and the establishment of the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Cult of Mithras[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Spanish: Esta tecnología permite la [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Torre de Babel[COLOR_REVERT] y el establecimiento del [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Culto de Mitras[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.English: The first discoverer establishes the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Judaism[COLOR_REVERT] and receives a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]prophet[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.French: The first discoverer establishes the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Judaism[COLOR_REVERT] and receives a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]prophet[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.German: Der erste Entdecker gründet das [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Judentum[COLOR_REVERT] und erhält einen [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Propheten[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Italian: The first discoverer establishes the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Judaism[COLOR_REVERT] and receives a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]prophet[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Spanish: El primer descubridor establece el [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Judaismo[COLOR_REVERT] y recibe un [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]profeta[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.English: This technology enables the training of [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]mounted scouts[COLOR_REVERT] and scythians are allowed to build the first mounted fighters, [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]sagaris-horsemen[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.French: This technology enables the training of [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]mounted scouts[COLOR_REVERT] and scythians are allowed to build the first mounted fighters, [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]sagaris-horsemen[COLOR_REVERT].
