TEXT.German: Diese Technologie ermöglicht die Ausbildung von [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Berittenen Kundschaftern[COLOR_REVERT] und Skythen erhalten mit ihren [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Sagaris-Reitern[COLOR_REVERT] die ersten berittenen Kämpfer.
TEXT.Italian: This technology enables the training of [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]mounted scouts[COLOR_REVERT] and scythians are allowed to build the first mounted fighters, [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]sagaris-horsemen[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Spanish: Esta tecnología hace posible el entrenamiento de [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]batidores montados[COLOR_REVERT] y los escitas tienen permitido construir luchadores montados, [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]jinete con sagaris[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.English: The system of government [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Martial law[COLOR_REVERT] can be introduced and with the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]administrative building[COLOR_REVERT] and [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]public executions[COLOR_REVERT] a better organization and espionage will be possible.
TEXT.French: The system of government [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Martial law[COLOR_REVERT] can be introduced and with the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]administrative building[COLOR_REVERT] and [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]public executions[COLOR_REVERT] a better organization and espionage will be possible.
TEXT.German: Die Staatsform [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Standrecht[COLOR_REVERT] kann eingeführt werden und mit dem [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Verwaltungsgebäude[COLOR_REVERT] und den [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]öffentlichen Hinrichtungen[COLOR_REVERT] ist eine bessere Organisation und Spionage möglich.
TEXT.Italian: The system of government [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Martial law[COLOR_REVERT] can be introduced and with the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]administrative building[COLOR_REVERT] and [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]public executions[COLOR_REVERT] a better organization and espionage will be possible.
TEXT.Spanish: El sistema de gobierno [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]ley marcial[COLOR_REVERT] puede ser introducido y con el [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]edificio administrativo[COLOR_REVERT] y las [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]ejecuciones públicas[COLOR_REVERT] será posible una mejor organización y espionaje.

TEXT.English: With this technology you are able to train [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]shield bearers[COLOR_REVERT] and [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]auxiliaries[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.French: With this technology you are able to train [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]shield bearers[COLOR_REVERT] and [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]auxiliaries[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.German: Mit dieser Technologie ist die Ausbildung von [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Schildträgern[COLOR_REVERT] und [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Hilfstruppen[COLOR_REVERT] möglich.
TEXT.Italian: With this technology you are able to train [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]shield bearers[COLOR_REVERT] and [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]auxiliaries[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Spanish: Con esta tecnología es posible el entrenamiento de [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]soldados con escudo[COLOR_REVERT] y [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]auxiliares[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]cult of heroes[COLOR_REVERT] arises and [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]slaves[COLOR_REVERT] can be settled into cities (+1 experience to new units). Besides, you are able to build the wonder [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]"The Olympic Games"[COLOR_REVERT] in a city that believes in Greek gods.
TEXT.French: The [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]cult of heroes[COLOR_REVERT] arises and [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]slaves[COLOR_REVERT] can be settled into cities (+1 experience to new units). Besides, you are able to build the wonder [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]"The Olympic Games"[COLOR_REVERT] in a city that believes in Greek gods.
TEXT.German: Der [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Heroenkult[COLOR_REVERT] kann verbreitet und [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Sklaven[COLOR_REVERT] können als Schaukämpfer in eine Stadt angesiedelt werden (+1 Erfahrungspunkt für neue Einheiten). Weiters kann in einer Stadt mit griechischen Göttern das Wunder [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]"Die Olympischen Spiele"[COLOR_REVERT] gebaut werden.
TEXT.Italian: The [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]cult of heroes[COLOR_REVERT] arises and [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]slaves[COLOR_REVERT] can be settled into cities (+1 experience to new units). Besides, you are able to build the wonder [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]"The Olympic Games"[COLOR_REVERT] in a city that believes in Greek gods.
TEXT.Spanish: El [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]culto de héroes[COLOR_REVERT] aparece y los [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]esclavos[COLOR_REVERT] pueden ser establecidos en las ciudades (+1 de experiencia para nuevas unidades). Además, puedes construir la maravilla [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]"Los Juegos Olímpicos"[COLOR_REVERT] en una ciudad que crea en el culto griego.

TEXT.English: You are able to introduce the civic of [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]citizen soldiers[COLOR_REVERT] and build [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]spear- and axemen[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.French: You are able to introduce the civic of [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]citizen soldiers[COLOR_REVERT] and build [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]spear- and axemen[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.German: Die Staatsform [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Bürgerheer[COLOR_REVERT] kann nun eingeführt werden und [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Speer- und Axtkämpfer[COLOR_REVERT] können ausgebildet werden.
TEXT.Italian: You are able to introduce the civic of [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]citizen soldiers[COLOR_REVERT] and build [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]spear- and axemen[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Spanish: El principio [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Soldados civiles[COLOR_REVERT] puede ser elegido y las unidades [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]lancero y soldado con hacha[COLOR_REVERT], construidas.

TEXT.English: Other civilizations can be made [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]vassal states[COLOR_REVERT] and in a province the establishment of a [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]province palace[COLOR_REVERT] is possible, which can support the military with [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]auxiliary troops[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.French: Other civilizations can be made [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]vassal states[COLOR_REVERT] and in a province the establishment of a [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]province palace[COLOR_REVERT] is possible, which can support the military with [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]auxiliary troops[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.German: Andere Zivilisationen können zu [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Vasallenstaaten[COLOR_REVERT] gemacht werden und in einer Provinz ist jetzt die Errichtung eines [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Provinzpalasts[COLOR_REVERT] möglich, der mit [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Hilfstruppen[COLOR_REVERT] das Militär unterstützen kann.
TEXT.Italian: Other civilizations can be made [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]vassal states[COLOR_REVERT] and in a province the establishment of a [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]province palace[COLOR_REVERT] is possible, which can support the military with [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]auxiliary troops[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Spanish: Otras civilizaciones pueden hacer posible [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]estados vasallos[COLOR_REVERT] y en una provincia el establecimeinto de un [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]palacio provincial[COLOR_REVERT], que puede apoyar al ejército con [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]tropas auxiliares[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.English: With this technology [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]defensive alliances[COLOR_REVERT] can be made and the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Ivory Palace[COLOR_REVERT] can be established. Additional some CIVs can found their [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]League of Cities[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.French: With this technology [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]defensive alliances[COLOR_REVERT] can be made and the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Ivory Palace[COLOR_REVERT] can be established. Additional some CIVs can found their [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]League of Cities[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.German: Mit dieser Technologie können [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Verteidigungsbündnisse[COLOR_REVERT] geschlossen werden und der [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Elfenbeinpalast[COLOR_REVERT] kann errichtetet werden. Außerdem können einige Zivilisationen ihren [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Städtebund[COLOR_REVERT] gründen.
TEXT.Italian: With this technology [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]defensive alliances[COLOR_REVERT] can be made and the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Ivory Palace[COLOR_REVERT] can be established. Additional some CIVs can found their [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]League of Cities[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Spanish: Con esta tecnología pueden ser establecidas las[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]alianzas defensivas[COLOR_REVERT] y la [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Palacio de Marfil[COLOR_REVERT]. Algunas civilizaciones pueden construir su [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Liga de Ciudades[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.English: The system of government [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]theocracy[COLOR_REVERT] is available.
TEXT.French: The system of government [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]theocracy[COLOR_REVERT] is available.
TEXT.German: Die Staatsform [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Theokratie[COLOR_REVERT] kann eingeführt werden.
TEXT.Italian: The system of government [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]theocracy[COLOR_REVERT] is available.
TEXT.Spanish: Está disponible el sistema de gobierno [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]teocracia[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.English: Ship building makes the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]coastal trade[COLOR_REVERT] possible and those first [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]ships[COLOR_REVERT] can investigate, settle and carry on trade.
TEXT.French: Ship building makes the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]coastal trade[COLOR_REVERT] possible and those first [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]ships[COLOR_REVERT] can investigate, settle and carry on trade.
TEXT.German: Der Schiffsbau ermöglicht den [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Küstenhandel[COLOR_REVERT] und mit den ersten [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Schiffen[COLOR_REVERT] kann das Meer erforscht, besiedelt und Handel betrieben werden.
TEXT.Italian: Ship building makes the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]coastal trade[COLOR_REVERT] possible and those first [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]ships[COLOR_REVERT] can investigate, settle and carry on trade.
TEXT.Spanish: Construcción naval hace posible el [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]comercio costero[COLOR_REVERT] y esos primeros [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]barcos[COLOR_REVERT] pueden investigar, colonizar y transportar en comercio.

TEXT.English: This technology reveals Papyrus and allows you to build a Papyrus export post.
TEXT.French: This technology reveals Papyrus and allows you to build a Papyrus export post.
TEXT.German: Papyrus wird sichtbar und ein Papyrus-Exportposten kann errichtet werden.
TEXT.Italian: This technology reveals Papyrus and allows you to build a Papyrus export post.
TEXT.Spanish: Ahora está disponible el sistema de gobierno [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]casa real[COLOR_REVERT] y puede ser construída la [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]biblioteca[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.English: The resources [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]iron[COLOR_REVERT] will be discovered and [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Jungle[COLOR_REVERT] and [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Dense Forest[COLOR_REVERT] can now be lumbered.
TEXT.French: The resources [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]iron[COLOR_REVERT] will be discovered and [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Jungle[COLOR_REVERT] and [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Dense Forest[COLOR_REVERT] can now be lumbered.
TEXT.German: Die Ressource [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Eisen[COLOR_REVERT] wird sichtbar und [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Dschungel[COLOR_REVERT] und [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Dichter Wald[COLOR_REVERT] können nun gerodet werden.
TEXT.Italian: The resources [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]iron[COLOR_REVERT] will be discovered and [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Jungle[COLOR_REVERT] and [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Dense Forest[COLOR_REVERT] can now be lumbered.
TEXT.Spanish: Los recursos de [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]hierro[COLOR_REVERT] serán descubiertos y la [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]selva[COLOR_REVERT] y el [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]bosque denso[COLOR_REVERT] podrán ser talados.

TEXT.English: A strong [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]archery unit[COLOR_REVERT] is available for some civilizations.
TEXT.French: A strong [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]archery unit[COLOR_REVERT] is available for some civilizations.
TEXT.German: Eine starke [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Bogenschützeneinheit[COLOR_REVERT] wird für einige Zivilisationen baubar.
TEXT.Italian: A strong [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]archery unit[COLOR_REVERT] is available for some civilizations.
TEXT.Spanish: Está disponible una fuerte [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]unidad arquera[COLOR_REVERT] para algunas civilizaciones.

TEXT.English: A strong [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]defensive combat unit[COLOR_REVERT] is now available.
TEXT.French: A strong [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]defensive combat unit[COLOR_REVERT] is now available.
TEXT.German: Eine starke defensive [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Nahkampfeinheit[COLOR_REVERT] kann errichtet werden.
TEXT.Italian: A strong [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]defensive combat unit[COLOR_REVERT] is now available.
TEXT.Spanish: Está ahora dsponible una fuerte [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]unidad de combate defensiva[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.English: Social problems can be solved with [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]religious ejectors[COLOR_REVERT] and units can be promoted with [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]withdrawal tactics and marauder I[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.French: Social problems can be solved with [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]religious ejectors[COLOR_REVERT] and units can be promoted with [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]withdrawal tactics and marauder I[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.German: Gesellschaftliche Probleme können mit [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Religionsaustreibern[COLOR_REVERT] behoben werden und Einheiten können nun mit [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Rückzugstaktik und Marodeur I[COLOR_REVERT] befördert werden.
TEXT.Italian: Social problems can be solved with [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]religious ejectors[COLOR_REVERT] and units can be promoted with [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]withdrawal tactics and marauder I[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Spanish: Los problemas sociales pueden ser resueltos con los [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]inquisidores[COLOR_REVERT] y las unidades pueden ser promocionadas con [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]retirada y saqueo I[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.English: The first [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]siege unit[COLOR_REVERT] can be built and troops can now get healed in enemy territory with the [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]supply wagon[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.French: The first [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]siege unit[COLOR_REVERT] can be built and troops can now get healed in enemy territory with the [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]supply wagon[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.German: Die erste [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Belagerungseinheit[COLOR_REVERT] kann gebaut werden und Truppen knnen nun mit dem [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Versorgungswagen[COLOR_REVERT] auf feindlichem Terrain heilen.
TEXT.Italian: The first [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]siege unit[COLOR_REVERT] can be built and troops can now get healed in enemy territory with the [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]supply wagon[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Spanish: La primera [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]unidad de asedio[COLOR_REVERT] puede ser construída y ahora las tropas pueden curarse en territorio enemigo con la [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]caravana de suministros[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.English: This technology makes the improvement of hygenic conditions possible by a [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]cistern[COLOR_REVERT], the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]building of wells[COLOR_REVERT] in close proximity to oases and the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]spreading of irrigation[COLOR_REVERT]. With a Great Merchant now the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]cult of Cybele[COLOR_REVERT] can be created.
TEXT.French: This technology makes the improvement of hygenic conditions possible by a [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]cistern[COLOR_REVERT], the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]building of wells[COLOR_REVERT] in close proximity to oases and the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]spreading of irrigation[COLOR_REVERT]. With a Great Merchant now the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]cult of Cybele[COLOR_REVERT] can be created.
TEXT.German: Diese Technologie ermöglicht die Verbesserung der hygienischen Verhältnisse durch eine [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Zisterne[COLOR_REVERT], den Bau von [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Brunnen[COLOR_REVERT] in der Nähe von Oasen und die [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Verbreitung von Bewässerung[COLOR_REVERT]. Mit einem Händler kann nun der [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Cybele Kult[COLOR_REVERT] gegründet werden.
TEXT.Italian: This technology makes the improvement of hygenic conditions possible by a [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]cistern[COLOR_REVERT], the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]building of wells[COLOR_REVERT] in close proximity to oases and the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]spreading of irrigation[COLOR_REVERT]. With a Great Merchant now the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]cult of Cybele[COLOR_REVERT] can be created.
TEXT.Spanish: Esta tecnología hace posible la mejora de las condiciones higiénica por una [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]cisterna[COLOR_REVERT], la [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]construcción de pozos[COLOR_REVERT] en las proximidades a los oasis y la [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]propagación de la irrigación[COLOR_REVERT]. Ahora con un gran mercadores puede ser creado el [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]culto de Cibeles[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.English: The training of the most powerful weapon in the early ancient period, the [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]war chariot[COLOR_REVERT], becomes possible.
TEXT.French: The training of the most powerful weapon in the early ancient period, the [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]war chariot[COLOR_REVERT], becomes possible.
TEXT.German: Die Ausbildung der mächtigsten Waffe der Antike, dem [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Kriegsstreitwagen[COLOR_REVERT], wird ermöglicht.
TEXT.Italian: The training of the most powerful weapon in the early ancient period, the [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]war chariot[COLOR_REVERT], becomes possible.
TEXT.Spanish: Es posible el entrenamiento del arma más poderosa del periodo más antiguo, el [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]carro de guerra[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.English: The religion [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Zoroastrianism[COLOR_REVERT] arises.
TEXT.French: The religion [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Zoroastrianism[COLOR_REVERT] arises.
TEXT.German: Die Religion [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Zoroastrismus[COLOR_REVERT] wird gegründet.
TEXT.Italian: The religion [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Zoroastrianism[COLOR_REVERT] arises.
TEXT.Spanish: La religión [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Zoroastrismo[COLOR_REVERT] surge.

TEXT.English: The religion [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Hinduism[COLOR_REVERT] arises.
TEXT.French: The religion [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Hinduism[COLOR_REVERT] arises.
TEXT.German: Die Religion [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Hinduismus[COLOR_REVERT] wird gegründet.
TEXT.Italian: The religion [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Hinduism[COLOR_REVERT] arises.
TEXT.Spanish: La religión [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Hinduismo[COLOR_REVERT] surge.

TEXT.English: The establishment of a [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]quarry[COLOR_REVERT] will know be possible to accelerate important wonders like the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Pyramids[COLOR_REVERT] or the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Sphinx[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.French: The establishment of a [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]quarry[COLOR_REVERT] will know be possible to accelerate important wonders like the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Pyramids[COLOR_REVERT] or the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Sphinx[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.German: Durch diese Technologie wird die Errichtung eines [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Steinbruchs[COLOR_REVERT] ermöglicht, womit wichtige Wunder wie die [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Pyramiden[COLOR_REVERT] oder der [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Sphinx[COLOR_REVERT] beschleunigt beziehungsweise erbaut werden können.
TEXT.Italian: The establishment of a [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]quarry[COLOR_REVERT] will know be possible to accelerate important wonders like the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Pyramids[COLOR_REVERT] or the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Sphinx[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Spanish: El establecimiento de una [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]cantera[COLOR_REVERT] ahora hará posible acelerar importantes maravillas como las [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Pirámides[COLOR_REVERT] o la [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Esfinge[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.English: With this technology some CIVs are able to build a special buildings and the wonder [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]The Sphinx[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.French: With this technology some CIVs are able to build a special buildings and the wonder [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]The Sphinx[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.German: Mit dieser Technologie können manche Völker ein Spezialgebäude und das Wunder [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Der Sphinx[COLOR_REVERT] gebaut werden.
TEXT.Italian: With this technology some CIVs are able to build a special buildings and the wonder [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]The Sphinx[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Spanish: Con esta tecnología algunas CIVs son capaces de construir edificios especiales y la maravilla [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]La Esfinge[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.English: With this technology [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]roads[COLOR_REVERT] can be built and the delegation of [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]merchants[COLOR_REVERT] is possible.
TEXT.French: With this technology [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]roads[COLOR_REVERT] can be built and the delegation of [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]merchants[COLOR_REVERT] is possible.
TEXT.German: Mit dieser Technologie können [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Straßen[COLOR_REVERT] gebaut werden und die Entsendung von [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Handelskarren[COLOR_REVERT] ist möglich.
TEXT.Italian: With this technology [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]roads[COLOR_REVERT] can be built and the delegation of [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]merchants[COLOR_REVERT] is possible.
TEXT.Spanish: Con esta tecnología los [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]caminos[COLOR_REVERT] pueden ser construidos y es posible la delegación de [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]mercantes[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.English: The system of government [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]slavery[COLOR_REVERT] is available and from won fights [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]slaves[COLOR_REVERT] can be captured. Slaves are versatile!
TEXT.French: The system of government [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]slavery[COLOR_REVERT] is available and from won fights [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]slaves[COLOR_REVERT] can be captured. Slaves are versatile!
TEXT.German: Die Staatsform [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Sklaverei[COLOR_REVERT] wird ermöglicht und aus gewonnenen Kämpfen können [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Sklaven[COLOR_REVERT] erobert werden. Sklaven sind vielseitig einsetzbar!
TEXT.Italian: The system of government [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]slavery[COLOR_REVERT] is available and from won fights [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]slaves[COLOR_REVERT] can be captured. Slaves are versatile!
TEXT.Spanish: El sistema de gobierno [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]esclavitud[COLOR_REVERT] está disponible y [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]esclavos[COLOR_REVERT] pueden ser capturados en cada lucha ganada. ¡Los esclavos son versátiles!

TEXT.English: With a [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Smokehouse[COLOR_REVERT] meat can be conserved.
TEXT.French: With a [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Smokehouse[COLOR_REVERT] meat can be conserved.
TEXT.German: Mit einer [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Räucherhütte[COLOR_REVERT] kann Fleisch haltbar gemacht und gelagert werden.
TEXT.Italian: With a [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Smokehouse[COLOR_REVERT] meat can be conserved.
TEXT.Spanish: Con un [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]ahumadero[COLOR_REVERT] la carne puede conservarse.

TEXT.English: The second offensive and strong [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]close combat unit[COLOR_REVERT] is buildable.
TEXT.French: The second offensive and strong [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]close combat unit[COLOR_REVERT] is buildable.
TEXT.German: Die zweite offensive und starke [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Nahkampfeinheit[COLOR_REVERT] wird baubar.
TEXT.Italian: The second offensive and strong [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]close combat unit[COLOR_REVERT] is buildable.
TEXT.Spanish: Es construible la segunda ofenssiva y fuerte [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]unidad de combate cuerpo a cuerpo[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.English: With this technology you are able to construct a [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Mercenary post[COLOR_REVERT] to buy (hire) and sell units, commission groups of mercenaries against an opponent or train special units from CIVs with a certain mercenary bonus resource and units from a certain region (territorial mercenery units).
TEXT.French: With this technology you are able to construct a [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Mercenary post[COLOR_REVERT] to buy (hire) and sell units, commission groups of mercenaries against an opponent or train special units from CIVs with a certain mercenary bonus resource and units from a certain region (territorial mercenery units).
TEXT.German: Mit dieser Technologie kann man einen [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Söldnerposten[COLOR_REVERT] errichten, womit man Einheiten kaufen (anheuern) und verkaufen, Söldnergruppen gegen einen Gegner beauftragen oder bestimmte Spezialeinheiten anderer CIVs mit der Söldner-Bonusresource sowie Einheiten einer bestimmten Gegend (territoriale Söldner) ausbilden kann.
TEXT.Italian: With this technology you are able to construct a [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Mercenary post[COLOR_REVERT] to buy (hire) and sell units, commission groups of mercenaries against an opponent or train special units from CIVs with a certain mercenary bonus resource and units from a certain region (territorial mercenery units).
TEXT.Spanish: Con esta tecnología serás capaz de construir [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Puestos mercenarios[COLOR_REVERT] para comprar (contratar) y vender unidades, encomendar grupos de mercenarios con un oponente o crear tropas mercenarias, incluidas unidades especiales de bonus de mercenarios de otras Civs o cierta área (unidades mercenarios territoriales).

TEXT.English: The building [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]vintager[COLOR_REVERT] allows the production of [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]wine[COLOR_REVERT] and the further [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]spreading of grapes[COLOR_REVERT] and with the project of the [COLOR_PROJECT_TEXT]silk road[COLOR_REVERT] the trade between the cities is developed.
TEXT.French: The building [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]vintager[COLOR_REVERT] allows the production of [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]wine[COLOR_REVERT] and the further [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]spreading of grapes[COLOR_REVERT] and with the project of the [COLOR_PROJECT_TEXT]silk road[COLOR_REVERT] the trade between the cities is developed.
TEXT.German: Das Gebäude [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Winzer[COLOR_REVERT] ermöglicht die Erzeugung von [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Wein[COLOR_REVERT] und die weitere [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Verbreitung von Trauben[COLOR_REVERT] und mit dem Projekt der [COLOR_PROJECT_TEXT]Seidenstraße[COLOR_REVERT] wird der Handel zwischen den Städten ausgebaut.
TEXT.Italian: The building [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]vintager[COLOR_REVERT] allows the production of [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]wine[COLOR_REVERT] and the further [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]spreading of grapes[COLOR_REVERT] and with the project of the [COLOR_PROJECT_TEXT]silk road[COLOR_REVERT] the trade between the cities is developed.
TEXT.Spanish: El edificio [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]viticultor[COLOR_REVERT] permite la producción de [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]vino[COLOR_REVERT] y la mejor [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]propagación de uvas[COLOR_REVERT] y con el proyecto de la [COLOR_PROJECT_TEXT]ruta de la seda[COLOR_REVERT] el comercio entre las ciudades es desarrollado.

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Matriarchate[COLOR_REVERT] will spread. Everybody who researchs this tech gets a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]unit of his fertility goddess[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.French: The [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Matriarchate[COLOR_REVERT] will spread. Everybody who researchs this tech gets a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]unit of his fertility goddess[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.German: Das [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Matriarchat[COLOR_REVERT] wird verbreitet. Jeder Entdecker erhält eine [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Einheit seiner Fruchtbarkeitsgöttin[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Italian: The [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Matriarchate[COLOR_REVERT] will spread. Everybody who researchs this tech gets a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]unit of his fertility goddess[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Spanish: El [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Culto a la fertilidad[COLOR_REVERT] se propagará. Todos los que descubran esta tecnología obtienen una [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]unidad de su diosa de la fertilidad[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.English: A city can be raised to [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]capital and a unit, which possesses the promotion [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Allegiance[COLOR_REVERT], will not defect and ally to the enemy. ([COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Leader[COLOR_REVERT]: chance of 1:2, otherwise 1:4)
TEXT.French: A city can be raised to [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]capital and a unit, which possesses the promotion [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Allegiance[COLOR_REVERT], will not defect and ally to the enemy. ([COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Leader[COLOR_REVERT]: chance of 1:2, otherwise 1:4)
TEXT.German: Eine Stadt kann zur [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Hauptstadt[COLOR_REVERT] erhoben werden und eine Einheit, die die Beförderung [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Loyalität[COLOR_REVERT] besitzt, wird nicht abtrünnig und schließt sich somit nicht dem Gegner an ([COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Führer[COLOR_REVERT]: Chance von 1:2, sonst 1:4).
TEXT.Italian: A city can be raised to [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]capital and a unit, which possesses the promotion [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Allegiance[COLOR_REVERT], will not defect and ally to the enemy. ([COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Leader[COLOR_REVERT]: chance of 1:2, otherwise 1:4)
TEXT.Spanish: Una ciudad puede ser elevada a [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]capital y una unidad, que posea el ascenso [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Lealtad[COLOR_REVERT], no desertará y aliará al enemigo. ([COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Líder[COLOR_REVERT]: oportunidad 1:2, de lo contrario 1:4)

TEXT.English: The civic [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]dynasty[COLOR_REVERT] can be installed.
TEXT.French: The civic [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]dynasty[COLOR_REVERT] can be installed.
TEXT.German: Die Staatsform [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Dynastie[COLOR_REVERT] kann eingeführt werden.
TEXT.Italian: The civic [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]dynasty[COLOR_REVERT] can be installed.
TEXT.Spanish: El principio [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]dinastía[COLOR_REVERT] puede ser instalado.

TEXT.English: With this technology you are able to build your first [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]chariots[COLOR_REVERT]!
TEXT.French: With this technology you are able to build your first [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]chariots[COLOR_REVERT]!
TEXT.German: Mit dieser Technologie können die ersten [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Streitwagen[COLOR_REVERT] gebaut werden!
TEXT.Italian: With this technology you are able to build your first [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]chariots[COLOR_REVERT]!
TEXT.Spanish: ¡Con esta tecnología serás capaz de construir tus primeros [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]carros[COLOR_REVERT]!

TEXT.English: The modernization [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]plantation[COLOR_REVERT] can be built and the output if agriculturally used fields is increased.
TEXT.French: The modernization [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]plantation[COLOR_REVERT] can be built and the output if agriculturally used fields is increased.
TEXT.German: Die Modernisierung [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Plantage[COLOR_REVERT] kann gebaut werden und landwirtschaftlich genutzte Felder bringen mehr Ertrag.
TEXT.Italian: The modernization [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]plantation[COLOR_REVERT] can be built and the output if agriculturally used fields is increased.
TEXT.Spanish: La mejora [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]plantación[COLOR_REVERT] puede ser construída y la producción es incrementada si se usa en agricultura.

TEXT.English: The first strong and very cheap [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]close combat unit[COLOR_REVERT] can be build.
TEXT.French: The first strong and very cheap [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]close combat unit[COLOR_REVERT] can be build.
TEXT.German: Die erste starke und sehr günstige [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Nahkampfeinheit[COLOR_REVERT] kann gebaut werden.
TEXT.Italian: The first strong and very cheap [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]close combat unit[COLOR_REVERT] can be build.
TEXT.Spanish: La primera [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]unidad de combate cuerpo a cuerpo[COLOR_REVERT] fuerte y barata que puede ser construída.

TEXT.English: The first strong [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]archer[COLOR_REVERT] can be build.
TEXT.French: The first strong [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]archer[COLOR_REVERT] can be build.
TEXT.German: Der erste starke [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Bogenschütze[COLOR_REVERT] kann errichtet werden.
TEXT.Italian: The first strong [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]archer[COLOR_REVERT] can be build.
TEXT.Spanish: El primer [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]arquero[COLOR_REVERT] fuerte puede ser construído.

TEXT.English: The first strong [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]close combat unit[COLOR_REVERT] can be built.
TEXT.French: The first strong [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]close combat unit[COLOR_REVERT] can be built.
TEXT.German: Die erste starke [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Nahkampfeinheit[COLOR_REVERT] kann gebaut werden.
TEXT.Italian: The first strong [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]close combat unit[COLOR_REVERT] can be built.
TEXT.Spanish: La primera [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]unidad de combate cuerpo a cuerpo[COLOR_REVERT] fuerte puede ser construído.

TEXT.English: This form of the early writing allows [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]the exchange of knowledge[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.French: This form of the early writing allows [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]the exchange of knowledge[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.German: Diese Form der frühen Schrift ermöglicht den [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Austausch von Wissen[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Italian: This form of the early writing allows [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]the exchange of knowledge[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Spanish: Esta forma de escritura primitiva permite [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]el intercambio de conocimiento[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.English: The resources [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Tin[COLOR_REVERT] and [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Zinc[COLOR_REVERT] are detected and the resources [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Bronze[COLOR_REVERT] and [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Brass[COLOR_REVERT] can be produced.
TEXT.French: The resources [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Tin[COLOR_REVERT] and [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Zinc[COLOR_REVERT] are detected and the resources [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Bronze[COLOR_REVERT] and [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Brass[COLOR_REVERT] can be produced.
TEXT.German: Die Ressourcen [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Zinn[COLOR_REVERT] und [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Zink[COLOR_REVERT] werden entdeckt und die Ressourcen [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Bronze[COLOR_REVERT] und [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Messing[COLOR_REVERT] können erzeugt werden.
TEXT.Italian: The resources [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Tin[COLOR_REVERT] and [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Zinc[COLOR_REVERT] are detected and the resources [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Bronze[COLOR_REVERT] and [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Brass[COLOR_REVERT] can be produced.
TEXT.Spanish: Serán descubiertos los recursos [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]estaño[COLOR_REVERT] y [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]zinc[COLOR_REVERT] y se podrán producir los recursos [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]bronce[COLOR_REVERT] y [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]latón[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.English: The resources [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]incense[COLOR_REVERT] and [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]myrrh[COLOR_REVERT] are discovered and more or less magnificent graves can be built.
TEXT.French: The resources [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]incense[COLOR_REVERT] and [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]myrrh[COLOR_REVERT] are discovered and more or less magnificent graves can be built.
TEXT.German: Die Ressourcen [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Weihrauch[COLOR_REVERT] und [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Myrrhe[COLOR_REVERT] werden erkannt und mehr oder weniger prunkvolle Gräber können gebaut werden.
TEXT.Italian: The resources [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]incense[COLOR_REVERT] and [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]myrrh[COLOR_REVERT] are discovered and more or less magnificent graves can be built.
TEXT.Spanish: Serán descubiertos los recursos [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]incienso[COLOR_REVERT] y [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]mirra[COLOR_REVERT] y pueden contruirse tumbas mas o menos magníficas.

TEXT.English: With [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]fishing boats[COLOR_REVERT] sea resources can be taped, the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]river trade[COLOR_REVERT] is established and the resources [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]cedars[COLOR_REVERT] and [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]papyrus[COLOR_REVERT] will be discovered.
TEXT.French: With [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]fishing boats[COLOR_REVERT] sea resources can be taped, the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]river trade[COLOR_REVERT] is established and the resources [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]cedars[COLOR_REVERT] and [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]papyrus[COLOR_REVERT] will be discovered.
TEXT.German: Mit [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Fischerbooten[COLOR_REVERT] können Meeresressourcen erschlossen werden, Boote ermöglichen den [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Flusshandel[COLOR_REVERT] und die Ressourcen [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Zedernholz[COLOR_REVERT] und [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Papyrus[COLOR_REVERT] werden erkannt.
TEXT.Italian: With [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]fishing boats[COLOR_REVERT] sea resources can be taped, the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]river trade[COLOR_REVERT] is established and the resources [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]cedars[COLOR_REVERT] and [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]papyrus[COLOR_REVERT] will be discovered.
TEXT.Spanish: Con los [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]barcos pesqueros[COLOR_REVERT] los recursos matinos pueden ser capturados, el [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]comercio ribereño[COLOR_REVERT] es establecido y los recursos [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]cedros[COLOR_REVERT] y [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]papiros[COLOR_REVERT] serán descubiertos.

TEXT.English: The output of mines increases.
TEXT.French: The output of mines increases.
TEXT.German: Der Ertrag der Bergwerke steigt.
TEXT.Italian: [NEWLINE]
TEXT.Spanish: Se aumenta la producción de las minas.

TEXT.English: The resource [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Copper[COLOR_REVERT] is discovered and with [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Lumber Camps[COLOR_REVERT] the output of Forest can be increased.
TEXT.French: The resource [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Copper[COLOR_REVERT] is discovered and with [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Lumber Camps[COLOR_REVERT] the output of Forest can be increased.
TEXT.German: Die Ressource [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Kupfer[COLOR_REVERT] wird entdeckt, mit [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Holzfällerlagern[COLOR_REVERT] der Ertrag von Wäldern erhöht und mit einem [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Spähturm[COLOR_REVERT] kann das Gebiet überwacht werden.
TEXT.Italian: The resource [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Copper[COLOR_REVERT] is discovered and with [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Lumber Camps[COLOR_REVERT] the output of Forest can be increased.
TEXT.Spanish: Es descubierto el recurso [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]cobre[COLOR_REVERT], con [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]aserraderos[COLOR_REVERT] la producción del bosque puede ser aumentada y [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]puestos de vigía[COLOR_REVERT] puede asegurar las áreas.

TEXT.English: With priesthood the system of governance [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]high priests[COLOR_REVERT] is available and Phoenician, Greek and Egyptian missionaries can be send out.
TEXT.French: With priesthood the system of governance [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]high priests[COLOR_REVERT] is available and Phoenician, Greek and Egyptian missionaries can be send out.
TEXT.German: Mit Priestertum wird die Staatsform [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Hohepriester[COLOR_REVERT] ermöglicht und phönizische, griechische und ägyptische Missionare können entsandt werden.
TEXT.Italian: With priesthood the system of governance [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]high priests[COLOR_REVERT] is available and Phoenician, Greek and Egyptian missionaries can be send out.
TEXT.Spanish: Con sacerdocio el sistema de gobierno [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]altos sacerdotes[COLOR_REVERT] está disponible y fenicios, griegos y egipcios pueden mandar misioneros.

TEXT.English: Pastures can now be built.
TEXT.French: Pastures can now be built.
TEXT.German: Weideland kann nun errichtet werden.
TEXT.Italian: Pastures can now be built.
TEXT.Spanish: Los pastizales pueden ser construidos ahora.

TEXT.English: Food can be stored in [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]granaries[COLOR_REVERT] to use it in starving times.
TEXT.French: Food can be stored in [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]granaries[COLOR_REVERT] to use it in starving times.
TEXT.German: Nahrung kann in [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Kornspeichern[COLOR_REVERT] gelagert werden, um in Zeiten einer Hungersnot genutzt zu werden.
TEXT.Italian: Food can be stored in [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]granaries[COLOR_REVERT] to use it in starving times.
TEXT.Spanish: La comida puede ser almacenada en [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]graneros[COLOR_REVERT] para usarla en momentos de hambruna.

TEXT.English: The resources [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]electrum, gold, silver and gems[COLOR_REVERT] are discovered and [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]mines[COLOR_REVERT] can be build.
TEXT.French: The resources [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]electrum, gold, silver and gems[COLOR_REVERT] are discovered and [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]mines[COLOR_REVERT] can be build.
TEXT.German: Die Ressourcen [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Elektrum, Gold, Silber und Edelsteine[COLOR_REVERT] werden entdeckt und [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Bergwerke[COLOR_REVERT] können errichtet werden.
TEXT.Italian: The resources [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]electrum, gold, silver and gems[COLOR_REVERT] are discovered and [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]mines[COLOR_REVERT] can be build.
TEXT.Spanish: Son descubiertos los recursos [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]electro, oro, plata y gemas[COLOR_REVERT] y pueden construirse las [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]minas[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.English: At the resource grape you can build a [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]vineyard[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.French: At the resource grape you can build a [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]vineyard[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.German: Auf der Ressource Trauben kann ein [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Weingut[COLOR_REVERT] errichtet werden.
TEXT.Italian: At the resource grape you can build a [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]vineyard[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Spanish: En el recurso uvas puedes construir una [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]bodega[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.English: The first [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]ranged combat unit[COLOR_REVERT] is buildable. [NEWLINE]Enables the promotion of [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Flight I[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.French: The first [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]ranged combat unit[COLOR_REVERT] is buildable. [NEWLINE]Enables the promotion of [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Flight I[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.German: Die [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]erste Fernkampfeinheit[COLOR_REVERT] ist baubar. [NEWLINE]Ermöglicht die Beförderung [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Flucht I[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Italian: The first [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]ranged combat unit[COLOR_REVERT] is buildable. [NEWLINE]Enables the promotion of [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Flight I[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Spanish: Se puede construir la [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]primera unidad de combate a distancia[COLOR_REVERT]. Permite la promoción [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Huida I[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.English: First fields can be farmed and [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]grapes[COLOR_REVERT] are cultivated for the first time (Important INFO: Improvements cost money!).
TEXT.French: First fields can be farmed and [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]grapes[COLOR_REVERT] are cultivated for the first time (Important INFO: Improvements cost money!).
TEXT.German: Erste Felder können bewirtschaftet werden und [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Trauben[COLOR_REVERT] werden erstmals kultiviert (Wichtige INFO: Modernisierungen kosten Geld!).
TEXT.Italian: First fields can be farmed and [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]grapes[COLOR_REVERT] are cultivated for the first time (Important INFO: Improvements cost money!).
TEXT.Spanish: Pueden cultivarse los primeros campos y las [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]uvas[COLOR_REVERT] son cultivadas por primera vez (Información importante: ¡Las mejoras cuestan dinero!).

TEXT.English: This technology shows some animal resources and the unit [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Hunter[COLOR_REVERT] can be trained.
TEXT.French: This technology shows some animal resources and the unit [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Hunter[COLOR_REVERT] can be trained.
TEXT.German: Diese Technologie schaltet einige Tierresourcen frei und die Einheit [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Jäger[COLOR_REVERT] kann trainiert werden.
TEXT.Italian: This technology shows some animal resources and the unit [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Hunter[COLOR_REVERT] can be trained.
TEXT.Spanish: Esta tecnología muestra algunos recursos animales y se puede entrenar la unidad [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Cazador[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.English: Fishing allows [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]access to sea fields[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.French: Fishing allows [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]access to sea fields[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.German: Fischen ermöglicht den [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Zugang zu Meeresfeldern[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Italian: Fishing allows [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]access to sea fields[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Spanish: La pesca permite el [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]acceso a campos de mar[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.English: With mysticism the form of government [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]council of elders[COLOR_REVERT] is available and a city can produce [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]research[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.French: With mysticism the form of government [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]council of elders[COLOR_REVERT] is available and a city can produce [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]research[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.German: Mit Mystik wird die Staatsform [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Ältestenrat[COLOR_REVERT] verfügbar und in einer Stadt kann [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Forschung[COLOR_REVERT] produziert werden.
TEXT.Italian: With mysticism the form of government [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]council of elders[COLOR_REVERT] is available and a city can produce [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]research[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Spanish: Con misticismo está disponible la forma de gobierno [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]consejo de ancianos[COLOR_REVERT] y una ciudad puede producir [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]investigación[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.English: In all cities the satisfaction increases of one.
TEXT.French: In all cities the satisfaction increases of one.
TEXT.German: In allen Städten steigt die Zufriedenheit um eins.
TEXT.Italian: In all cities the satisfaction increases of one.
TEXT.Spanish: Crece en uno la satisfacción en todas las ciudades.

TEXT.English: The first to research this tech founds the religion of [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Zoroastrianism[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.French: The first to research this tech founds the religion of [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Zoroastrianism[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.German: Diese Technologie begründet die Religion des [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Zoroastrismus[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Italian: The first to research this tech founds the religion of [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Zoroastrianism[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Spanish: El primero en descubrir esta tecnología funda la religión del [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Zoroastrismo[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.English: The first to research this tech founds the religion of [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Nordic mythology[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.French: The first to research this tech founds the religion of [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Nordic mythology[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.German: Diese Technologie begründet die Religion der [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Nordischen Mythologie[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Italian: The first to research this tech founds the religion of [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Nordic mythology[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Spanish: El primero en descubrir esta tecnología funda la religión de la [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]mitología nórdica[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.English: The first to research this tech founds the religion of the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Egyptian gods[COLOR_REVERT] and the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Cult of Isis[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.French: The first to research this tech founds the religion of the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Egyptian gods[COLOR_REVERT] and the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Cult of Isis[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.German: Diese Technologie begründet die Religion der [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]ägyptischen Götter[COLOR_REVERT] und der [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Kult der Isis[COLOR_REVERT] wird gegründet.
TEXT.Italian: The first to research this tech founds the religion of the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Egyptian gods[COLOR_REVERT] and the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Cult of Isis[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Spanish: El primero en descubrir esta tecnología funda la religión del [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]culto egipcio[COLOR_REVERT] y el [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Culto de Isis[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.English: The first to research this tech founds the religion of [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Celtic mythology[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.French: The first to research this tech founds the religion of [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Celtic mythology[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.German: Diese Technologie begründet die Religion der [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Keltischen Mythologie[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Italian: The first to research this tech founds the religion of [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Celtic mythology[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Spanish: El primero en descubrir esta tecnología funda la religión de la [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]mitología celta[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.English: The first to research this tech founds the religion of the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Greek Gods[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.French: The first to research this tech founds the religion of the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Greek Gods[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.German: Diese Technologie begründet die Religion der [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Griechischen Götter[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Italian: The first to research this tech founds the religion of the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Greek Gods[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Spanish: El primero en descubrir esta tecnología funda la religión del [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]culto griego[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.English: The first to research this tech founds the religion of the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Phoenizian Gods[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.French: The first to research this tech founds the religion of the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Phoenizian Gods[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.German: Diese Technologie begründet die Religion der [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Phönizischen Götter[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Italian: The first to research this tech founds the religion of the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Phoenizian Gods[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Spanish: El primero en descubrir esta tecnología funda la religión del [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]culto fenicio[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.English: The first to research this tech founds the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Hinduism[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.French: The first to research this tech founds the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Hinduism[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.German: Diese Technologie begründet den [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Hinduismus[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Italian: The first to research this tech founds the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Hinduism[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Spanish: El primero en descubrir esta tecnología funda el [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Hinduismo[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.English: The first to research this tech founds the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Buddhism[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.French: The first to research this tech founds the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Buddhism[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.German: Diese Technologie begründet den [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Buddhismus[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Italian: The first to research this tech founds the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Buddhism[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Spanish: El primero en descubrir esta tecnología funda el [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Budismo[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.English: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]The Trojan Horse[COLOR_REVERT] is an unique unit and is able to set the defence of an enemy city to 0. This unit cannot be built (obtained by a technology) and is only used once.
TEXT.French: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Le Cheval de Troie[COLOR_REVERT] est une unité unique qui permet réduire à 0 les défenses d'une ville ennemie. Cette unité ne peut être obtenue qu'en découvrant une technologie et ne peut être utilisée qu'une seule fois.
TEXT.German: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Das Trojanische Pferd[COLOR_REVERT] ist eine einzigartige Einheit der Antike und kann die Stadtverteidigung einer feindlichen Stadt auf 0 setzen. Diese Einheit kann nicht gebaut werden (Erhalt durch eine Technologie) und ist nur einmal verwendbar.
TEXT.Italian: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]The Trojan Horse[COLOR_REVERT] is an unique unit and is able to set the defence of an enemy city to 0. This unit cannot be built (obtained by a technology) and is only used once.
TEXT.Spanish: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]El Caballo de Troya[COLOR_REVERT] es una unidad única capaz de dejar la defensa de una ciudad enemiga a 0. Esta unidad no puede ser construída (obtenida por una tecnología) y solo se puede usar una vez.

TEXT.English: These [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT] national units [COLOR_REVERT] can transport 4 units. It can be completed only with [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT] slaves [COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.French: These [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT] national units [COLOR_REVERT] can transport 4 units. It can be completed only with [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT] slaves [COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.German: Diese [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]nationale Einheit[COLOR_REVERT] kann 4 Einheiten transportieren. Sie kann nur mit [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Sklaven[COLOR_REVERT] fertiggestellt werden.
TEXT.Italian: These [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT] national units [COLOR_REVERT] can transport 4 units. It can be completed only with [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT] slaves [COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Spanish: Estas [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT] unidades nacionales [COLOR_REVERT] pueden transportar 4 unidades. Puede ser completado sólo con [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT] esclavos [COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.English: This is one of the best ranged attack units of ancient times.
TEXT.French: This is one of the best ranged attack units of ancient times.
TEXT.German: Dies ist eine der besten Fernkampfeinheiten der Antike.
TEXT.Italian: This is one of the best ranged attack units of ancient times.
TEXT.Spanish: Esta es una de las mejores unidades de larga distancia de la antigüedad.

TEXT.English: Use this unit in order to weaken stacks by ranged attack.
TEXT.French: Use this unit in order to weaken stacks by ranged attack.
TEXT.German: Nutzen Sie diese Einheit, um Angreifer mittels Fernangriff zu schwächen.
TEXT.Italian: Use this unit in order to weaken stacks by ranged attack.
TEXT.Spanish: Usa esta unidad para debilitar pilas con ataques a distancia.

TEXT.English: Treat yourself to this mercenary unit, if you are unable to build powerful melee units.
TEXT.French: Treat yourself to this mercenary unit, if you are unable to build powerful melee units.
TEXT.German: Leisten Sie sich diese Söldnereinheit, wenn sie selbst keine guten Nahkämpfer ausbilden können.
TEXT.Italian: Treat yourself to this mercenary unit, if you are unable to build powerful melee units.
TEXT.Spanish: Disfruta de esta unidad mercenaria, si no eres capaz de construir unidades cuerpo a cuerpo poderosas.

TEXT.English: Treat yourself to this mercenary unit, if you want to build roman streets and be part of the strengths of Roman Legions.
TEXT.French: Treat yourself to this mercenary unit, if you want to build roman streets and be part of the strengths of Roman Legions.
TEXT.German: Leisten Sie sich diese Söldnereinheit, wenn sie selbst römische Straßen bauen und die Stärken der römischen Legionen nutzen möchten.
TEXT.Italian: Treat yourself to this mercenary unit, if you want to build roman streets and be part of the strengths of Roman Legions.
TEXT.Spanish: Disfruta de esta unidad mercenaria, si quieres consruir calles romanas y ser parte de la fuerza de las legiones Romanas.

TEXT.English: Treat yourself to this mercenary unit, if you are unable to build powerful chariots.
TEXT.French: Treat yourself to this mercenary unit, if you are unable to build powerful chariots.
TEXT.German: Leisten Sie sich diese Söldnereinheit, wenn sie selbst keine guten Streitwagen ausbilden können.
TEXT.Italian: Treat yourself to this mercenary unit, if you are unable to build powerful chariots.
TEXT.Spanish: Disfruta de esta unidad mercenaria, si no eres capaz de construir carros poderosos.

TEXT.English: Treat yourself to this mercenary unit, if you are unable to build strong archer units.
TEXT.French: [NEWLINE]
TEXT.German: Leisten Sie sich diese Söldnereinheit, wenn sie selbst keine guten Bogenschützen ausbilden können.
TEXT.Italian: Treat yourself to this mercenary unit, if you are unable to build strong archer units.
TEXT.Spanish: Disfruta de esta unidad mercenaria, si no eres capaz de construir unidades de arquero fuertes.

TEXT.English: Treat yourself to this mercenary unit, if you are still unable to build strong horseman units.
TEXT.French: Treat yourself to this mercenary unit, if you are still unable to build strong horseman units.
TEXT.German: Leisten Sie sich diese Söldnereinheit, wenn sie selbst noch keine guten Reitereinheiten ausbilden können.
TEXT.Italian: Treat yourself to this mercenary unit, if you are still unable to build strong horseman units.
TEXT.Spanish: Disfruta de esta unidad mercenaria, si no eres todavía capaz de construir unidades jinete fuertes.

TEXT.English: The Liburna is the most agile and most powerful ship of antiquity, but can only transport 3 land units.
TEXT.French: The Liburna is the most agile and most powerful ship of antiquity, but can only transport 3 land units.
TEXT.German: Die Libure ist das wendigste und stärkste Schiff der Antike, kann aber nur 3 Landeinheiten transportieren.
TEXT.Italian: The Liburna is the most agile and most powerful ship of antiquity, but can only transport 3 land units.
TEXT.Spanish: La Liburna es el barco mas poderoso y ágil de la antigüedad, pero solo puede transportar 3 unidades terrestres.

TEXT.English: These powerful warships are the most powerful ships of its class and can transport up to 5 land units.
TEXT.French: These powerful warships are the most powerful ships of its class and can transport up to 5 land units.
TEXT.German: Diese mächtigen Kampfschiffe sind die stärksten Schiffe ihrer Klasse und können bis zu 5 Landeinheiten transportieren.
TEXT.Italian: These powerful warships are the most powerful ships of its class and can transport up to 5 land units.
TEXT.Spanish: Estos poderosos barcos de guerra son los barcos más poderos de su clase y pueden transportar hasta 5 unidades terrestres.

TEXT.English: These powerful ships can transport 5 land units.
TEXT.French: [NEWLINE].
TEXT.German: Diese mächtigen Schiffe können bereits 5 Landeinheiten transportieren.
TEXT.Italian: These powerful ships can transport 5 land units.
TEXT.Spanish: Estos poderosos barcos pueden transportar hasta 5 unidades terestres.

TEXT.English: These strong ships can even transport 3 land units.
TEXT.French: These strong ships can even transport 3 land units.
TEXT.German: Diese starken Schiffe können schon 3 Landeinheiten transportieren.
TEXT.Italian: These strong ships can even transport 3 land units.
TEXT.Spanish: Estos fuertes barcos puden incluso transportar 3 unidades terrestres.

TEXT.English: These stronger naval vessel can transport 2 land units and they can enter ocean spaces.
TEXT.French: These stronger naval vessel can transport 2 land units and they can enter ocean spaces.
TEXT.German: Diese stärkeren Schiffe transportieren 2 Landeinheiten und können auf das offene Meer hinaus fahren.
TEXT.Italian: These stronger naval vessel can transport 2 land units and they can enter ocean spaces.
TEXT.Spanish: Estos buques navales mas fuertes pueden transportar 2 unidades terrestres y pueden entrar en terreno oceánico.

TEXT.English: These early special naval vessel can trade in foreign cities and transport up to 3 land units very fast.
TEXT.French: These early special naval vessel can trade in foreign cities and transport up to 3 land units very fast.
TEXT.German: Diese frühen Schiffe können in fremden Städten handel treiben und bis zu 3 Landeinheiten schnell über das offene Meer transportieren.
TEXT.Italian: These early special naval vessel can trade in foreign cities and transport up to 3 land units very fast.
TEXT.Spanish: Este primitivo buque naval especial puede comercial en ciudad extranjeras y transportar hasta 3 unidades terrestres muy rápido.

TEXT.English: These earliest armed naval vessel can transport 3 land units but they cannot enter ocean spaces.
TEXT.French: These earliest armed naval vessel can transport 3 land units but they cannot enter ocean spaces.
TEXT.German: Diese frühen Kriegsschiffe transportieren 3 Landeinheiten, können aber nicht auf das offene Meer hinaus fahren.
TEXT.Italian: These earliest armed naval vessel can transport 3 land units but they cannot enter ocean spaces.
TEXT.Spanish: Este buque más naval armado más primitivo puede transportar 3 unidades terrestres pero no puede entrar en terreno oceánico.

TEXT.English: Use this unit in order to protect cities against attacks and weaken stacks by ranged attack.
TEXT.French: Use this unit in order to protect cities against attacks and weaken stacks by ranged attack.
TEXT.German: Nutzen Sie diese Einheit, um Städte vor Angreifern zu schützen und mittels Fernangriff zu schwächen.
TEXT.Italian: Use this unit in order to protect cities against attacks and weaken stacks by ranged attack.
TEXT.Spanish: Usa esta unidad para proteger ciudades contra ataques y debilitar pilas con ataques a distancia.

TEXT.English: This territorial special unit is the most powerful unit of the game.
TEXT.French: This territorial special unit is the most powerful unit of the game.
TEXT.German: Diese territoriale Spezialeinheit ist die stärkste Einheit des Spiels.
TEXT.Italian: This territorial special unit is the most powerful unit of the game.
TEXT.Spanish: Esta unidad especial territorial es la unidad mas poderosa del juego.

TEXT.English: This powerful unit gets a bonus against mounted units.
TEXT.French: This powerful unit gets a bonus against mounted units.
TEXT.German: Diese mächtige Einheit gibt einen Bonus auf berittene Einheiten.
TEXT.Italian: This powerful unit gets a bonus against mounted units.
TEXT.Spanish: Esta poderosa unidad tiene un bonus contra unidades montadas.

TEXT.English: This unit is one of the most powerful units of late antiquity.
TEXT.French: This unit is one of the most powerful units of late antiquity.
TEXT.German: Diese Einheit ist eine der stärksten Einheiten der Spätantike.
TEXT.Italian: This unit is one of the most powerful units of late antiquity.
TEXT.Spanish: Esta unidad es una de las mas poderosas unidades de la antigüedad tardía.

TEXT.English: This special unit is one of the most powerful units of late antiquity.
TEXT.French: This special unit is one of the most powerful units of late antiquity.
TEXT.German: Diese Spezialeinheit ist eine der stärksten Einheiten der Spätantike.
TEXT.Italian: This special unit is one of the most powerful units of late antiquity.
TEXT.Spanish: Esta unidad especial es una de las mas poderosas unidades de la antigüedad tardía.

TEXT.English: These armored horsemen are the most powerful units of late antiquity.
TEXT.French: These armored horsemen are the most powerful units of late antiquity.
TEXT.German: Diese gepanzerten Reiter sind die stärksten Einheiten der Spätantike.
TEXT.Italian: These armored horsemen are the most powerful units of late antiquity.
TEXT.Spanish: Estos jinetes acorazados son de las mas poderosas unidades de la antigüedad tardía.

TEXT.English: This powerful mounted combat unit is very powerful, also against mounted units and can carry out ranged attacks.
TEXT.French: This powerful mounted combat unit is very powerful, also against mounted units and can carry out ranged attacks.
TEXT.German: Diese mächtige berittene Kampfeinheit ist äußerst effektiv, auch gegen andere berittene Einheiten und kann Fernangriffe durchführen.
TEXT.Italian: This powerful mounted combat unit is very powerful, also against mounted units and can carry out ranged attacks.
TEXT.Spanish: Esta poderosa unidad de combate montada es muy eficaz, también contra unidades montadas y puede llevar a cabo ataques a distancia.

TEXT.English: This powerful mounted mercenary unit is the most powerful unit in its class.
TEXT.French: This powerful mounted mercenary unit is the most powerful unit in its class.
TEXT.German: Diese starke berittene Söldnereinheit ist die Stärkste ihrer Art.
TEXT.Italian: This powerful mounted mercenary unit is the most powerful unit in its class.
TEXT.Spanish: Esta poderosa unidad mercenaria montada es la unidad mas fuerte de su clase.

TEXT.English: This mounted unit is very powerful for early in the game and can carry out ranged attacks.
TEXT.French: This mounted unit is very powerful for early in the game and can carry out ranged attacks.
TEXT.German: Diese berittene Einheit ist vor allem in der Frühphase des Spiels äußerst effektiv und kann Fernangriffe durchführen.
TEXT.Italian: This mounted unit is very powerful for early in the game and can carry out ranged attacks.
TEXT.Spanish: Esta unidad montada es muy poderosa al principio del juego y puede llevar a cabo ataques a distancia.

TEXT.English: This cheap mounted unit is suitable for flanking enemy positions.
TEXT.French: This cheap mounted unit is suitable for flanking enemy positions.
TEXT.German: Diese billige Reitereinheit eignet sich zum Flankieren gegnerischer Stellungen.
TEXT.Italian: This cheap mounted unit is suitable for flanking enemy positions.
TEXT.Spanish: Esta unidad montada barata es adecuada para flanquear posiciones enemigas.

TEXT.English: This strong mounted unit is suitable for flanking enemy positions.
TEXT.French: [NEWLINE]
TEXT.German: Diese starke Reitereinheit eignet sich zum Flankieren gegnerischer Stellungen.
TEXT.Italian: This strong mounted unit is suitable for flanking enemy positions.
TEXT.Spanish: Esta unidad montada fuerte es adecuada para flanquear posiciones enemigas.

TEXT.English: This unit is the most powerful chariot unit of the game, can transport troops and carry out ranged attacks.
TEXT.French: This unit is the most powerful chariot unit of the game, can transport troops and carry out ranged attacks.
TEXT.German: Diese Einheit ist die stärkste Streitwageneinheit des Spiels, kann Fusstruppen befördern und Fernangriffe durchführen.
TEXT.Italian: This unit is the most powerful chariot unit of the game, can transport troops and carry out ranged attacks.
TEXT.Spanish: Esta unidad es la unidad de carro más poderosa del juego, puede transportar tropas y llevar a cabo ataques a distancia.

TEXT.English: This unit can transport infantry troops and is the most powerful war machine of the Bronze Age.
TEXT.French: This unit can transport infantry troops and is the most powerful war machine of the Bronze Age.
TEXT.German: Diese Einheit kann Fusstruppen befördern und ist die mächtigste Kampfmaschine der Bronzezeit.
TEXT.Italian: This unit can transport infantry troops and is the most powerful war machine of the Bronze Age.
TEXT.Spanish: Esta unidad puede transportar tropas de infantería y es la máquina de guerra más poderosa de la Edad de Bronce.

TEXT.English: This unit can transport infantry troops and is the most powerful war machine of the Bronze Age.
TEXT.French: This unit can transport infantry troops and is the most powerful war machine of the Bronze Age.
TEXT.German: Diese Einheit kann Fusstruppen befördern und ist die mächtigste Kampfmaschine der Bronzezeit.
TEXT.Italian: This unit can transport infantry troops and is the most powerful war machine of the Bronze Age.
TEXT.Spanish: Esta unidad puede transportar tropas de infantería y es la máquina de guerra más poderosa de la Edad de Bronce.

TEXT.English: This chariot is suitable for chases, can transport one infantry unit and is able to carry out ranged attacks.
TEXT.French: This chariot is suitable for chases, can transport one infantry unit and is able to carry out ranged attacks.
TEXT.German: Dieser Streitwagen eignet sich für Verfolgungen, kann jeweils einen Fusstrupp befördern und kann Fernangriffe durchführen.
TEXT.Italian: This chariot is suitable for chases, can transport one infantry unit and is able to carry out ranged attacks.
TEXT.Spanish: Este carro es adecuado para persecuciones, puede transportar una unidad de infantería y es capaz de llevar a cabo ataques a distancia.

TEXT.English: The disc chariot can only move into open terrain, can transport one infantry unit and is a powerful instrument of war.
TEXT.French: The disc chariot can only move into open terrain, can transport one infantry unit and is a powerful instrument of war.
TEXT.German: Der Scheibenradwagen kann nur offenes Terrain befahren, kann jeweils einen Fußtrupp befördern und ist ein mächtiges Kriegswerkzeug.
TEXT.Italian: The disc chariot can only move into open terrain, can transport one infantry unit and is a powerful instrument of war.
TEXT.Spanish: El carro de disco solo se puede mover por terreno abierto, puede transportar una unidad de infantería y es un poderoso instrumento de guerra.

TEXT.English: This special unit is a very powerful skirmish unit, which can carry out ranged attacks.
TEXT.French: This special unit is a very powerful skirmish unit, which can carry out ranged attacks.
TEXT.German: Diese Spezialeinheit ist eine mächtige Plänkler-Einheit, die Fernangriffe durchführen kann.
TEXT.Italian: This special unit is a very powerful skirmish unit, which can carry out ranged attacks.
TEXT.Spanish: Esta unidad especial es una unidad hostigadora muy poderosa, que puede llevar a cabo ataques a distancia.

TEXT.English: This special unit is the most powerful slinger unit in this game and can execute ranged attacks.
TEXT.French: This special unit is the most powerful slinger unit in this game and can execute ranged attacks.
TEXT.German: Diese Spezialeinheit ist die stärkste Steinschleuder-Einheit des Spiels und kann Fernangriffe ausführen.
TEXT.Italian: This special unit is the most powerful slinger unit in this game and can execute ranged attacks.
TEXT.Spanish: Esta unidad especial es la unidad lanzadora mas poderosa del juego y puede llevar a cabo ataques a distancia.

TEXT.English: This unit is a strong ranged combat unit, ideal for city defense and to weaken enemy troops. It gets a first strike chance, gets defensive bonuses in cities and on hills and can carry out ranged attacks.
TEXT.French: This unit is a strong ranged combat unit, ideal for city defense and to weaken enemy troops. It gets a first strike chance, gets defensive bonuses in cities and on hills and can carry out ranged attacks.
TEXT.German: Diese Einheit ist eine starke Fernwaffen-Einheit, ideal für die Stadtverteidigung und zum Schwächen des Feindes. Sie besitzt eine Erstangriff-Chance, einen Defensivbonus in Städten und auf Anhöhen und kann Fernangriffe durchführen.
TEXT.Italian: This unit is a strong ranged combat unit, ideal for city defense and to weaken enemy troops. It gets a first strike chance, gets defensive bonuses in cities and on hills and can carry out ranged attacks.
TEXT.Spanish: Esta unidad es una fuerte unidad de combate a distancia, ideal para la defensa de la ciudad y para debilitar tropas enemigas. Tiene oportunidad de ataque de iniciativa, tiene bonus defensivos en ciudades y en colinas y puede llevar a cabo ataques a distancia.

TEXT.English: This unit is one of the most powerful archer units of its time and is able to carry out ranged attacks.
TEXT.French: This unit is one of the most powerful archer units of its time and is able to carry out ranged attacks.
TEXT.German: Diese Einheit ist eine der stärksten Bogenschützen ihrer Zeit und kann Fernangriffe durchführen.
TEXT.Italian: This unit is one of the most powerful archer units of its time and is able to carry out ranged attacks.
TEXT.Spanish: Esta unidad es una de las unidades arquero mas poderos de su tiempo y es capaz de llevar a cabo ataques a distancia.

TEXT.English: This ranged unit is a great early choice for defending your cities from attack. It gets a first strike chance, gets defensive bonuses in cities and on hills and can carry out ranged attacks.
TEXT.French: This ranged unit is a great early choice for defending your cities from attack. It gets a first strike chance, gets defensive bonuses in cities and on hills and can carry out ranged attacks.
TEXT.German: Diese Fernwaffen-Einheit eignet sich hervorragend für die Verteidigung Ihrer Städte. Sie hat eine Erstangriff-Chance, einen Defensivbonus in Städten und auf Anhöhen und kann Fernangriffe durchführen.
TEXT.Italian: This ranged unit is a great early choice for defending your cities from attack. It gets a first strike chance, gets defensive bonuses in cities and on hills and can carry out ranged attacks.
TEXT.Spanish: Esta unidad de combate a distancia es una gran elección incial para defender tus ciudades. Tiene oportunidad de ataque de iniciativa, tiene bonus defensivos en ciudades y en colinas y puede llevar a cabo ataques a distancia.

TEXT.English: This primitive ranged unit is perfect for defending your cities. It has a defensive bonus in cities and on high ground and can carry out ranged attacks.
TEXT.French: This primitive ranged unit is perfect for defending your cities. It has a defensive bonus in cities and on high ground and can carry out ranged attacks.
TEXT.German: Diese primitive Fernwaffen-Einheit eignet sich hervorragend für die Verteidigung Ihrer Städte. Sie hat einen Defensivbonus in Städten und auf Anhöhen und kann Fernangriffe durchführen.
TEXT.Italian: This primitive ranged unit is perfect for defending your cities. It has a defensive bonus in cities and on high ground and can carry out ranged attacks.
TEXT.Spanish: Esta primitiva unidad de combate a dsitancia es perfecta para defender tus ciudades. Tiene bonus defensivo en ciudades y en tierras altas y puede llevar a cabo ataques a distancia.

TEXT.English: This Roman special unit is very strong and is best suited for a fight in open fields.
TEXT.French: This Roman special unit is very strong and is best suited for a fight in open fields.
TEXT.German: Diese römische Spezialeinheit ist sehr stark und eignet sich am besten für einen Kampf auf offenem Feld.
TEXT.Italian: This Roman special unit is very strong and is best suited for a fight in open fields.
TEXT.Spanish: Esta unidad especial romana es muy fuerte y es la mejor capacitada para un combate en terrenos abiertos.

TEXT.English: This unit is a very cheap and efficient unit of its time.
TEXT.French: This unit is a very cheap and efficient unit of its time.
TEXT.German: Diese Einheit ist eine sehr billige und effiziente Einheit ihrer Zeit.
TEXT.Italian: This unit is a very cheap and efficient unit of its time.
TEXT.Spanish: Esta unidad es una unidad muy barata y eficiente en su tiempo.

TEXT.English: This unit is a very cheap and efficient unit of its time.
TEXT.French: This unit is a very cheap and efficient unit of its time.
TEXT.German: Diese Einheit ist eine sehr billige und effiziente Einheit ihrer Zeit.
TEXT.Italian: This unit is a very cheap and efficient unit of its time.
TEXT.Spanish: Esta unidad es una unidad muy barata y eficiente de su tiempo.

TEXT.English: This unit is the most powerful unit in its time and can become very powerful with the right use of promotions.
TEXT.French: This unit is the most powerful unit in its time and can become very powerful with the right use of promotions.
TEXT.German: Diese Einheit ist die stärkste Nahkampfeinheit ihrer Zeit und kann mit den richtigen Beförderungen sehr stark werden.
TEXT.Italian: This unit is the most powerful unit in its time and can become very powerful with the right use of promotions.
TEXT.Spanish: Esta unidad es la unidad mas poderosa de su tiempo y se volverá muy fuerte con el buen uso de los ascensos.

TEXT.English: This unit is universal and can become very powerful with the right use of promotions.
TEXT.French: This unit is universal and can become very powerful with the right use of promotions.
TEXT.German: Diese Einheit ist universell einsetzbar und kann mit den richtigen Beförderungen sehr stark werden.
TEXT.Italian: This unit is universal and can become very powerful with the right use of promotions.
TEXT.Spanish: Esta unidad es versátil y se volverá muy fuerte con el buen uso de los ascensos.

TEXT.English: This unit is universal and can become very powerful with the right use of promotions.
TEXT.German: Diese Einheit ist universell einsetzbar und kann mit den richtigen Beförderungen sehr stark werden.
TEXT.Italian: This unit is universal and can become very powerful with the right use of promotions.
TEXT.Spanish: Esta unidad es versátil y se volverá muy fuerte con el buen uso de los ascensos.

TEXT.English: These units are one of the most powerful buildable melee untis in game, because of their iron weapons.
TEXT.French: These units are one of the most powerful buildable melee untis in game, because of their iron weapons.
TEXT.German: Diese Einheiten sind eine der stärksten baubaren Nahkampfeinheiten im Spiel, da sie Eisenwaffen benutzen.
TEXT.Italian: These units are one of the most powerful buildable melee untis in game, because of their iron weapons.
TEXT.Spanish: Estas unidades construibles cuerpo a cuerpo son una de las mas poderosas en el juego, a causa de sus armas de hierro.

TEXT.English: This primitive unit is the first strong melee unit.
TEXT.French: This primitive unit is the first strong melee unit.
TEXT.German: Diese primitive Einheit ist die erste starke Nahkampfeinheit.
TEXT.Italian: This primitive unit is the first strong melee unit.
TEXT.Spanish: Esta unidad primitiva es la primera unidad fuerte cuerpo a cuerpo.

TEXT.English: This special unit can be used best for city defense and is almost unbeatable in forest areas.
TEXT.French: This special unit can be used best for city defense and is almost unbeatable in forest areas.
TEXT.German: Diese Spezialeinheit eignet sich am besten für die Stadtverteidigung und ist beinahe unschlagbar in Waldgebieten.
TEXT.Italian: This special unit can be used best for city defense and is almost unbeatable in forest areas.
TEXT.Spanish: Esta unidad especial puede ser mejor usada para la defensa de la ciudad y es prácticamente invencible en áreas forestales.

TEXT.English: This special unit is suitable for attacks and has a bonus against melee and mounted units.
TEXT.French: This special unit is suitable for attacks and has a bonus against melee and mounted units.
TEXT.German: Diese Spezialeinheit eignet sich für Angriffe und hat einen Bonus gegen Nahkampf- und berittene Einheiten.
TEXT.Italian: This special unit is suitable for attacks and has a bonus against melee and mounted units.
TEXT.Spanish: Esta unidad especial es adecuada para ataques y tiene bonus contra unidades montadas y cuerpo a cuerpo.

TEXT.English: This special unit is one of the most powerful units of its time and can be used best for city defense.
TEXT.French: This special unit is one of the most powerful units of its time and can be used best for city defense.
TEXT.German: Diese Spezialeinheit ist eine der stärksten Einheiten ihrer Zeit und eignet sich am besten für die Stadtverteidigung.
TEXT.Italian: This special unit is one of the most powerful units of its time and can be used best for city defense.
TEXT.Spanish: Esta unidad especial es una de las más poderosas unidades de su tiempo y puede ser usada mejor para la defensa de la ciudad.

TEXT.English: This special unit is one of the most powerful units of its time and can be used best for cities.
TEXT.French: This special unit is one of the most powerful units of its time and can be used best for cities.
TEXT.German: Diese Spezialeinheit ist eine der stärksten Einheiten ihrer Zeit und eignet sich am besten für die Städte.
TEXT.Italian: This special unit is one of the most powerful units of its time and can be used best for cities.
TEXT.Spanish: Esta unidad especial es una de las más poderosas unidades de su tiempo y puede ser usada mejor para las ciudades.

TEXT.English: This elite unit is only available for the Egyptians and can be commended from a Nomarch, which has acquired the status of a veteran.
TEXT.French: This elite unit is only available for the Egyptians and can be commended from a Nomarch, which has acquired the status of a veteran.
TEXT.German: Diese Eliteeinheit steht nur den Ägyptern zur Verfügung und kann aus einem Gaufürst erstellt werden, der den Status eines Veterans erreicht hat.
TEXT.Italian: This elite unit is only available for the Egyptians and can be commended from a Nomarch, which has acquired the status of a veteran.
TEXT.Spanish: Esta unidad de élite solo está disponible para los egipcios y puede ser promovida desde un nomarca, que haya adquirido el estatus de veterano.

TEXT.English: This elite unit can only be formed from Spartan Hoplites, which have the status of veterans. It is the most powerful close combat unit of its time.
TEXT.French: This elite unit can only be formed from Spartan Hoplites, which have the status of veterans. It is the most powerful close combat unit of its time.
TEXT.German: Diese Eliteeinheit kann nur aus Spartanischen Hopliten gebildet werden, die den Rang eines Veteranen haben. Sie ist die stärkste Nahkampfeinheit ihrer Zeit.
TEXT.Italian: This elite unit can only be formed from Spartan Hoplites, which have the status of veterans. It is the most powerful close combat unit of its time.
TEXT.Spanish: Esta unidad élite sólo puede ser formada de Hoplitas espartiatas, que tienen el estatus de veteranos. Es la más poderosa unidad de combate cuerpo a cuerpo de su tiempo

TEXT.English: This special unit is one of the most powerful units of its time and can be used best for city defense.
TEXT.French: This special unit is one of the most powerful units of its time and can be used best for city defense.
